data.anv: सागरम् the ocean, अम्बरप्रख्यम्  resembling the sky, अम्बरम् sky, सागरोपमम् like the ocean, सागरं च and the ocean, अम्बरं चेति like the sky identical, निर्विशेषम् not at all, अदृश्यत not appeared

data.v: संपृक्तं नभसा ह्यम्भः संपृक्तं च नभोऽम्भसा । तादृग्रूपे स्म दृश्येते तारा रत्नसमाकुले ॥
data.es: The ocean and the sky filled with gems and stars respectively appeared alike.
data.anv: अम्भः water, नभसा of the sky, सम्पृक्तम् close to each other, तारारत्नसमाकुले covered with stars and gems, तादृग्रूपे those two, दृश्येते appeared

data.v: समुत्पतितमेघस्य वीच्चि मालाकुलस्य च । विशेषो न द्वयोरासीत्सागरस्याम्बरस्य च ॥
data.es: There was no distinction between the sky with rising clouds and the ocean with moving waves.
data.anv: समुत्पतितमेघस्य the rising clouds, सागरस्य of the ocean, वीचिमालाकुलस्य the moving waves, अम्बरस्य and that of sky, द्वयोः both, विशेषः distinguishing between,नासीत् was not there

data.v: अन्योन्यैराहताः सक्ताः सस्वनुर्भीमनिःस्वनाः । ऊर्मयः सिन्धुराजस्य महाभेर्य इवाहवे ॥
data.es: The waves of the ocean striking each other making frightening sounds like the blowing of war horns seemed as if challenging each other.

data.v: रत्नौघजलसंनादं विषक्तमिव वायुना । उत्पतन्तमिव क्रुद्धं यादोगणसमाकुलम् ॥
data.es: The enthusiastic vanaras saw the sea inhabited by animals filled with gems and water concentrated in one place rising to the sky, as though infuriated. The rising of the waves (the noise) of the ocean by the cause of wind seemed as if they were talking about.
data.anv: महोत्साह with great enthusiasm, ते they, रत्नौघजलसन्नादम् the sound of gems and water, वायुना  by the cause of the wind , विषक्तमिव  concentrated, क्रुद्धमिव   as if infuriated , उत्पतन्तम् rising up, यादोगणसमाकुलम् the abode of animals filled with water, वाताहतजलाशयम्  the ocean, आकाशे of the sky, अनिलोद्धूतम् the vanaras, ऊर्मिभिः even the waves, प्रवल्गन्तम् talking, इव like, ददृशुः appeared

data.v: ददृशुस्ते महात्मानो वाताहतजलाशयम् । अनिलोद्धूतमाकाशे प्रवल्गतमिवोर्मिभिः । भ्रान्तोर्मिजलसंनादं प्रलोलमिव सागरम् ॥
सा तु नीलेन विधिवत्स्वारक्षा सुसमाहिता । सागरस्योत्तरे तीरे साधु सेना निवेशिता ॥
data.es: Nila settled the army successfully by making them reside on the northern shore of the sea, as per tradition.

data.v: शोकश्च किल कालेन गच्छता ह्यपगच्छति । मम चापश्यतः कान्तामहन्यहनि वर्धते ॥
data.es: As time passes, grief passes away. However my sorrow is progressing day by day being unable to see my beloved.

data.v: न मे दुःखं प्रिया दूरे न मे दुःखं हृतेति च । एतदेवानुशोचामि वयोऽस्या ह्यतिवर्तते ॥
data.es: There is no grief in me that my beloved is at a distance, nor that she is taken away. Indeed her age is advancing. On this account I am feeling for her.

data.v: वाहि वात यतः कन्या तां स्पृष्ट्वा मामपि स्पृश । त्वयि मे गात्रसंस्पर्शश्चन्द्रे दृष्टिसमागमः ॥
data.es: O Wind Touch that place where my beloved is and touch me as it will give me the same feeling as my beloved's touch. Through the moon I will get her eye contact too.

data.v: तन्मे दहति गात्राणि विषं पीतमिवाशये । हा नाथेति प्रिया सा मां ह्रियमाणा यदब्रवीत् ॥
data.es: While being carried away that beloved of mine would have cried aloud saying 'oh my lord'. This thought is burning my body as though I have consumed poison in my stomach.

data.v: तद्वियोगेन्धनवता तच्चिन्ताविपुलार्चिषा । रात्रिं दिवं शरीरं मे दह्यते मदनाग्निना ॥
data.es: The pain of separation from her is working as fuel and the thought about hers is engulfing me as extensive flame and burning my body day and night.

data.v: अवगाह्यार्णवं स्वप्स्ये सौमित्रे भवता विना । कथंचित्प्रज्वलन्कामः समासुप्तं जले दहेत् ॥
data.es: O Saumitri Plunging into water alone I will lie down. Probably then the god of love will not be able to consume me while sleeping.

data.v: बह्वेतत्कामयानस्य शक्यमेतेन जीवितुम् । यदहं सा च वामोरुरेकां धरणिमाश्रितौ ॥
data.es: Me and Sita are seeking refuge on the same land indeed. Because of that only survival is possible for me, who is desiring for her very much.

data.v: केदारस्येव केदारः सोदकस्य निरूदकः । उपस्नेहेन जीवामि जीवन्तीं यच्छृणोमि ताम् ॥
data.es: I am living only because of hearing about her survival, just as a paddy field without water gets wet by the proximity of a neighboring paddy field with water.

data.v: कदा तु खलु सुस्शोणीं शतपत्रायतेक्षणाम् । विजित्य शत्रून्द्रक्ष्यामि सीतां स्फीतामिव श्रियम् ॥

data.es: That darkeyed lady (Sita), even though she has me (husband), is in the midst of rakshasas. Surely she is sad and emaciated being away from her husband, without a protector.

data.es: Sita who is by nature slim would surely be slender due to abstaining from eating, unfavorable time and location.

data.v: आश्वासितो लक्ष्मणेन रामः संध्यामुपासत । स्मरन्कमलपत्राक्षीं सीतां शोकाकुलीकृतः ॥
data.es: Remembering the lotus petal eyed Sita, Rama who was distracted with grief, comforted by Lakshmana offered evening prayers.॥इत्यार्षेवाल्मीकीयेश्रीमद्रामायणेआदिकाव्येयुद्दकाण्डेपञ्चमस्सर्गः॥This is the end of the fifth Sarga of Yuddhakanda of the first epic, the holy Ramayana composed by sage Valmiki.

data.v: लङ्कायां तु कृतं कर्म घोरं दृष्ट्वा भवावहम् । राक्षसेन्द्रो हनुमता शक्रेणेव महात्मना । अब्रवीद्राक्षसान्सर्वान्ह्रिया किंचिदवाङ्मुखः ॥
data.es: Considering the terrifying, dreadful action that was carried by the great soul Hanuman who was like Indra in might, the Lord of Rakshasas felt a bit shy and bending down his head addressed all Rakshasas.

data.v: धर्षिता च प्रविष्टा च लङ्का दुष्प्रसहा पुरी । तेन वानरमात्रेण दृष्टा सीता च जानकी ॥
data.es: "(Hanuman) After all a monkey in size, entered the inaccessible city of Lanka, destroyed it and saw Sita, daughter of king of Janaka."
data.anv: तेन that, वानरमात्रेणतेन: after all a monkey in size, दुष्प्रसहा: difficult to enter, लङ्कापुरी: city of Lanka, धर्षिताच: destroyed, प्रविष्टाच: and entered जानकी: Janaka's daughter, Janaki, सीताच: and Sita दृष्टा: saw.

data.v: प्रसादो धर्षितश्चैत्यः प्रवरा राक्षसा हताः । आविला च पुरी लङ्का सर्वा हनुमता कृता ॥
data.es: "Hanuman destroyed huge mansions, killed topmost Rakshasas and shattered all the city of Lanka."
data.anv: हनुमता: Hanuman, चैत्यप्रासादः huge mansions, धर्षितः destroyed, प्रवराः topmost, राक्षसृः Rakshasas, हताः killed, सर्वा: all, लङ्कापुरी: the city of Lanka, अविला: shattered, कृता: did.

data.v: किं करिष्यामि भद्रं वः किं वा युक्तमनन्तरम् । उच्यतां नः समर्थं यत्कृतं च सुकृतं भवेत् ॥
data.es: "What is the best thing to do now? What should we do ultimately? What is advisable to do? What strategy is effective? You may suggest that which is good for us."
data.anv: वः and now, भद्रम् best, किम्  What is, करिष्यामि: should we do, अनन्तरम् ultimately, किं: what, वा: to you, युक्तम् advisable, नः for us, यत् that which, समर्थम् effective, कृतम् strategy, सुकृतम् that which is good, भवेत् for us, उच्यताम् you may suggest.

data.v: मन्त्रमूलं हि विजयं प्राहुरार्या मनस्विनः । तस्माद्वै रोचये मन्त्रं रामं प्रति महाबलाः ॥
data.es: "O mighty Rakshasas Wise elders say that through wise counsel victory is possible. Therefore, in the case of Rama I am thinking of seeking your advice."
data.anv: महाबलाः of great strength, विजयम् victory, मन्त्रमूलम् through wise counsel, मनस्विनः wise elders, प्रवदन्ति: say, तस्मात् therefore, रामंप्रति: in case of Rama, मन्त्रम् advice, रोचम् thinking of seeking.

data.v: त्रिविधाः पुरुषा लोके उत्तमाधममध्यमाः । तेषां तु समवेतानां गुणदोषं वदाम्यहम् ॥
data.es: "In the world, men are of three kinds good, mediocre and lowly. It is difficult to know their differences. I will tell you about the flaws in their characteristics."
data.anv: लोके: in the world, उत्तमाधममध्यमाः good, bad and mediocre, त्रिविधाः three kinds, पुरुषाः men, समवेतानाम् their differences, तेषाम् there, गुणदोषौ: flaws in characteristics, अहम् I, वदामि: will tell.

data.v: मन्त्रिभिर्हितसंयुक्तैः समर्थैर्मन्त्रनिर्णये । मित्रैर्वापि समानार्थैर्बान्धवैरपि वा हितैः ॥
data.es: "He who decides, after deliberating with his wellwishers, with capable ministers of good counsel, relatives of common interest or friends before undertaking his task and tries with faith in god is said to be best among men."
data.anv: यः he who, हितसंयुक्तेः with wellwishers, मन्न्त्रनिर्णये: who decides with counsel, समर्थैः capable ones, मन्त्रिभिः ministers, समानार्थैः relatives with common interests, मित्रैर्वापि: or friends, अधिकैः very well, बान्धवैर्यापि: or with relatives, सहितः friends, मन्त्रयित्वा: deliberating with, कर्मारम्भान् to begin his work प्रवर्तयेत् before undertaking, दैवेच: with faith in god, यत्नम् makes his attempt, कुरुते: does, तम् him, पुरुषोत्तमम् best among men, आहु: said to be.

data.v: सहितो मन्त्रयित्वा यः कर्मारम्भान्प्रवर्तयेत् । दैवे च कुरुते यत्नं तमाहुः पुरुषोत्तमम् ॥
data.es: "He who decides, after deliberating with his wellwishers, with capable ministers of good counsel, relatives of common interest or friends before undertaking his task and tries with faith in god is said to be best among men."
data.anv: यः he who, हितसंयुक्तेः with wellwishers, मन्न्त्रनिर्णये: who decides with counsel, समर्थैः capable ones, मन्त्रिभिः ministers, समानार्थैः relatives with common interests, मित्रैर्वापि: or friends, अधिकैः very well, बान्धवैर्यापि: or with relatives, सहितः friends, मन्त्रयित्वा: deliberating with, कर्मारम्भान् to begin his work प्रवर्तयेत् before undertaking, दैवेच: with faith in god, यत्नम् makes his attempt, कुरुते: does, तम् him, पुरुषोत्तमम् best among men, आहु: said to be.

data.v: एकोऽर्थं विमृशेदेको धर्मे प्रकुरुते मनः । एकः कार्याणि कुरुते तमाहुर्मध्यमं नरम् ॥
data.es: "He who thinks solitarily (not with others), deliberates with in his mind on his duty and executes his tasks, is said to be a (mediocre) a mediocre one."
data.anv: कः alone, अर्थम् thinks, विमृशेत् deliberates with in, एकः alone, धर्मे: duty, मनः in his mind, प्रकुरुते: executes, एकः alone, कार्याणि: tasks, कुरुते: does, तंनरम् that person, मध्यमम् mediocre intermediate one, आहुः is said to be.

data.v: गुणदोषावनिश्चित्य त्यक्त्वा दैवव्यपाश्रयम् । करिष्यामीति यः कार्यमुपेक्षेत्स नराधमः ॥
data.es: "He who fails to consider the merits and de merits, decides to do on his own and begins without faith in god saying, 'I' will do it, is a lowly one among men."
data.anv: यः he who, गुणदोषौ: merits and de merits, न: not, निश्चित्य: deciding, व्यक्तम् failing to consider, दैवव्यपाश्रयः giving up faith in God, करिष्यामिइति: I will do it, कार्यम् task, उपेक्षेत् begins to do, सः he, नराधमः lowly one among men.

data.v: यथेमे पुरुषा नित्यमुत्तमाधममध्यमाः । एवं मन्त्रोऽपि विज्ञेय उत्तमाधममध्यमः ॥
data.es: "Just as among men there are good, intermediate and lowly people invariably their counsel is also of three kinds good, mediocre and lowly."
data.anv: नित्यम् invariably, इमे: thus, पुरुषाः men, यथा: similarly, उत्तमाधममध्यमाः good, intermediate and lowly people, एवम् in the same way, मन्त्राऽहि: even their counsel, उत्तमाधममध्यमः good, mediocre and lowly kinds, विज्ञेयः you know.

data.v: ऐकमत्यमुपागम्य शास्त्रदृष्टेन चक्षुषा । मन्त्रिणो यत्र निरस्तास्तमाहुर्मन्त्रमुत्तमम् ॥
data.es: "When all ministers are unanimous and come to one conclusion based on sastras, and having come together remain firm, such counsel is said to be the best."
data.anv: मन्त्रिणः ministers, शास्त्रदृष्टेन: based on Sastras, चक्षुषा: in view, ऐकमत्यम् all of them come to one conclusion, उपागम्य: having come together, यत्र: then निरताः remain attached, तम् such, मन्त्रम् counsel, उत्तमम् best, आहु: said to be.

data.v: बह्व्योऽपि मतयो गत्वा मन्त्रिणो ह्यर्थनिर्णये । पुनर्यत्रैकतां प्राप्तः स मन्त्रो मध्यमः स्मृतः ॥
data.es: "The conclusion in which many ministers have different points of view and attain unanimity in decision after meeting different points of view is a mediocre vision."
data.anv: बह्व्य: many, मतीर्गत्वा: due to different points of view, मन्त्रिणाम् ministers, अर्थनिर्णयः in decision, पुनः again, यत्र: that, एकताम् altogether, प्राप्तः attained unanimity, सः that, मन्त्रः adviser, मध्यमः mediocre, स्मृतः vision.

data.v: अन्योन्यमतिमास्थाय यत्र संप्रतिभाष्यते । न चैकमत्ये श्रेयोऽस्ति मन्त्रः सोऽधम उच्यते ॥
data.es: "Where counsellors with different opinions hold on to their individual opinions that pleases them and are not for the outcome of a unanimous decision, such a counsel is said to be bad."
data.anv: यत्रअन्योन्यमतिम् where counsellors with different opinions, आस्थाय: holding on to their individual opinions, सम्प्रतिभाष्यते: speak What pleases them, ऐकमत्ये: unanimous opinion, श्रेयः good outcome, नास्ति: not, सःमन्त्रः such counsel, अधमः a bad one, उच्यते: is said.

data.v: तस्मात्सुमन्त्रितं साधु भवन्तो मन्त्रिसत्तमाः । कार्यं संप्रतिपद्यन्तामेतत्कृत्यतमं मम ॥
data.es: "On account of that, O wise ones Think over very well, rightly of the task to be done and determine the action required by me now."
data.anv: तस्मात् on account of that, मतिसत्तामाः wise ones, भवन्तः your, सुमन्त्रितम् thinking over well, साधु: rightly, कार्यम् task, सम्प्रतिपद्यन्ताम् that which has to be done, एतत् all that, मम: to me, कृत्यम् required action, मतम् I need.

data.v: वानराणां हि वीराणां सहस्रैः परिवारितः । रामोऽभ्येति पुरीं लङ्कामस्माकमुपरोधकः ॥
data.es: Accompanied by thousands of Vanaras, Rama is approaching to besiege us and reaching the city of Lanka.
data.anv: रामः Rama, धीराणाम् valorous, वानराणाम् Vanaras, सहस्रैः thousands, परिवारितः to besiege, अस्माकम् us, उपरोधकः is approaching, लङ्कांपुरीम् city of Lanka, अभ्येति: reaching.

data.v: तरिष्यति च सुव्यक्तं राघवः सागरं सुखम् । तरसा युक्तरूपेण सानुजः सबलानुगः ॥
data.es: "Rama who is worthy of his might, accompanied by his brother and army will be able to cross the ocean speedily and easily."
data.anv: राघवः Rama, युक्तरूपेण: worthy of his might, तरसा: speedily, सानुजः his brother, सबलानुगः and his army, सागरम् ocean, सुव्यक्तम् it is clear, सुखम् easily, तरिष्यतिच: will be able to cross.

data.v: अस्मिन्नेवंगते कार्ये विरुद्धे वानरैः सह । हितं पुरे च सैन्ये च सर्वं संमन्त्र्यतां मम ॥
data.es: Rama may dry up the ocean or do something else out of his power. If Vanaras come and encounter us, we will clash with him. When his army has set out that way, you may advise me of a plan that benefits the army and city of Lanka."॥इत्यार्षेवाल्मीकीयेश्रीमद्रामायणेआदिकाव्येयुद्धकाण्डेषष्ठमस्सर्गः॥This is the end of the sixth sarga of Yuddha Kanda of the first epic the holy Ramayana composed by sage Valmiki.
data.anv: समुद्रम् ocean, उच्चोषयति: dry up, वीर्येण: out of his power, अन्यद्वा: or something else, करोति: will do, वानरैः Vanara, सह: with, विरुद्धे: encounters, अस्मिन् when his army, एवंगते: has set out that way, कार्ये: task, मम: me, पुरे: for the city, सैन्ये: army, हितम् benefiting, सर्वम् for all, सम्मन्त्रयताम् advise me a plan

data.v: इत्युक्ता राक्षसेन्द्रेण राक्षसास्ते महाबलाः । ऊचुः प्राञ्जलयः सर्वे रावणं राक्षसेश्वरम् ॥
data.es: All the Rakshasas of mighty strength, having heard the Lord of Rakshasas, thus spoke to their leader, greeting with folded hands.
data.anv: राक्षसेन्द्रेण: to the leader of Rakshasas, सर्वे: all Rakshasas, महाबलाः of mighty strength प्रान्जलयः greeting with folded hand s, राक्षसास्ते: the Rakshasas, राक्षसेश्वरम्: Lord of Rakshasas, रावणं: to Ravana ऊचुः having heard, इत्युक्ता: thus spoke.

data.v: राजन्परिघशक्त्यृष्टिशूलपट्टससंकुलम् । सुमहन्नो बलं कस्माद्विषादं भजते भवान् ॥
data.es: "Oh king, (our army is equipped with) iron bars, javelins, double edged swords, spears, three pointed weapons, ploughs etc."
data.anv: राजन्: Oh king, परिघ: iron bars, शक्ति: javelins, ऋष्टि: double edged swords, शूल: spear, पट्टिश: spear with a sharp edge or some other weapon with three points, कुन्तलम्: ploughs.

data.v: कैलासशिखरावासी यक्षैर्बहुभिरावृतः । सुमहत्कदनं कृत्वा वश्यस्ते धनदः कृतः ॥
data.anv: कैलासशिखरावासी: he who lives on the peak of mount Kailas: बहुभि: numerous, यक्षै: Yakshas, (बहुभि:  आवृत:  बाहुभिरावृत:) आवृतः surrounded by, सुमहत: great, कदनं: sorrow कृत्वा: being caused, वश्यस्ते: surrendered to you, धनदः bestow er of wealth (Kubera) कृतः remained.

data.v: स महेश्वरसख्येन श्लाघमानस्त्वया विभो । निर्जितः समरे रोषाल्लोकपालो महाबलः ॥
data.es: "O King Proud of his friendship with Lord Maheshwara (Siva), that mighty ruler of the world Kubera was subdued by you in the conflict."
data.anv: स: that, महेश्वरसख्येन: by the friendship of Maheswara (Siva), श्लाघमान: pridingमहाबलः strong, ल्लोकपालो: ruler of the world, स्त्वया: by you might, विभो: O king, निर्जितः subdued, समरे: in conflict.

data.v: विनिहत्य च यक्षौघान्विक्षोभ्य च विगृह्य च । त्वया कैलासशिखराद्विमानमिदमाहृतम् ॥
data.es: "Causing terrific disturbance to the hordes of Yakshas and taking them as prisoners, you have brought the great aerial chariot from mount Kailas."
data.anv: त्वया: by you, यक्षौघान्: hordes of yaksha, विनिहत्य: taking as prisoners, विक्षोभ्यच: causing disturbance by stirring and, विनिगृह्यच: and taking away, कैलासशिखराद्: from mount Kailas, विमानमिदमाहृतम्: brought this great aerial chariot.

data.v: मयेन दानवेन्द्रेण त्वद्भयात्सख्यमिच्छता । दुहिता तव भार्यार्थे दत्ता राक्षसपुंगव ॥
data.es: "Maya, the ruler of Danavas has given his daughter (Mandodari) to you as a wife out of fear of you, O leader of Rakshasas"
data.anv: राक्षसपुङ्गव: leader of Rakshasas, दानवेन्द्रेण: ruler of Danavas, मयेन: by Maya, त्वद्भयात्: out of fear of you, मिच्छता: sought, सख्य: alliance, दत्ता: given तव: to you, भार्यार्थे: wife, दुहिता: daughter.

data.v: दानवेन्द्रो मधुर्नाम वीर्योत्सिक्तो दुरासदः । विगृह्य वशमानीतः कुम्भीनस्याः सुखावहः ॥
data.es: "Madhu, another ruler of Danavas who was proud of his valour and difficult to approach, the husband of Kumbhinasi was subjugated by you by your offering to fight with him."
data.anv: दुरासदः difficult to approach, वीर्योत्सिक्तो: proud of his valour, कुम्भीनस्याः Kumbhinasi (your sister), सुखावहः who brings joy to her (who is husband of), दानवेन्द्रो: ruler of Danavas, मधुर्नाम: called as Madhu, विगृह्य: offering to fight and win, वशमानीतः subjugated to you.

data.v: निर्जितास्ते महाबाहो नागा गत्वा रसातलम् । वासुकिस्तक्षकः शङ्खो जटी च वशमाहृताः ॥
data.es: "O mighty armed king Going to the subterranean world, you won over the serpent demons Vasuki, Takshaka, Shanka and Jati and made them submit to you."
data.anv: महाबाहो: mighty armed, स्ते: you गत्वा: going to, रसातलम्: subterranean region वासुकि:: Vasuki, तक्षकः Takshaka, शङखो: Shanka, जटीच: and Jati, नागा: serpent demons, र्जिता: winning over, वशमाहृताः made them submit to you.

data.v: अक्षया बलवन्तश्च शूरा लब्धवराः पुनः । त्वया संवत्सरं युद्ध्वा समरे दानवा विभो ॥
data.es: "The mighty and strong Danava warriors who had obtained boon were made to fight a war by you for one year."
data.anv: अक्षया: imperishable, बलवन्तश्च: strong and mighty, शूरा: warriors, लब्धवराः who had obtained boon, त्वया: by you, संवत्सरं: one year, युद्ध्वा: fighting, पुनः again, समरे: in war, दानवा: Danavas, विभो: Oh Lord.

data.v: स्वबलं समुपाश्रित्य नीता वशमरिंदम । मायाश्चाधिगतास्तत्र बहवो राक्षसाधिप ॥
data.es: "O king of Rakshasas (Those Danavas) were reduced to sub mission by resorting to your own strength. Oh subduer of enemies, many deceitful tricks were learned from them."
data.anv: राक्षसाधिप: king of Rakshasas, स्वबलं: your own strength, समुपाश्रित्य: resorting to, मायाश्च: deceitful tricks, अधिगता: learned, तत्र: there, बह्वो: many, नीता: reduced to, वशम: sub mission, अरिन्दम: subduer of enemies.

data.v: शूराश्च बलवन्तश्च वरुणस्य सुता रणे । निर्जितास्ते महाबाहो चतुर्विधबलानुगाः ॥
data.es: "O blessed king Mighty strong sons of Varuna, heroes capable of war and of all the four kinds of army have been won by you."
data.anv: महाभाग: blessed one, चतुर्विधबलानुगाः four kinds of army, शूराश्च: capable heroes, बलवन्तश्च: mighty strong, वरुणस्य: Varuna's, सुता: sons, रणे: in war, निर्जिता: have won, ते: by you.

data.v: मृत्युदण्डमहाग्राहं शाल्मलिद्वीपमण्डितम् । अवगाह्य त्वया राजन्यमस्य बलसागरम् ॥
जयश्च विप्लुलः प्राप्तो मृत्युश्च प्रतिषेधितः । सुयुद्धेन च ते सर्वे लोकास्तत्र सुतोषिताः ॥
क्षत्रियैर्बहुभिर्वीरैः शक्रतुल्यपराक्रमैः । आसीद्वसुमती पूर्णा महद्भिरिव पादपैः ॥
data.es: "The earth was fully filled with Kshatriya heroes of great prowess, equal to Indra in war who stood like trees on earth."
data.anv: क्षत्रियैर्: warriors, आसीद: was, बहुभि: many, र्वीरैः strong, शक्रतुल्यपराक्रमैः with courage equal to Indra, आसीद्: was, वसुमती: Earth, पूर्णा: fully, महद्भिरिव: like great, पादपैः trees

data.v: तेषां वीर्यगुणोत्साहैर्न समो राघवो रणे । प्रसह्य ते त्वया राजन्हताः परमदुर्जयाः ॥
data.es: "Raghava is not equal to them in valour, excellence and energy. Those warriors who were difficult to overcome by battle were overpowered and killed by you."
data.anv: तेषाम्: to them, वीर्यगुणोत्साहै: valour, excellence and energy, न: not, समो: equal, राघवो: Raghava, प्रसह्य: were overpowered, त्वया: by you, राजन्: King, हता: Killed, समरदुर्जयाः who were difficult to be overpowered.

data.v: राजन्नापदयुक्तेयमागता प्राकृताज्जनात् । हृदि नैव त्वया कार्या त्वं वधिष्यसि राघवम् ॥
ततो नीलाम्बुदनिभः प्रहस्तो नाम राक्षसः । अब्रवीत्प्राञ्जलिर्वाक्यं शूरः सेनापतिस्तदा ॥
data.es: Then a Rakshasa whose body was like a dark cloud, called Prahastha, the heroic chief of the army, spoke these words with folded palms.
data.anv: ततः then, शूरः hero, सेनापतिः chief of army, नीलाम्बुदनिभ: one whose body is like dark cloud, प्रहस्तोनाम: called Prahastha, राक्षसः Rakshasa, प्राञ्जलिः with folded palms, वाक्यम् these words. अब्रवीत् spoke.

data.v: देवदानवगन्धर्वाः पिशाचपतगोरगाः । न त्वां धर्षयितुं शक्ताः किं पुनर्वानरा रणे ॥
data.es: "Even Devas, Danavas, Gandharvas, Devils, birds, and serpents, cannot face you in war. What to say of Vanaras?"
data.anv: देवदानवगन्धर्वाः Devas, Danavas, Gandharvas, पिशाचपतगोरगाः Devils, birds and even serpents, सर्वे: all, रणे: in war, धर्षयितुम् to face you, नशक्याः not possible, वानरा: Vanaras, किंपुनः What to say.

data.v: सर्वे प्रमत्ता विश्वस्ता वञ्चिताः स्म हनूमता । न हि मे जीवतो गच्छेज्जीवन्स वनगोचरः ॥
data.es: All of us were inattentive and confident (of our ability) while Hanuman cheated us. When I am alive how will the wanderer of woods (Hanuman) go with life?
data.anv: अप्रमत्ता: inattentive, विश्वस्ताः confident, सर्वे: all of us, हनूमता: Hanuman, वञ्चिताःस्म: cheated us, मे: when I, जीवतः living, सः he, वनगोचरः wanderer of woods, जीवन् with life, नगच्छेत् हि: will not go.

data.v: सर्वां सागरपर्यन्तां सशैलवनकाननाम् । करोम्यवानरां भूमिमाज्ञापयतु मां भवान् ॥
data.es: "I will make all the oceans, mountains, forests or even the entire earth rid of Vanaras if you order me."
data.anv: सागरपर्यन्ताम् all over the ocean, सशैलवनकाननाम् in the mountains and forests, सर्वाम् entire, भूमिम् the earth, अवानराम् rid of Vanaras, करोमि: will do, भवान् your, माम् me, आज्ञापयतु: if you order

data.v: रक्षां चैव विधास्यामि वानराद्रजनीचर । नागमिष्यति ते दुःखं किंचिदात्मापराधजम् ॥
data.es: "O night ranger (Ravana) I will arrange the protection (of this Lanka) from these Vanaras. For your own wrong action (of abducting Sita) you cannot undergo suffering."
data.anv: रजनीचर: O night ranger (Ravana), वानरात् by these Vanaras, रक्षांचैव: will protect, विधास्यामि: I will arrange, ते: by you, आत्मापराधजम् your own wrong action, दुःखम् grief, किञ्चित् even a little, नागमिष्यति: not undergo

data.v: अब्रवीच्च सुसंक्रुद्धो दुर्मुखो नाम राक्षसः । इदं न क्षमणीयं हि सर्वेषां नः प्रधर्षणम् ॥
data.es: Feeling very angry, a Rakshasa called Durmukha said, "He who has caused shame for all of us does not deserve to be excused."
data.anv: दुर्मुखोनाम: called Durmukha, राक्षसः Rakshasa, सुसङ्कृद्ध: feeling very angry, च:and, अब्रवीत् said, नः nay, सर्वेषाम् for all of us, इदम् this, प्रधर्षणम् shame, नक्षमणीयंहि: not deserve to be excused.

data.v: अयं परिभवो भूयः पुरस्यान्तःपुरस्य च । श्रीमतो राक्षसेन्द्रस्य वानरेन्द्रप्रधर्षणम् ॥
data.es: "Furthermore, this assault by a Vanara on Lanka, to the royal residence, and to the prosperous Lord of Rakshasas is despising."
data.anv: पुरस्य: to Lanka, अन्तःपुरस्यच: and to the royal residence, अयम् this, परिभवः despising, श्रीमतः one who is prosperous, राक्षसेन्द्रस्य: to the Lord of Rakshasas, वानरेण: by Vanara, प्रधर्षणम् assaulting, भूयः Furthermore.

data.v: अस्मिन्मुहूर्ते हत्वैको निवर्तिष्यामि वानरान् । प्रविष्टान्सागरं भीममम्बरं वा रसातलम् ॥
data.es: At this very minute I will go alone into the terrific ocean, to the underworld or the upper world and on entering put an end to the monkey.
data.anv: अस्मिन् this, मुहूर्ते: very minute, एकः alone, गत्व: going, सागरम् ocean, भीमम् terrific, रसातलम् the underworld, अम्बरंवा: or the upper world, प्रविष्टान् entering, वानरान् the monkey, निवर्तिष्यामि: I will put an end.

data.v: ततोऽब्रवीत्सुसंक्रुद्धो वज्रदंष्ट्रो महाबलः । प्रगृह्य परिघं घोरं मांसशोणितरूपितम् ॥
data.es: Then a mighty strong one who was endowed with diamond like teeth highly enraged, clasping a dreadful iron bludgeon stained with flesh and blood spoke.
data.anv: ततः then, महाबल: mighty, वज्रदंष्ट्रः one who has diamond like strong teeth,सुसङ्कृद्ध: highly enraged, मांसशोणितरूषितम् stained with flesh and blood, घोरम् dreadful, परिघम् iron bludgeon, प्रगृह्य: clasping, अब्रवीत् spoke.

data.v: किं वो हनुमता कार्यं कृपणेन तपस्विना । रामे तिष्ठति दुर्धर्षे सुग्रीवे सहलक्ष्मणे ॥
data.es: "While unassailable Rama is there, along with Lakshmana and Sugriva, what have we to do with miserable, pitiable and helpless Hanuman?"
data.anv: दुर्धर्षे: one who is unassailable, रामे: while Rama, सलक्ष्मणे: along with Lakshmana, ससुग्रीवेऽपि: and also Sugriva, तिष्ठति: is there, कृपणेन: pitiable तपस्विना: helpless, हनुमता: with Hanuman, व: for us, कार्यम् work, किम् what.

data.v: अद्य रामं ससुग्रीवं परिघेण सलक्ष्मणम् । आगमिष्यामि हत्वैको विक्षोभ्य हरिवाहिनीम् ॥
data.es: "Now I would go alone and with the iron crowbar, kill Sugriva Lakshmana and Rama and return after shattering the Vanara troops."
data.anv: अद्य: now, एकः alone, परिघेण: by the iron crow bar, ससुग्रीववम् that Sugriva, सलक्ष्मणम् and that Lakshmana, रामम् and Rama also, हत्वा: killing, हरिवाहिनीम् Vanara troops, विक्षोभ्य: after shattering, आगमिष्यामि: would return.

data.v: कौम्भकर्णिस्ततो वीरो निकुम्भो नाम वीर्यवान् । अब्रवीत्परमकुर्द्धो रावणं लोकरावणम् ॥
data.es: Thereafter the enraged heroic and valiant son of Kumbhakarna called Nikumbha said to Ravana, who made the world cry.
data.anv: ततः thereafter, कौम्भकर्णिः Son of Kumbhakarna, वीरः hero, वीर्यवान् valiant, निकुम्भोनाम: called Nikumbha, परमक्रुद्ध: highly enraged, लोकरावणम् one who makes the world cry, रावणम् Ravana, अब्रवीत् said.

data.v: सर्वे भवन्तस्तिष्ठन्तु महाराजेन संगताः । अहमेको हनिष्यामि राघवं सहलक्ष्मणम् ॥
data.es: "Let all of you stay here along with the king. Going alone I will kill Rama along with Lakshmana, and Hanuman also Sugriva and all of the Vanaras."
data.anv: भवन्तः of you, सर्वे: all, महाराजेन: King's, सङ्गताः along with, तिष्ठन्तु: stay here, अहम् I, एकः alone, सहलक्ष्मणम् along with Lakshmana, राघवम् that Rama, सहानूमन्तम् and with Hanuman, सुग्रीवंच: Sugriva also, सर्वानेव: everyone, वानरान्: those Vanaras, च also, हनिष्यामि will kill.

data.v: ततो वज्रहनुर्नाम राक्षसः पर्वतोपमः । क्रुद्धः परिलिहन्वक्त्रं जिह्वया वाक्यमब्रवीत् ॥
data.es: Then a Rakshasa called Vajrahanu, mountain like in form, enraged, licking lips with his tongue said these words.
data.anv: ततः then, पर्वतोपमः one of mountain like form, वज्रहनुर्नाम Vajrahanu, राक्षसः Rakshasa, क्रुद्ध: angry, जिह्वया: with tongue, सृक्काम् lips, परिलिहन् licking, वाक्यम् these words, अब्रवीत् said.

data.v: स्वैरं कुर्वन्तु कार्याणि भवन्तो विगतज्वराः । एकोऽहं भक्षयिष्यामि तान्सर्वान्हरियूथपान् ॥
data.es: All of you giving up fear, do your duties freely move happily sporting and drinking sweet wine. Single handed, I will consume all the Vanara army.
data.anv: भवन्तः all of you, विगतज्वराः giving up fear, स्वैरम् freely, कर्माणि: duties कुर्वन्तु: doing, स्वस्थाः moving happily, क्रीडन्तु: sporting, निश्चिन्ताः without any anxiety, वारुणंमधु: sweet wine, पिबन्तु: drinking, अहम् I, एकः single handed, ताम् them, सर्वाम् all, हरियूथपान् Vanara army, भक्षयिष्यामि: will consume.

data.v: स्वस्थाः क्रीडन्तु निश्चिन्ताः पिबन्तु मधुवारुणीम् । अहमेको हनिष्यामि सुग्रीवं सहलक्ष्मणम् । साङ्गदं च हनूमन्तं रामं च रणकुञ्जरम् ॥
data.es: "I alone will kill that Rama with Lakshmana, Sugriva, that Angada, Hanuman and the Vanara army."॥इत्यार्षेवाल्मीकीयेश्रीमद्रामायणेआदिकाव्येयुद्धकाण्डेअष्टमस्सर्गः॥This is the end of the eighth sarga of Yuddha Kanda of the first epic the holy Ramayana composed by sage Valmiki.
data.anv: अहम् I, एकः alone, सहलक्ष्मणम् with Lakshmana, सुग्रीवम् and Sugriva, साङ्गदम् that Angada, हनूमन्तम् Hanuman, रणकुञ्जरम् army, रामम् च: and Rama, वधिष्यामि: will kill.

data.v: ततो निकुम्भो रभसः सूर्यशत्रुर्महाबलः । सुप्तघ्नो यज्ञकोपश्च महापार्श्वो महोदरः ॥
अग्निकेतुश्च दुर्धर्षो रश्मिकेतुश्च राक्षसः । इन्द्रजिच्च महातेजा बलवान्रावणात्मजः ॥
data.es: Agnikethu, a Rakshasa who is difficult to win over, Rasmikethu, Suptaghna and Yajnakepu waged war with Rama.
data.anv: सुदुर्धर्षः difficult to win over, अग्निकेतुः Agnikethu, राक्षसः Rakshasa, रश्मिकेतुश्च and Rasmikethu, सुप्तघ्नुः Suptaghna, यज्ञकेपश्च Yajnakepu, रामेणसह along with Rama, सङ्गताः waged.

data.v: प्रहस्तोऽथ विरूपाक्षो वज्रदंष्ट्रो महाबलः । धूम्राक्षश्चातिकायश्च दुर्मुखश्चैव राक्षसः ॥
परिघान्पट्टसान्प्रासाञ्शक्तिशूलपरश्वधान् । चापानि च सबाणानि खड्गांश्च विपुलाञ्शितान् ॥
प्रगृह्य परमक्रुद्धाः समुत्पत्य च राक्षसाः । अब्रुवन्रावणं सर्वे प्रदीप्ता इव तेजसा ॥
अद्य रामं वधिष्यामः सुग्रीवं च सलक्ष्मणम् । कृपणं च हनूमन्तं लङ्का येन प्रधर्षिता ॥
data.es: "I alone will kill that Rama with Lakshmana, Sugriva, that Angada, Hanuman and the Vanara army."॥इत्यार्षेवाल्मीकीयेश्रीमद्रामायणेआदिकाव्येयुद्धकाण्डेअष्टमस्सर्गः॥This is the end of the eighth sarga of Yuddha Kanda of the first epic the holy Ramayana composed by sage Valmiki.
data.anv: अहम् I, एकः alone, सहलक्ष्मणम् with Lakshmana, सुग्रीवम् and Sugriva, साङ्गदम् that Angada, हनूमन्तम् Hanuman, रणकुञ्जरम् army, रामम् च: and Rama, वधिष्यामि: will kill.

data.v: तान्गृहीतायुधान्सर्वान्वारयित्वा विभीषणः । अब्रवीत्प्राञ्जलिर्वाक्यं पुनः प्रत्युपवेश्य तान् ॥
data.es: With folded hands, Vibheeshana made all the (Rakshasas) wielding arms to stop and sit and addressed these words to Ravana.
data.anv: विभीषणः Vibheeshana, गृहीतायुधान् wielding arms, तान् सर्वान् all those, वारयित्वा: stopping, तान् those, प्रत्युपवेश्य: and making them sit, प्राञ्जलिः with folded palms, वाक्यम् these words, अब्रवीत् addressed.

data.v: अप्युपायैस्त्रिभिस्तात योऽर्थः प्राप्तुं न शक्यते । तस्य विक्रमकालांस्तान्युक्तानाहुर्मनीषिणः ॥
data.es: "Dear father, intelligent people say that an act which cannot be accomplished by the three means (Sama Conciliation, Dana Gift, Bheda Sowing dissension), should only be accomplished diligently by one's heroic deed. Therefore, we should think of war only after the above three means are employed."
data.anv: तात: father, यः one who takes, अर्थः I ask, त्रिभिः of the three (Sama, Dana and Bheda), उपायैरपि: means also, प्राप्तम् attained, नशक्यते: not possible, तस्य: his, विक्रमकालान् heroic deed, युक्तान् diligently, मनीषिणः intelligent, आहुः yes.

data.v: प्रमत्तेष्वभियुक्तेषु दैवेन प्रहतेषु च । विक्रमास्तात सिध्यन्ति परीक्ष्य विधिना कृताः ॥
data.es: "O Dear at those who are not alert, who are attacked by the enemy, and who are struck by fate, if you examine diligently according to prescribed method and perform deeds of heroic valour you will succeed."
data.anv: तात: father, प्रमत्तेषु: at those who are not alert, अभियुक्तेषु: at those who are attacked, दैवेन: by fate, प्रहतेषुच: those who are struck, परीक्ष्य: examine, विधिना: according to prescribed method, कृताः one who performed deeds, विक्रमाः of heroic valour, सिध्यन्ति: will succeed.

data.v: अप्रमत्तं कथं तं तु विजिगीषुं बले स्थितम् । जितरोषं दुराधर्षं प्रधर्षयितुमिच्छथ ॥
data.es: "How do you wish to overpower, him who is very attentive, bent on victory, mighty, steadfast, has subdued anger and unassailable?"
data.anv: अप्रमत्तम् very attentive, विजिगीषुम् bent on victory, बले: mighty, स्थितम् steadfast,जितरोषम् subdued anger, दुराधर्षम् unassailable, तम् him, कथम् how, प्रधर्षयितुम् to overpower, इच्छथ: desire.

data.v: समुद्रं लङ्घयित्वा तु घोरं नदनदीपतिम् । कृतं हनुमता कर्म दुष्करं तर्कयेत कः ॥
data.es: "Hanuman has crossed over the ocean, a Lord of streams and rivers and arrived. Who can ever know or think of such a task in this world?"
data.anv: नदनदीपतिम् Lord of streams and rivers, घोरम् terrific, समुद्रम् ocean, लङ्घयित्वा: crossed over, हनुमतः Hanuman, गतिम् arrived at, लोके: in the world, कः who can ever, विद्यात् can know, तर्कयेतवा: or think of.

data.v: बलान्यपरिमेयानि वीर्याणि च निशाचराः । परेषां सहसावज्ञा न कर्तव्या कथंचन ॥
data.es: "Enemy's strength and valour is inestimable to relate. Do not disregard rashly, O Night ranger"
data.anv: निशाचराः night ranger, परेषाम् enemy's, बलानि: strength, वीर्याणिच: and valour, अपरिमेयानि: inestimable, कथञ्चन: to relate, सहसा: rashly, अवज्ञा: to disregard, नकर्तव्या: not do.

data.v: किं च राक्षसराजस्य रामेणापकृतं पुरा । आजहार जनस्थानाद्यस्य भार्यां यशस्विनः ॥
data.es: "What offence did Rama do earlier to the Rakshasa king that he abducted the glorious wife of Rama from Janasthana?"
data.anv: यशस्विनः glorious, यस्य: his, भार्याम् wife, जनस्थानात् from Janasthana, आजहार: abducted, रामेण: Rama's, पुरा: earlier, राक्षसराजस्य: to the Rakshasa king, किम् why, अपकृतम् offence.

data.v: खरो यद्यतिवृत्तस्तु रामेण निहतो रणे । अवश्यं प्राणिनां प्राणा रक्षितव्या यथा बलम् ॥
data.es: "(It is true) Khara was killed by Rama in war as he acted beyond his limit. Certainly, living beings will have to protect their life with their own strength."
data.anv: अतिवृत्तः acted beyond his limit, खरः Khara, रणे: in war, रामेण: by Rama, हतःयदि has been killed also, प्राणिना: by living beings, यथाबलम् their own strength, प्राणाः life, अवश्यम् certainly, रक्षितव्याः will have to protect.

data.v: एतन्निमित्तं वैदेही भयं नः सुमहद्भवेत् । आहृता सा परित्याज्या कलहार्थे कृते न किम् ॥
data.es: "On account of this, we have a great fear of Vaidehi. She, who was brought here, is to be given away. What is the use of doing anything, which may be the cause of strife?"
data.anv: एतन्निमित्तम् on account of this reason, नः to us, सुमहत् great, वैदेहीभयम् fear from Vaidehi, भवेत् will have, आहृता: brought, सा: that, परित्याज्या: given away, कलहार्थे: cause of strife, कृतेन: by doing so, किम् why.

data.v: न नः क्षमं वीर्यवता तेन धर्मानुवर्तिना । वैरं निरर्थकं कर्तुं दीयतामस्य मैथिली ॥
data.es: "To have enmity with a valorous one, a follower of dharma, is useless and not good for us. Give away Mythili to him (Rama)."
data.anv: वीर्यवता: valorous one, धर्मानुवर्तिना: follower of dharma, तेन: his, निरर्थकम् useless, वैरम् enmity, कर्तुम् to have, नतुक्षमम् not good for us, मैथिली: Mythili, अस्य: to him, दीयताम् give away.

data.v: यावन्न सगजां साश्वां बहुरत्नसमाकुलाम् । पुरीं दारयते बाणैर्दीयतामस्य मैथिली ॥
data.es: "Before Rama comes with elephants and horses and tears with his arrows, this Lanka filled with abundance of gems, give away Mythili."
data.anv: सगजाम् with elephants, साश्वम् horses, बहुरत्नसमाकुलाम् filled with many gems, पुरीम् city, बाणैः arrows, यावत् all over, नदारयते: before tearing, अस्य: his, मैथिली: Mythili, दीयताम् will give.

data.v: यावत्सुघोरा महती दुर्धर्षा हरिवाहिनी । नावस्कन्दति नो लङ्कां तावत्सीता प्रदीयताम् ॥
data.es: "Lest the highly dreadful, formidable and huge Vanara troops surround all over Lanka. Give away Sita."
data.anv: सुघोरा: highly dreadful, दुर्धर्षा: formidable, महती: huge, हरिवाहिनी: Vanara troops, यावत् total, नः lest, लङ्काम् Lanka, नावस्कन्दति: surrounds, तावत् before doing anything, सीता: Sita, प्रदीयताम् give away.

data.v: विनश्येद्धि पुरी लङ्का शूराः सर्वे च राक्षसाः । रामस्य दयिता पत्नी न स्वयं यदि दीयते ॥
data.es: "If Rama's dear wife is not given, this Lanka will be destroyed and also all Rakshasas."
data.anv: रामस्य: Rama's, दयिता: dear, स्वयम् his own, पत्नी: wife, नदीयतेयदि: if not given, चलङ्कापुरी: and this Lanka, विनश्येत् हि: will be destroyed, सर्वे: all, राक्षसाश्च: Rakshasas also.

data.v: प्रसादये त्वां बन्धुत्वात्कुरुष्व वचनं मम । हितं पथ्यं त्वहं ब्रूमि दीयतामस्य मैथिली ॥
data.es: "I am requesting you because you are my relation (brother). Do as I said, as I am telling you for your welfare. Give away Sita."
data.anv: बन्धुत्वात् relation, त्वाम् your, प्रसादये: requesting you, मम: my, वचनम् words, कुरुष्य: do as I say, अहम् I, हितम् welfare, तथ्यंतु: for your, ब्रूमि: telling, अस्य: his, मैथिली: Mythili, दीयताम् give away.

data.v: पुरा शरत्सूर्यमरीचिसंनिभा;न्नवाग्रपुङ्खान्सुदृढान्नृपात्मजः । सृजत्यमोघान्विशिखान्वधाय ते; प्रदीयतां दाशरथाय मैथिली ॥
data.es: "You may restore Rama's Mythili, before the emperor Dasaratha's son sends forth solid unfailing arrows shining like autumnal Sun provided with fresh heads and shafts for killing you."
data.anv: नृपात्मजः son of emperor, शरत्सूर्यमरीचिसन्निभान् shining like the autumnal Sun, नवाग्रपुङ्खान् provided with fresh heads and shafts, सुदृढान् solid, आमोघान् unfailing, विशिखान् arrows, ते for your, वधाय: killing, पुरा: before, सृजति: sends forth, मैथिली: Mythili, दाशरथाय: son of Dasaratha, प्रदीयताम् you may restore.

data.v: त्यजस्व कोपं सुखधर्मनाशनं; भजस्व धर्मं रतिकीर्तिवर्धनम् । प्रसीद जीवेम सपुत्रबान्धवाः; प्रदीयतां दाशरथाय मैथिली ॥
data.es: "Give up that happiness and anger which destroys virtues. Seek pleasures that enhance fame. Be pacified. Live happily with sons and relatives restoring Mythili to Rama, the son of Dasaratha."
data.anv: सुखधर्मनाशनम् happiness will destroy virtues, कोपम् anger, आशु: that, त्यज: give up, रतिकीर्तिवर्धनम् pleasures that enhance fame, धर्मम् righteousness, भजस्व: seek, प्रसीद: pacified, सपुत्रबान्धवाः with sons and relatives, जीवेम: live, मैथिली: Mythili, दाशरथाय: Dasaratha's son Rama's, प्रदीयताम् restore.

data.v: सुनिविष्टं हितं वाक्यमुक्तवन्तं विभीषणम् । अब्रवीत्परुषं वाक्यं रावणः कालचोदितः ॥
data.es: While Vibheeshana advised in Ravana's favour with all good intention, Ravana who was under the influence of death spoke harsh words.
data.anv: सुनिविष्टम् with good intention, हितम् favourable, वाक्यम् words, उक्तवन्तम् that were spoken by, विभीषणं: Vibheeshana, रावणः Ravana, कालचोदितः influenced by death, परुषम् harsh, वाक्यम् words, आब्रवीत् spoke.

data.v: वसेत्सह सपत्नेन क्रुद्धेनाशीविषेण वा । न तु मित्रप्रवादेन संवसेच्छत्रुसेविना ॥
data.es: "One can live with a known enemy or even with an angry and venomous serpent but cannot stay together with one who professes to be a friend and devoted to an enemy."
data.anv: सपत्नेनसह: with known enemy, वसेत् can live with, कृद्धेन: angry, अशीविषेणच: even with venomous serpent, मित्रप्रवादेन: professing to be a friend, शत्रुणासहतु: devoted to enemy, नसंवसेत् cannot stay together.

data.v: जानामि शीलं ज्ञातीनां सर्वलोकेषु राक्षस । हृष्यन्ति व्यसनेष्वेते ज्ञातीनां ज्ञातयः सदा ॥
data.es: "The behaviour of close relatives in all worlds is known to me. They are happy at the difficulties of relatives."
data.anv: राक्षस: O Rakshasa, सर्वलोकेषु: in all the worlds, ज्ञातीनाम् of close relatives, शीलम् behaviour, जानामि: is known to me, एते these, ज्ञातयः relatives, सदा: always, ज्ञातीनाम् of relatives, व्यसनेषु: when in difficulty, हृष्यन्ति: are happy.

data.v: प्रधानं साधकं वैद्यं धर्मशीलं च राक्षस । ज्ञातयो ह्यवमन्यन्ते शूरं परिभवन्ति च ॥
data.es: "O Rakshasa Relatives will insult and disapprove their chief even if he is an accomplished one, a virtuous one or a heroic one and does his duty (as a ruler)."
data.anv: राक्षस: Rakshasa, ज्ञातयः relatives, प्रथानम् chief, साधकम् accomplished वैद्यम्: learned ones, धर्मशीलंच: and one who is virtuous, शूरम् heroic ones, अवमन्यस्तेहि: will disapprove, परिभवन्तिच: will disrespect.

data.v: नित्यमन्योन्यसंहृष्टा व्यसनेष्वाततायिनः । प्रच्छन्नहृदया घोरा ज्ञातयस्तु भयावहाः ॥
data.es: "Pretending to be friendly forever the relatives rejoice in them is fortunes of their relatives. They create terrible fear like desperadoes and covertly ones."
data.anv: व्यसनेषु: in misfortunes, नित्यम् forever, अन्योन्यसम्हृष्टाः rejoice pretending to be friendly, आततायिनः a desperado, प्रच्छन्नहृदयाः a covertly person, घोरा: terrible, ज्ञातियः relatives, भयावहाः create fear.

data.v: श्रूयन्ते हस्तिभिर्गीताः श्लोकाः पद्मवने क्वचित् । पाशहस्तान्नरान्दृष्ट्वा शृणु तान्गदतो मम ॥
data.es: "In the past elephants in the lotus park, uttered some verses on seeing men holding snares in hand. I will relate those that I heard. You may listen."
data.anv: पुरा: in the past, पद्मवने: in the lotus park, पाशहस्तान् one holding the snares, नरान् men in hand, दृष्ट्वा: seeing, हस्तिभिः even elephants, गीताः uttered, श्लोकाः verses, श्रूयन्ते: heard of, गदतः relate, मम: to me, शृणु: listen.

data.v: नाग्निर्नान्यानि शस्त्राणि न नः पाशा भयावहाः । घोराः स्वार्थप्रयुक्तास्तु ज्ञातयो नो भयावहाः ॥
data.es: "We have no fear of fire or weapons or noose of death. Selfish relatives are causing fear in us."
data.anv: अग्नि: fire, न: no, अन्यानि: others, शस्त्राणि: weapons, न: no, पाशाः noose, भयावहाः fear, न: no, घोराः terrific, स्वार्थप्रयुक्ताः one who is selfish, ज्ञातयः close relatives, नः for us, भयावहाः causing fear.

data.v: उपायमेते वक्ष्यन्ति ग्रहणे नात्र संशयः । कृत्स्नाद्भयाज्ज्ञातिभयं सुकष्टं विदितं च नः ॥
data.es: "It is known that they (paternal relatives) teach the means to catch us. Out of all fears the fear of close relatives is the great difficulty for us."
data.anv: एते: they, ग्रहणे: to catch, उपायम् means, वक्ष्यन्ति: teach, कृत्स्ना: great, भयात् fear, ज्ञातिभयम् fear of paternal relatives, नः for us, सुकष्टम् very difficult, विदितम् is known.

data.v: विद्यते गोषु संपन्नं विद्यते ब्राह्मणे दमः । विद्यते स्त्रीषु चापल्यं विद्यते ज्ञातितो भयम् ॥
data.es: "In the cows' wealth is present, in the brahmins forbearance is seen, in the women capriciousness exists but in close relatives fear is present."
data.anv: गोषु: in cows, सम्पन्नम् wealth, विद्यते: is present, ज्ञातितः in close relatives, भयम् fear, विद्यते: is seen, स्त्रीषु: in women, चापल्यम् capriciousness, विद्यते: is present, ब्राह्मणे: in brahmins, दमः forbearance, विद्यते: is present.

data.v: ततो नेष्टमिदं सौम्य यदहं लोकसत्कृतः । ऐश्वर्यमभिजातश्च रिपूणां मूर्ध्नि च स्थितः ॥
data.es: "Gentle (Vibheeshana) one Since you belong to the same kinsfolk (as I) you do not like me, who is born of noble descent, attained the position of chief (of clan), is worshipped by the world, and attained sovereignty."
data.anv: सौम्य: gentle, ततः therefore, अहम् I, लोकसत्कृतः worshipped by the people, ऐश्वर्यम् sovereignty, अभिजातःच: born of noble descent, ज्ञातीनाम् of the clan, मूध्नर्य: chief, अवस्थित: attained, इदम् this, नइष्टम् not like.

data.v: अन्यस्त्वेवंविधं ब्रूयाद्वाक्यमेतन्निशाचर । अस्मिन्मुहूर्ते न भवेत्त्वां तु धिक्कुलपांसनम् ॥
data.es: "O Night ranger (Vibheeshana) If any other one had spoken such words, I would not let him live this moment and also destroy. Fie upon you."
data.anv: निशाचर: night ranger, अन्यः others, यः whoever, एवंविधम् this kind of, एतत् in this way, वाक्यम् words, ब्रूयात् had spoken, अस्मिन् him, मुहूर्तेनभवेत् will not let him live this moment, कुलपांसनम् to destroy, त्वांतु: you also, धिक् fie.

data.v: इत्युक्तः परुषं वाक्यं न्यायवादी विभीषणः । उत्पपात गदापाणिश्चतुर्भिः सह राक्षसैः ॥
data.es: Vibheeshana who was just in his argument rose up, wielding mace in hand accompanied by the four Rakshasas, when Ravana had spoken such harsh words to him.
data.anv: इति: this, परुषम् harsh, वाक्यम् words, उक्तः having spoken, न्यायवादी: one who is just in argument, विभीषणः Vibheeshana, गदापाणिः wielding the mace, चतुर्भिः with four, राक्षसैःसह: accompanied by Rakshasas, उत्पपात: rose up.

data.v: अब्रवीच्च तदा वाक्यं जातक्रोधो विभीषणः । अन्तरिक्षगतः श्रीमान्भ्रातरं राक्षसाधिपम् ॥
data.es: Great Vibheeshana was enraged. Then going up into the sky spoke these words to his brother, the Lord of Rakshasas.
data.anv: जातक्रोधः enraged, श्रीमान् prosperous, विभीषणः Vibheeshana, अन्तरिक्षगतः going into the sky, तदा: then, भ्रातरम् brother, राक्षसाधिपम् Lord of Rakshasas, अब्रवीच्च spoke.

data.v: स त्वं भ्रातासि मे राजन्ब्रूहि मां यद्यदिच्छसि । इदं तु परुषं वाक्यं न क्षमाम्यनृतं तव ॥
data.es: "O King You, being my elder brother, you may tell me What you wish. You are equal to father being elder brother and are to be honoured. But you have not followed the righteous path. The words you spoke are not pardonable."
data.anv: राजन् O King, सःत्वम् that you, मे: my, भ्राता: brother, असि: being so, यद्यत् that which, इच्छसि: wish, माम् to me, ब्रूहि: to tell, ज्येष्ठः elder, पितृसमः equal to the father, धर्मपथे: righteous path, नचस्थितः not followed, मान्यः honour, आग्रजस्य: to elder brother, ते: to you, इदम् thus, वाक्यं: words तु: to you नक्षमामि: not pardonable.

data.v: सुनीतं हितकामेन वाक्यमुक्तं दशानन । न गृह्णन्त्यकृतात्मानः कालस्य वशमागताः ॥
data.es: "O Tenheaded king Fallen under the sway of death, you are foolish. You do not understand the well prepared good words spoken by me wishing your welfare."
data.anv: दशानन: tenheaded one, कालस्य: of death, वशम् under the sway, आगताः fallen, अकृतात्मानः foolish one, हितकामेन: wishing your welfare, उक्तम् spoken, सुनीतम् well prepared, हितम् good, वाक्यम् words, नगृह्णन्ति: not understand.

data.v: सुलभाः पुरुषा राजन्सततं प्रियवादिनः । अप्रियस्य तु पथ्यस्य वक्ता श्रोता च दुर्लभः ॥
data.es: "O King Those who speak pleasingly are always easier to find than those who speak unpleasant but good words. Listeners of unpleasant words (though good) are difficult (to find)."
data.anv: राजन् O king, सततम् always, प्रियवादिनः who speak pleasingly, पुरुषाः men, सुलभाः are easily found, अप्रियस्य: that which is unpleasant, पथ्यस्य: good words, वक्ता: speaker, श्रोताच: listener also, दुर्लभः difficult.

data.v: बद्धं कालस्य पाशेन सर्वभूतापहारिणा । न नश्यन्तमुपेक्षेयं प्रदीप्तं शरणं यथा ॥
data.es: "Bound by the noose of death which is the cause of destruction of all beings you are going to be killed just as the burning house if you ignore my advice."
data.anv: सर्वभूतापहारिणा: one who is cause for destruction of all beings, कालस्य: at death, पाशेन: by the noose, बद्दम् bound, नश्यन्तम् getting killed, त्वाम् you, प्रदीप्तम् blazing, शरणंयथा: house, नउपेक्षे: do not ignore.

data.v: दीप्तपावकसंकाशैः शितैः काञ्चनभूषणैः । न त्वामिच्छाम्यहं द्रष्टुं रामेण निहतं शरैः ॥
data.es: "While the sharp golden arrows of Rama burning like fire strike you, I do not wish to see."
data.anv: रामःRama, समाहितःsteadily, दीप्तपावकसङ्काशैः shining like glowing fire, काञ्चनभूषणैः covered with gold, शरैःshafts, रणे in battle, दशग्रीवम् Ravana, अभ्यवर्षत् covered

data.v: शूराश्च बलवन्तश्च कृतास्त्राश्च रणाजिरे । कालाभिपन्ना सीदन्ति यथा वालुकसेतवः ॥
data.es: "Even the heroic archers and mighty men wielding weapons will fall in war seized by death like the dams of sands."
data.anv: रणाजिरे: in war, शूराः heroic archers, बलवन्तश्च: and mighty, कृतास्त्राश्च: those wielding arrows, नराः humans, कालाभिपन्नाः seized by death, वालुकसेतवयथा: just as the dams of sand, सीदन्ति: will fall.

data.v: आत्मानं सर्वथा रक्ष पुरीं चेमां सराक्षसाम् । स्वस्ति तेऽस्तु गमिष्यामि सुखी भव मया विना ॥
data.es: "Since you are an elderly one, I desired to tender good advice and spoke these words. I may be excused. You protect all these Rakshasas, this capital city and yourself after I depart. Let you be auspicious and be happy."
data.anv: गुरुत्वात् as you are an elderly one, हितम् good advice, इच्छता: wished, यत् such, उक्तम् words spoken, तत् that, मर्षयतु: I may be excused, आत्मानम् yourself, सराक्षसाम् these Rakshasas, इमाम् this, पुरींच: capital city, सर्वथा: all, रक्षते: you protect, स्वस्ति: let you be auspicious, अस्तु: you be, गमिष्यामि: I will depart, मयाविना: without me, सुखीभव: let you be happy.

data.v: निवार्यमाणस्य मया हितैषिणा; न रोचते ते वचनं निशाचर । परीतकाला हि गतायुषो नरा; हितं न गृह्णन्ति सुहृद्भिरीरितम् ॥
data.es: "O King My words (of advice), given in your interest to prevent you, are not palatable to you. Good advice tendered by friends at the time of death will not be received by those beings whose life is over."॥इत्यार्षेवाल्मीकीयेश्रीमद्रामायणेआदिकाव्येयुद्धकाण्डेषोडशस्सर्गः॥This is the end of the sixteenth sarga of Yuddha Kanda of the first epic the holy Ramayana composed by sage Valmiki.
data.anv: निशाचर: night ranger, हितैषिणा: in your interest, मया: by me, निवार्यमाणस्य: preventing you, ते: to you, वचनम् my words, नरोचते: not palatable, परीतकालाहि: at the time of death, गतायुषः those whose life is over, नराः beings, गतायुषः whose life is over, सुहृद्भि: friends, ईरितम् tendering, हितम् good advice, नगृह्णन्तिहि: will not receive.

data.v: इत्युक्त्वा परुषं वाक्यं रावणं रावणानुजः । आजगाम मुहूर्तेन यत्र रामः सलक्ष्मणः ॥
data.es: Vibheeshana, having addressed Ravana in harsh language, reached Rama and Lakshmana in a short while.
data.anv: रावणानुजः Ravana's brother, Vibheeshana, रावणम् to Ravana, इति: thus, परुषम् in harsh, वाक्यम् language, उक्त्वा: said, सलक्ष्मणः with Lakshmana, रामः Rama, यत्र: there, मुहूर्तेन: in a short while, आजगाम: reached.

data.v: तं मेरुशिखराकारं दीप्तामिव शतह्रदाम् । गगनस्थं महीस्थास्ते ददृशुर्वानराधिपाः ॥
data.es: All the Vanaras on the ground saw Vibheeshana who was like Mount Meru in form and shining like a brilliant lightning.
data.anv: महीस्थाः on the ground, सर्ववानराः all Vanaras, मेरुशिखराकारम् like the Mount Meru in form, दीप्ताम् shining, शतह्रदाम् इव: like a brilliant lightning, गगनस्थम् in the sky, तम् him, ददृशुः saw.

data.v: तमात्मपञ्चमं दृष्ट्वा सुग्रीवो वानराधिपः । वानरैः सह दुर्धर्षश्चिन्तयामास बुद्धिमान् ॥
data.es: Wise Sugriva the Lord of the Vanara army, a formidable one along with Vanaras, started thinking on seeing Vibheeshana (the fifth one) besides four others.
data.anv: दुर्धर्षः formidable one, बुद्धिमान् wise one, वाहिनीपति: Lord of the Vanara army, सुग्रीवः Sugriva, आत्मपञ्चमम् the fifth one besides four others, तम् him, दृष्टवा: on seeing, वानरैःसह: along with Vanaras चिन्तयामास: started thinking.

data.v: चिन्तयित्वा मुहूर्तं तु वानरांस्तानुवाच ह । हनूमत्प्रमुखान्सर्वानिदं वचनमुत्तमम् ॥
data.es: Reflecting for a while he addressed Hanuman and the other Vanara leaders in this way.
data.anv: मुहूर्तम् for a while, चिन्तयित्वा: reflecting, हनुमत् प्रमुखान् leader Hanuman, तान् those, सर्वान् all, वानरान् Vanaras, उत्तमम् best, इदम् these, वचनम् words, उवाचह: addressed.

data.v: एष सर्वायुधोपेतश्चतुर्भिः सह राक्षसैः । राक्षसोऽभ्येति पश्यध्वमस्मान्हन्तुं न संशयः ॥
data.es: Armed with all kinds of weapons this Rakshasa along with four Rakshasas are coming near to attack. You may see. There is no doubt.
data.anv: सर्वायुधोपेतः armed with all kinds of weapons, एषःराक्षसः this Rakshasa, चतुर्भिराक्षसैःसह: along with four Rakshasas, अभ्येति: coming near, पश्यध्वम् you may see, अस्मान् us, हन्तुम् to attack, संशयः doubt, नः no.

data.v: सुग्रीवस्य वचः श्रुत्वा सर्वे ते वानरोत्तमाः । सालानुद्यम्य शैलांश्च इदं वचनमब्रुवन् ॥
data.es: Having heard Sugriva's words, all the Vanara leaders taking up Sala trees and boulders uttered these words.
data.anv: सर्वे: all, तेवानरोत्तमाः those Vanara leaders, सुग्रीवस्य: Sugriva's, वचः words, श्रुत्वा: having heard, सालान् Sala trees, शैलांश्च: boulders, उद्यम्य: taking up, इदम् these, वचनम् words, अब्रुवन् uttered.

data.v: शीघ्रं व्यादिश नो राजन्वधायैषां दुरात्मनाम् । निपतन्तु हताश्चैते धरण्यामल्पजीविताः ॥
data.es: "O King Order us to kill these evil minded ones at once. Being mortals and of short life, on striking, all of them will fall down dead on the ground."
data.anv: राजन् O king दुरात्मनाम् evil minded, एषाम् these, वधाय: to kill, शीघ्रम् quickly, व्यादिश: order, अल्पतेजसा: being short of life, हता: killed, धरण्याम  on the ground, निपतन्तु: will fall down.

data.v: तेषां संभाषमाणानामन्योन्यं स विभीषणः । उत्तरं तीरमासाद्य खस्थ एव व्यतिष्ठत ॥
data.es: As they (Vanaras) started conversing, Vibheeshana, having reached the northern shore, stayed in the sky.
data.anv: विभीषणः Vibheeshana, उत्तरम् northern, तीरम् shore, आसाद्य: having reached तेषाम् there, अन्योन्यम् one to the other, सम्भाषमाणानाम् started conversing, खस्थःएव: in the sky, व्यतिष्ठत: stayed.

data.v: उवाच च महाप्राज्ञः स्वरेण महता महान् । सुग्रीवं तांश्च संप्रेक्ष्य खस्थ एव विभीषणः ॥
data.es: Great and very wise Vibheeshana, gazing at Sugriva and the Vanaras, addressed them in a loud tone.
data.anv: महाप्राज्ञः very wise, महान् great, विभीषणः Vibheeshana, सुग्रीवम् at Sugriva, तांश्च: and those (Vanaras ), सम्प्रेक्ष्य: gazing, सर्वान् all, महता: loud, स्वरेण: tone, उवाच: addressed.

data.v: रावणो नाम दुर्वृत्तो राक्षसो राक्षसेश्वरः । तस्याहमनुजो भ्राता विभीषण इति श्रुतः ॥
data.es: "I am called Vibheeshana, the younger brother of Ravana, the king of Rakshasas and of evil conduct."
data.anv: रावणोनाम: Ravana by name, दुर्वृत्तः of evil conduct, राक्षसेश्वरः king of Rakshasas, राक्षसः Rakshasa, अहम् I, तस्य: his, अनुजःभ्राता: younger brother, विभीषणइति: as Vibheeshana, श्रुतः called.

data.v: तेन सीता जनस्थानाद्धृता हत्वा जटायुषम् । रुद्ध्वा च विवशा दीना राक्षसीभिः सुरक्षिता ॥
data.es: "Having been carried away from Janasthana by him (Ravana) poor and pitiable Sita is detained and protected by the Rakshasas."
data.anv: तेन: by him, जटायुषम् Jatayu, हत्वा: killing, सीता: Sita, जनस्थानात् from Janasthana, हृता: having been carried away, रुद्दा: detained, विवशा: poor, दीना: pitiable, राक्षसीभिः by Rakshasas, सुरक्षिता: protected.

data.v: तमहं हेतुभिर्वाक्यैर्विविधैश्च न्यदर्शयम् । साधु निर्यात्यतां सीता रामायेति पुनः पुनः ॥
data.es: "I argued with him again and again in several ways to explain him and admonished him saying 'restore Sita to Rama'."
data.anv: सीता: Sita, साधु: correct, रामाय: to Rama, निर्यात्यताम् इति: to restore, पुनःपुनः again and again, तम् him, अहम् I, हेतुभिः argued also, विविधैः in several ways, वाक्यैः words, न्यदर्शयम् to explain.

data.v: स च न प्रतिजग्राह रावणः कालचोदितः । उच्यमानो हितं वाक्यं विपरीत इवौषधम् ॥
data.es: "Impelled by death Ravana would not take good words of advice tendered to him just as one who is impelled by death does not take medicine."
data.anv: सःरावणः that Ravana, कालचोदितः impelled by death, उच्यमानम् advice tendered, हितम् good, वाक्यम् words, विपरीतः contrary to, औषधम् इव: like the medicine, नप्रतिजग्राह: would not take.

data.v: सोऽहं परुषितस्तेन दासवच्चावमानितः । त्यक्त्वा पुत्रांश्च दारांश्च राघवं शरणं गतः ॥
data.es: "Leaving my sons and wife, I have come for protection of Raghava having been put to shame by him (Ravana), spoken to harshly and treated like a slave."
data.anv: तेन: by him, परुषितः spoken to harshly, दासवत् treated like a slave, अवमानितः having been put to shame, सःअहम् that I, पुत्रांश्चदारांश्च: sons and wife, त्वक्त्वा: giving up, राघवम् of Raghava, शरणंगतः came for protection.

data.v: सर्वलोकशरण्याय राघवाय महात्मने । निवेदयत मां क्षिप्रं विभीषणमुपस्थितम् ॥
data.es: At once you may inform Raghava who is a protector of the whole world that I, Vibheeshana, are waiting here.
data.anv: महात्मने: O great soul, सर्वलोकशरण्याय: one who is a protector of the whole world, राघवाय: Raghava's, विभीषणं: Vibheeshana, माम् I, उपस्थितम् waiting here, क्षिप्रम् at once, निवेदयत: you may inform.

data.v: एतत्तु वचनं श्रुत्वा सुग्रीवो लघुविक्रमः । लक्ष्मणस्याग्रतो रामं संरब्धमिदमब्रवीत् ॥
data.es: Highly valiant Sugriva having heard all this (from Vibheeshana) eagerly spoke these words to Rama in the presence of Lakshmana.
data.anv: लघुविक्रमः highly valiant, सुग्रीवः Sugriva, एतत् all this, वचनम् words, श्रुत्वा: having heard, लक्ष्मणस्य: Lakshmana's, अग्रतः presence, रामम् Rama's, सम्रब्धतरम् eagerly, इदम् these words, अब्रवीत् spoken.

data.v: रावणस्यानुजो भ्राता विभीषण इति श्रुतः । चतुर्भिः सह रक्षोभिर्भवन्तं शरणं गतः ॥
data.es: "Ravana's younger brother, known as Vibheeshana, along with four Rakshasas has come to you seeking protection."
data.anv: विभीषणःइति: thus Vibheeshana, श्रुतः heard, रावणस्य: Ravana's, अनुजःभ्रातः younger brother, चतुर्भिः all the four, रक्षोभिःसह: along with Rakshasas, भवन्तम्: to you शरणम् protection, गतः sought.

data.v: रावणेन प्रणिहितं तमवेहि विभीषणम् । तस्याहं निग्रहं मन्ये क्षमं क्षमवतां वर ॥
data.es: "O Rama of most forbearing nature Vibheeshana is sent by Ravana. You may consider that he is fit to be arrested, I think."
data.anv: क्षमवताम् one who is forbearing, वर: choicest one, तम् him, विभीषणम् Vibheeshana, रावणेन: by Ravana, प्रणितम् sent by, अवेहि: to consider, तस्य: his, निग्रहम् arrest क्षमम् fit, अहम् I, मन्ये: think.

data.v: राक्षसो जिह्मया बुद्ध्या संदिष्टोऽयमुपस्थितः । प्रहर्तुं मायया छन्नो विश्वस्ते त्वयि राघव ॥
data.es: "O Raghava You may know that this Rakshasa is being sent here by deceit ever intending to strike you under the cover of creating confidence."
data.anv: राघव: Raghava, अयम्: this, राक्षसः Rakshasa, जिह्मया: with a crooked, बुदद्या: you may know, संदिष्ट: being send, मायया: by deceit, छन्नः under the cover, विश्वस्ते: creating confidence, त्वयि: to you, प्रहर्तुम् to strike you, इह: here, आगतः came.

data.v: बध्यतामेष तीव्रेण दण्डेन सचिवैः सह । रावणस्य नृशंसस्य भ्राता ह्येष विभीषणः ॥
data.es: "Let us kill this Vibheeshana by punishment along with his ministers as he is the brother of cruel Ravana (said Sugriva to Rama)."
data.anv: एषः that way, सचिवैः with ministers, तीव्रेण: severe, दण्डेन: by punishment, वध्यताम् will kill, एषःविभीषणः this Vibheeshana, नृशंसस्य: cruel, रावणस्यभ्राताहि: is Ravana's brother.

data.v: एवमुक्त्वा तु तं रामं संरब्धो वाहिनीपतिः । वाक्यज्ञो वाक्यकुशलं ततो मौनमुपागमत् ॥
data.es: The chief of the army (Sugriva) who knew how to speak appropriately having submitted in that manner to Rama who was adept in expression remained silent.
data.anv: वाहिनीपतिः the chief of the army, वाक्यज्ञः one who knows to speak, सम्रब्ध: well, वाक्यकुशलम् one who was adept in expression, तंरामम् him, to Rama, एवम् in that manner, उक्त्वा: after having spoken, ततः then, मौनम् silent, उपागमत् remained.

data.v: सुग्रीवस्य तु तद्वाक्यं श्रुत्वा रामो महाबलः । समीपस्थानुवाचेदं हनूमत्प्रमुखान्हरीन् ॥
data.es: Rama of great fame having heard the words of Sugriva, addressed the Vanara army including the great Hanuman who stood close by.
data.anv: महायशाः of great fame, रामः Rama, सुग्रीवस्य: Sugriva's, तत् those words, श्रुत्वा: having heard, समीपस्थान् stood close by, हनुमत्प्रमुखान् including the great Hanuman, हरीन् to Vanaras, इदम् thus, उवाच: addressed.

data.v: यदुक्तं कपिराजेन रावणावरजं प्रति । वाक्यं हेतुमदत्यर्थं भवद्भिरपि तच्छ्रुतम् ॥
data.es: "The highly reasonable words of advice given by the king of Vanaras about Ravana's brother was heard even by you."
data.anv: रावणावरजंप्रति: about Ravana's brother, कपिराजेन: by the king of Vanaras, अत्यर्थम् highly reasonable, हेतुमत् words of reason, यत् those, वाक्यम् words, उक्तम् having spoken, भवद्भिरपि: even by you, श्रुतम् has been heard.

data.v: सुहृदा ह्यर्थकृच्छेषु युक्तं बुद्धिमता सता । समर्थेनापि संदेष्टुं शाश्वतीं भूतिमिच्छता ॥
data.es: "It is always desirable to seek everlasting advice for one's welfare from capable and wise ones by the near and dear ones. It is proper to seek advice on complex matters by one who is in a difficult situation."
data.anv: शाश्वतीम् everlasting, भूतिम् welfare, इच्छता: desirable, समर्थेन: capable, बुद्धिमता: wise one, सदा: ever, सुहृदाम् to near and dear ones, अर्थकृच्छ्रेषु: in difficult situation on complex matter, निर्देष्टुम्: to express, युक्तम् is proper.

data.v: इत्येवं परिपृष्टास्ते स्वं स्वं मतमतन्द्रिताः । सोपचारं तदा राममूचुर्हितचिकीर्षवः ॥
data.es: The Vanaras having heard the words spoken by Rama in that way, tendered beneficial advice and their own opinion respectfully, to be vigilant.
data.anv: तदा: then, इत्येवम् in this manner, परिपृष्टाः having told, ते: you, अतन्द्रिताः vigilant, हितचिकीर्षवः beneficial advice, सोपचारम् respectfully an end, स्वंस्वम् one's own, मतम् opinion, राम् Rama, ऊचुः spoke.

data.v: अज्ञातं नास्ति ते किंचित्त्रिषु लोकेषु राघव । आत्मानं पूजयन्राम पृच्छस्यस्मान्सुहृत्तया ॥
data.es: "O Raghava there is nothing unknown to you in the three worlds. You are asking our opinion (giving us the honour) out of friendship."
data.anv: राघव: Raghava, त्रिषु: in the three, लोकेषु: worlds, ते: to you, अज्ञातम् that which, किंचित् nothing, नास्ति: is not there, आत्मानम् you yourself, सूचयन् to give our opinion, पृच्छसि: ask, अस्मान: to us, सुह्रत्तया: out of friendship.

data.v: त्वं हि सत्यव्रतः शूरो धार्मिको दृढविक्रमः । परीक्ष्य कारा स्मृतिमान्निसृष्टात्मा सुहृत्सु च ॥
data.es: "You are a truthful follower of vows, a heroic and righteous one. You are firm in your resolve, capable of good judgment, have a good memory of the past traditions and committed in heart to your friends."
data.anv: त्वम् you, सत्यव्रतः one who follows vows truthfully, शूरः heroic, धार्मिकः one who is righteous, दृढविक्रमः firm in resolve, परीक्ष्यकारी: one who is capable of good judgment, स्मृतिमान् one who has good memory of laws of the past, सुहृत्सु: to your friends, निसृष्टात्माच: and committed in heart.

data.v: तस्मादेकैकशस्तावद्ब्रुवन्तु सचिवास्तव । हेतुतो मतिसंपन्नाः समर्थाश्च पुनः पुनः ॥
data.es: "On account of that reason, since your ministers are richly endowed with intelligence let them speak out again and again, one after the other in that way."
data.anv: तस्मात् for that reason, मतिसम्पन्नाः richly endowed with intelligence, समर्थाश्च: capable also, पुनःपुनः again and again, तवसचिवाः your ministers, एकैकशः one after another, हेतुतः with reason, ब्रुवन्तु: speak out, तावत् like that.

data.v: इत्युक्ते राघवायाथ मतिमानङ्गदोऽग्रतः । विभीषणपरीक्षार्थमुवाच वचनं हरिः ॥
data.es: Having said so, Angada the intelligent Vanara spoke these words immediately to Rama for judging Vibheeshana.
data.anv: इति: so, उक्ते: having said, अथ: then, हरिः Vanara, मतिमान् intelligent, अङ्गदः Angada, राघवाय: to Rama, अग्रतः immediately, विभीषणपरीक्षार्थम् for the sake of judging Vibheeshana, वचनम् these words, उवाच: spoken.

data.v: शत्रोः सकाशात्संप्राप्तः सर्वथा शङ्क्य एव हि । विश्वासयोग्यः सहसा न कर्तव्यो विभीषणः ॥
data.es: "Since he has come from the enemy's camp suddenly, surely Vibheeshana is to be suspected in every way. He is not worthy to be trusted."
data.anv: शत्रोः enemy, सकाशात् from the camp, सम्प्राप्तः having come, विभीषण: Vibheeshana, सर्वथा: in every way, शङ् क्या: doubtful, एवहि: surely, सहसा: suddenly, विश्वासयोग्यः worthy to be trusted, नकर्तव्यः not to be.

data.v: छादयित्वात्मभावं हि चरन्ति शठबुद्धयः । प्रहरन्ति च रन्ध्रेषु सोऽनर्थः सुमहान्भवेत् ॥
data.es: "One who has a perfidious mind keeps moving about concealing his intention and will attack at weak points, which will be a great inestimable mistake."
data.anv: शठबुद्धयः one with perfidious mind, आत्मभावम् one's own feeling, छादयित्वा: concealing, चरन्तिहि: keep moving about, रन्ध्रेषु: a weak point, प्रहरन्तिच and attack, सः he, महान् great, अनर्थः inestimable mistake, भवेत् will be.

data.v: अर्थानर्थौ विनिश्चित्य व्यवसायं भजेत ह । गुणतः संग्रहं कुर्याद्दोषतस्तु विसर्जयेत् ॥
data.es: Ascertaining advantages and disadvantages one should take the right course of action, by acting if it is virtuous and giving up if it is faulty.
data.anv: अर्थानर्थौ: advantages and disadvantages, विनिश्चित्य: ascertaining, व्यवसायम् course of action, भजेत: follows, गुणतः by virtue, सङ्ग्रहम् take hold of, कुर्यात् act, दोषतस्तु: if faulty, विसर्जयेत् should give up.

data.v: यदि दोषो महांस्तस्मिंस्त्यज्यतामविशङ्कितम् । गुणान्वापि बहूञ्ज्ञात्वा संग्रहः क्रियतां नृप ॥
data.es: "If there are great bad qualities (in Vibheeshana) no doubt he has to be rejected. If there are many virtues let us take him knowing them also."
data.anv: नृप: king, तस्मिन् in him, महान् great, दोषःयदि: if one has bad qualities, अविशङ्कितम् no doubt, त्यज्यताम् to be rejected, बहून् many, गुणान् virtues, ज्ञात्वावापि: knowing them also, सङ्ग्रहः let us take, क्रियताम् we will.

data.v: शरभस्त्वथ निश्चित्य सार्थं वचनमब्रवीत् । क्षिप्रमस्मिन्नरव्याघ्र चारः प्रतिविधीयताम् ॥
data.es: "Sarabha has also decided and spoken these meaningful words of advice." O Tiger among men Let a spy be assigned to cover him at once."
data.anv: नरव्याघ्र: tiger among men, अथ: and now, शरभस्तु: Sarabha too, निश्चित्य: decided, सार्थम् meaningful, वचनम् अब्रवीत् tendered words, अस्मिन् in this, क्षिप्रम् at once, चारः spy, प्रतिविधीयताम् shall be assigned to cover him.

data.v: प्रणिधाय हि चारेण यथावत्सूक्ष्मबुद्धिना । परीक्ष्य च ततः कार्यो यथान्यायं परिग्रहः ॥
data.es: "By employing a spy with subtle intellect to examine Vibheeshana, we can act in an appropriate manner to accept him (Vibheeshana)."
data.anv: प्रणिधाय: employing spies, सूक्ष्मबुद्धिना: who has subtle intellect, चारेण: by a spy, यथावत् in the same way, परीक्ष्यच after examining, ततः thereafter, यथान्यायम् in appropriate manner, परिग्रहः accept, कार्यः action.

data.v: जाम्बवांस्त्वथ संप्रेक्ष्य शास्त्रबुद्ध्या विचक्षणः । वाक्यं विज्ञापयामास गुणवद्दोषवर्जितम् ॥
data.es: Then, enlightened Jambavan who was endowed with sense of discrimination, considering all facts made his submission which was free from flaws.
data.anv: अथ: and then, विचक्षणः one who has sense of discrimination, जाम्बवांस्तु: even Jambavan also, शास्त्रबुध्या: enlightened one, सम्प्रेक्ष्य: considering, गुणवत् full of virtues, दोषवर्जितम् free from flaws, वाक्यम् statement, विज्ञापयामास: made this sub mission.

data.v: बद्धवैराच्च पापाच्च राक्षसेन्द्राद्विभीषणः । अदेश काले संप्राप्तः सर्वथा शङ्क्यतामयम् ॥
data.es: "Vibheeshana who has conceived bitter hatred towards the sinful Rakshasa king Ravana came without regard for place and time is always to be viewed with suspicion."
data.anv: विभीषणः Vibheeshana, बद्धवैराच्च: one who has conceived bitter hatred, पापात् sinful one, राक्षसेन्द्रात् towards Rakshasa king, अदेशकाले: without regard for timeand place, सम्प्राप्तः having come, आयम् this, सर्वथा: always, शङ् क्यताम् viewed with suspicion.

data.v: ततो मैन्दस्तु संप्रेक्ष्य नयापनयकोविदः । वाक्यं वचनसंपन्नो बभाषे हेतुमत्तरम् ॥
data.es: "Mainda, who was prudent in making policy and rich in expression, considering all facts expressed this statement that was fully logical."
data.anv: ततः then, नयापनयकोविदः prudent in making policy, वचनसम्पन्नः rich in expression, मैन्दस्तु: Mainda, सम्प्रेक्ष्य: considering, हेतुमत्तरम् fully logical, वाक्यम् statement बभाषे: expressed.

data.v: वचनं नाम तस्यैष रावणस्य विभीषणः । पृच्छ्यतां मधुरेणायं शनैर्नरवरेश्वर ॥
data.es: "O king of mortals This is Ravana's brother called Vibheeshana. Let him be slowly and gently interrogated for long."
data.anv: नरपतीश्वर: O king of the mortals, एषः this is, विभीषणः Vibheeshana, तस्य: his, रावणस्य: Ravana's, वचनं: words नाम: indeed, आयम् for long, मधुरेण: gently, शनैः slowly, पृच्छयताम् be interrogated.

data.v: भावमस्य तु विज्ञाय ततस्तत्त्वं करिष्यसि । यदि दृष्टो न दुष्टो वा बुद्धिपूर्वं नरर्षभ ॥
data.es: "O Best of kings After truly ascertaining Vibheeshana's intention whether he is wicked or not, you may act wisely (said Mainda)."
data.anv: नरर्षभ: O best of kings, अस्य: his, भावम् intention, तत्त्वतः truly, विज्ञाय: after ascertaining, दुष्टोयदि: if he is wicked, नदुष्टोवा: or not wicked also, बुद्धिपूर्वम् wisely, त्वम् you, करिष्यसि: act accordingly.

data.v: अथ संस्कारसंपन्नो हनूमान्सचिवोत्तमः । उवाच वचनं श्लक्ष्णमर्थवन्मधुरं लघु ॥
data.es: On the other hand, Hanuman who was endowed with rich culture spoke these soft, sweet, and meaningful words briefly.
data.anv: अथ: on the other hand, संस्कारसम्पन्नः endowed with rich culture, सचिवोत्तमः best of the ministers, हनुमान् Hanuman, श्लक्ष्णम् soft, अर्थवत् full of meaning, मधुरम् sweet, लघु: brief, वचनम् words, उवाच: spoke.

data.v: न भवन्तं मतिश्रेष्ठं समर्थं वदतां वरम् । अतिशाययितुं शक्तो बृहस्पतिरपि ब्रुवन् ॥
data.es: "Even for Brihaspati who is proclaimed to be highly intelligent, it is not possible to surpass you as you are the foremost in capability and eloquence."
data.anv: बृहस्पतिरपि: even Brihaspati, बृवन् proclaim, मतिश्रेष्ठम् highly intelligent, समर्थम् exceptionally capable, वदताम् in eloquence, वरम् foremost, भवन्तम् you, अतिशाययितुम् excellent, नशक्तः not possible.

data.v: न वादान्नापि संघर्षान्नाधिक्यान्न च कामतः । वक्ष्यामि वचनं राजन्यथार्थं रामगौरवात् ॥
data.es: "O King Rama I am telling this to you truly not for the sake of argument, not for the sake of creating friction, or with a sense of superiority, or desire but out of respect."
data.anv: राजन् O king, राम: Rama, वादात् for the sake of argument, वचनम् words, न: not, सङ्घर्षादपि: for the sake of creating friction, न: nor, आधिक्यात् with sense of superiority, न: nor, कामतःच: or even desire, न: nor, गौरवात् out of respect, यथार्थम् truth, वक्ष्यामि: telling you.

data.v: अर्थानर्थनिमित्तं हि यदुक्तं सचिवैस्तव । तत्र दोषं प्रपश्यामि क्रिया न ह्युपपद्यते ॥
data.es: "Your counsellors have said that after judging good or bad qualities we should accept or reject Vibheeshana. I see a flaw in that statement as such action would not arise."
data.anv: तव: your, सचिवैः counsellors, अर्थानर्थनिमित्तम् after judging good or bad qualities, यत् by what, उक्तम् has been said, तत्र: there, दोषम् fault, प्रपश्यामि: I see, क्रिया: action, नउपपद्यतेहि: not arise.

data.v: ऋते नियोगात्सामर्थ्यमवबोद्धुं न शक्यते । सहसा विनियोगो हि दोषवान्प्रतिभाति मे ॥
data.es: "When entrusted with duty one's capability will be known. It is not possible to appoint him for duty inconsiderately without understanding (his capacity) as it will be faulty."
data.anv: नियोगात् ऋते: only when entrusted with duty, सामर्थ्यम् capability, अवबोद्धुम् will be known, नशक्यते: not possible, सहसा: inconsiderately, विनियोगः appointment to a duty, दोषवान् will be faulty, मे: to me, प्रतिभाति: to understand.

data.v: चारप्रणिहितं युक्तं यदुक्तं सचिवैस्तव । अर्थस्यासंभवात्तत्र कारणं नोपपद्यते ॥
data.es: "Your counsellors (Sarabha) have said that it is proper to know from the spies to ascertain about him. It has no meaning as it is not possible to do so (as he is near you). It does not serve the purpose."
data.anv: तव: your, सचिवैः counsellors, यत् that way, चारप्रणिहितम् ascertain from the spies whether he is good or not, युक्तम् proper, उक्तम् has said, तत्र: then, अर्थस्य: has no meaning, असम्भवात् not possible to do, कारणम् reason, नोपयुज्यते: no purpose will be served by that.

data.v: अदेश काले संप्राप्त इत्ययं यद्विभीषणः । विवक्षा चात्र मेऽस्तीयं तां निबोध यथा मति ॥
data.es: "This Vibheeshana has come here without regard for place and time. I desire to speak what I feel in this regard."
data.anv: अयंविभीषणः this Vibheeshana, आदेशकाले: without regard for place and time, सम्प्राप्तःइतियत् has come here, तत्र: hence, मे: my, यथामति: according to me, इयंविवक्षा: desire to speak this, अस्ति: will be, ताम् to it, निबोध: be considered.

data.v: स एष देशः कालश्च भवतीह यथा तथा । पुरुषात्पुरुषं प्राप्य तथा दोषगुणावपि ॥
data.es: "It seems proper for him (Vibheeshana) to come here, considering place and time and so also considering that you are superior to him (Ravana) even if there are demerits in him and merits in you."
data.anv: एषः this, इह: here, देश: place, कालश्च: and time, तथा: similarly, पुरुषात् you, पुरुषम् superior, प्राप्य: came here, तथा: so also, गुणदोषावपि: even if there are de merits (in him) and merits (in you), यथा: as, तथा: it is, इह: here, भवति: seems to be.

data.v: दौरात्म्यं रावणे दृष्ट्वा विक्रमं च तथा त्वयि । युक्तमागमनं तस्य सदृशं तस्य बुद्धितः ॥
data.es: "He has thought over and seen wickedness in Ravana, likewise valiance in you has made you come here. He seems to be right and suitable."
data.anv: रवणे: in Ravana, दौरात्म्यम् wickedness, तथा: likewise, त्वयि: in you, विक्रमंच: valiance, दृष्टवा: seen, अत्र: here, आगमनम् has come, युक्तंहि: seems right, तस्य: his, बुद्धितः thinking, सदृशम् suitable.

data.v: अज्ञातरूपैः पुरुषैः स राजन्पृच्छ्यतामिति । यदुक्तमत्र मे प्रेक्षा काचिदस्ति समीक्षिता ॥
data.es: "O king People of unknown identity should enquire about him. (Vibheeshana)" said Mainda. Having reviewed the matter, I have another view. (in the matter)."
data.anv: राजन् O king अज्ञातरूपैः people of unknown identity, पुरुषैः by men, सः he (Mainda), पृच्छ् यताम् said to enquire इति: this, यत् that way, उक्तम् said, अत्र: here, समीक्षिता: having reviewed, मे: to me, काचित् a little, प्रेक्षा: view, अस्ति: be it.

data.v: पृच्छ्यमानो विशङ्केत सहसा बुद्धिमान्वचः । तत्र मित्रं प्रदुष्येत मिथ्यपृष्टं सुखागतम् ॥
data.es: "If enquired suddenly, a wise one will also become suspicious of his words. Even a friend who has come there will seem like a wicked one to him."
data.anv: सहसा: at once, पृच्छयमानः if enquired, बुद्धिमान् wise one, वचः words, विशङ्केत: will become suspicious, तत्र: there, सुखागतम् come with relief, मित्रम् friend, मिथ्यापृष्टम् प्रदुष्येत: will appear as wicked one.

data.v: अशक्यः सहसा राजन्भावो वेत्तुं परस्य वै । अन्तः स्वभावैर्गीतैस्तैर्नैपुण्यं पश्यता भृशम् ॥
data.es: "O king It is not possible to know the intention (of an enemy) of others at once without excessive dexterity. It is to be known by his tone of words and description."
data.anv: राजन् O king अन्तस्स्वभावै: his intention, र्गीतै: tone of words स्तै: his, पश्यताम् to find out, भृशम् excessive, नैपुण्यं: dexterity, परस्य: other's, भावः feelings, सहसा: at once, बोद्धुम् to know, अशक्यम् not possible.

data.v: न त्वस्य ब्रुवतो जातु लक्ष्यते दुष्टभावता । प्रसन्नं वदनं चापि तस्मान्मे नास्ति संशयः ॥
data.es: "Even when one is speaking, his malevolence is known. It does not seem so as his countenance is also pleasing. Therefore, I have no doubt (of him)."
data.anv: ब्रुवतः he is speaking, अस्य: his, दुष्टभावता: malevolence, जातु: known, नलक्ष्यते: does not seem, वदनंचापि: even his countenance, प्रसन्नम् pleasing, तस्मात् therefore, मे: to me, संशयः suspicion, नास्ति: is not there.

data.v: अशङ्कितमतिः स्वस्थो न शठः परिसर्पति । न चास्य दुष्टा वाक्चापि तस्मान्नास्तीह संशयः ॥
data.es: "One who is with deceitful feeling will not come without an expression of suspicion. He has come on his own and even his talk and looks are not suspicious to me."
data.anv: शठः one with deceitful feeling, अशङ्कितमतिः without any expression of suspicion, स्वस्थः on his own, नपरिसर्पति: not going about, अस्य: his, वाक् च: even his talk, दुष्टा: looks, नास्ति: not, तस्मात् therefore, मे: to me, संशयः suspicion, नास्ति: not there.

data.v: आकारश्छाद्यमानोऽपि न शक्यो विनिगूहितुम् । बलाद्धि विवृणोत्येव भावमन्तर्गतं नृणाम् ॥
data.es: "Even if one intends to hide in his external form, it is not feasible to keep it concealed. The inner feeling of a man gets revealed even if cleverly hidden."
data.anv: आकारः form, छाद्यमानोऽपि: even if one wishes to hide, एवगूहितुम् kept concealed, नशक्यः not feasible, अन्तर्गतम् inner feeling, नृणाम् of a man's, भावम्: feeling, बलात् perforce, निप्पणोत्येव: cleverly also.

data.v: देशकालोपपन्नं च कार्यं कार्यविदां वर । सफलं कुरुते क्षिप्रं प्रयोगेणाभिसंहितम् ॥
उद्योगं तव संप्रेक्ष्य मिथ्यावृत्तं च रावणम् । वालिनश्च वधं श्रुत्वा सुग्रीवं चाभिषेचितम् ॥
राज्यं प्रार्थयमानश्च बुद्धिपूर्वमिहागतः । एतावत्तु पुरस्कृत्य युज्यते त्वस्य संग्रहः ॥
यथाशक्ति मयोक्तं तु राक्षसस्यार्जवं प्रति । त्वं प्रमाणं तु शेषस्य श्रुत्वा बुद्धिमतां वर ॥
अथ रामः प्रसन्नात्मा श्रुत्वा वायुसुतस्य ह । प्रत्यभाषत दुर्धर्षः श्रुतवानात्मनि स्थितम् ॥
data.es: Having heard Hanuman (son of wind god) formidable Rama was highly pleased at heart and started to tell his opinion.
data.anv: अथ: and then, दुर्धर्षः formidable one, श्रुतवान् one who heard, रामः Rama, वायुसुतस्य: son of wind god's, शृत्वा: having heard, प्रसन्नात्मा: highly pleased at heart, आत्मनि: his own, स्थितम् that which was in his mind, प्रत्यभाषत: started to tell.

data.v: ममापि तु विवक्षास्ति काचित्प्रति विभीषणम् । श्रुतमिच्छामि तत्सर्वं भवद्भिः श्रेयसि स्थितैः ॥
data.es: "Even I desire to speak a few words about Vibheeshana. I wish you, who are my well wishers and devoted to me, also hear me."
data.anv: विभीषणंप्रति: about Vibheeshana, ममापि: even I, काचित् a few words, विवक्षा: desire to speak, आस्ति: is there, श्रेयसि: well wishers, स्थितैः are devoted, भवद्भिः you also, तत् that, श्रोतुम् to hear, इच्छामि: I desire.

data.v: मित्रभावेन संप्राप्तं न त्यजेयं कथंचन । दोषो यद्यपि तस्य स्यात्सतामेतदगर्हितम् ॥
data.es: Although he (Vibheeshana) has defects, as he has come here with a friendly feeling, I cannot reject him. Good people are not reprehensible.
data.anv: मित्रभावेन: with friendly feeling, सम्राप्तम् having come here, तस्य: his, दोष: defects, यद्यसि: although, कथञ्चन: however, नत्यजेयम् not reject, एतत् all this, सताम् good people, अगर्हितम् not reprehensible.

data.v: रामस्य वचनं श्रुत्वा सुग्रीवः प्लवगेश्वरः । प्रत्यभाषत काकुत्स्थं सौहार्देनाभिचोदितः ॥
data.es: Having heard the inciting words spoken by Rama so lovingly, the king of Vanaras replied.
data.anv: प्लवगेश्वरः king of (leaping) Vanaras, सुग्रीवः Sugriva, रामस्य: Rama's, वचः words, श्रुत्वा: having heard, सौहार्देन: lovingly, प्रचोदितः inciting, काकुत्स्थम् Rama of Kakuthsa race, प्रत्यभाषत: replied.

data.v: किमत्र चित्रं धर्मज्ञ लोकनाथशिखामणे । यत्त्वमार्यं प्रभाषेथाः सत्त्ववान्सपथे स्थितः ॥
data.es: "What wonderful words have been spoken by you, Rama? You are the knower of righteous duty, protector of the world, a virtuous and upright one."
data.anv: धर्मज्ञ: knower of righteous duty, लोकनाथसुखावहा: protector of the world, सत्त्ववान् virtuous one, सत्पथे: upright, स्थितः who stands, त्वम् by you, आर्यम् noble, प्रभाषेथाः that which was spoken, इतियत् thus which, अत्र: here, चित्रम् wonderful, किम् What.

data.v: मम चाप्यन्तरात्मायं शुद्धिं वेत्ति विभीषणम् । अनुमनाच्च भावाच्च सर्वतः सुपरीक्षितः ॥
data.es: "My inner self is aware that this Vibheeshana is pure. He has been tested in all respects with doubtful feelings."
data.anv: मम: my, अयम् this, अन्तरात्माच: inner self, विभीषणम् Vibheeshana's, शुद्धम् pure, वेत्ति: known, अनुमानात् च: and with doubt, भावात् feeling, सर्वतः in all respects, सुपरीक्षितः been tested.

data.v: तस्मात्क्षिप्रं सहास्माभिस्तुल्यो भवतु राघव । विभीषणो महाप्राज्ञः सखित्वं चाभ्युपैतु नः ॥
data.es: "Rama therefore, let this highly sagacious Vibheeshana be with you like a friend in equal terms and enjoy."
data.anv: राघव: Rama, तस्मात् therefore, महाप्राज्ञः highly sagacious one, विभीषणः Vibheeshana, क्षिप्रम् at once, अस्माभिस्सह: along with us, तुल्यः equal term, भवतु: be, नः our, सखित्वंच: friendship, अभ्युपैतु: you enjoy.

data.v: स सुग्रीवस्य तद्वाक्यं रामः श्रुत्वा विमृश्य च । ततः शुभतरं वाक्यमुवाच हरिपुंगवम् ॥
data.es: Then Sugriva, the leader of Vanaras reflecting on what was spoken by Rama said these words favouring Rama.
data.anv: जनकात्मजा Janaka's daughter, मैथिली Mythili, तस्य her, तत् those, वचनम् words, श्रुत्वा hearing, ततः that, पवनात्मजम् son of wind god, शुभतरम् auspicious, वाक्यम् words, उवाच spoke

data.v: सुदुष्टो वाप्यदुष्टो वा किमेष रजनीचरः । सूक्ष्ममप्यहितं कर्तुं ममाशक्तः कथंचन ॥
data.es: "Whether this night ranger is wicked or not wicked, is he capable of doing even subtlest harm to me?"
data.anv: एषः this, रजनीचरः night ranger, सुदुष्टोवा: wicked or, अदुष्टोवा: or not wicked, मम: to me, कथञ्चन: What to say, सूक्ष्मम् subtlest, अहितमपि: that which is harmful, कर्तुम् to do, आशक्तः capable.

data.v: पिशाचान्दानवान्यक्षान्पृथिव्यां चैव राक्षसान् । अङ्गुल्यग्रेण तान्हन्यामिच्छन्हरिगणेश्वर ॥
data.es: "O leader of the Vanara troop If I so desire, I can kill with the tip of my big finger the devils, Danavas, Yakshas and the Rakshasas on this earth."
data.anv: हरिगणेश्वर: leader of Vanara troop, इच्छान् if I desire, पृथिव्याम् on this earth, तान् them, पिशाचान् devils, दानवान् Danavas, यक्षान् Yakshas, राक्षसान्चैव: including Rakshasas, अङ्गुल्यग्रेण: with tip of my big finger, हन्याम् can kill.

data.v: श्रूयते हि कपोतेन शत्रुः शरणमागतः । अर्चितश्च यथान्यायं स्वैश्च मांसैर्निमन्त्रितः ॥
data.es: "You have heard of the (story of a) dove that offered his own flesh to an enemy who came to seek protection according to tradition (of hospitality)."
data.anv: कपोतेन: by a dove, शरणम् to seek refuge, आगतः came, शत्रुः enemy, यथान्यायम् according to practice, आर्चितश्च: offered, स्वैः its own, मांसैः flesh, निमन्त्रितश्च: without any jealousy, श्रूयतेहि: have heard.

data.v: स हि तं प्रतिजग्राह भार्या हर्तारमागतम् । कपोतो वानरश्रेष्ठ किं पुनर्मद्विधो जनः ॥
data.es: "O Supreme Vanara When the fowler who had carried away the mate came near the dove it received him and in turn protected him. What more can a man like me do?"
