data.es: "O King! like a banyan tree on the island, like Sala trees on the Himalayan Mountain these people are stationed. You may see them marching. They are strong to encounter, can change form at their free will. They look like gods and Danavas in war and have the valour of gods."
data.anv: राजन् O king!, मत्तान् intoxicated, महाद्विपानिप on the island, गङ्गेयान् of Ganges, न्यग्रोधानिव like banyan tree, हैमवतान् in Himalaya mountain, सालानिव like Sala trees, स्थितान् stationed, यान् marching, एतान् these people, पश्यसि you may see, एते these, दुष्प्रसहाः difficult to encounter, बलिनः strong, कामरूपिणः who can change form at their free will, दैत्यदानवसङ्काशाः look like gods and Danavas, युद्धे in war, देवपराक्रमाः valour like that of gods.

data.v: एषां कोटिसहस्राणि नव पञ्चच सप्त च । तथा शङ्खसहस्राणि तथा वृन्दशतानि च ॥
data.es: "These Vanaras are nine, five and seven thousand crores in number. They are in many thousands of Sankhas and Vrindas."
data.anv: एषाम् these, नव nine, पञ्चच and five, सप्तच and seven also, कोटिसहस्राणि thousand crores, तथा so also, शङ्खुसहस्राणि thousands of Sankhas, तथा similarly, बृन्दशतानिच hundred Vrindas. (A Sankha is equal to lakh of crores, A vrinda is equal to a lakh of Maha Sankhus).

data.v: एते सुग्रीवसचिवाः किष्किन्धानिलयाः सदा । हरयो देवगन्धर्वैरुत्पन्नाः कामरूपिणः ॥
data.es: "These are allies of Sugriva ever residing at Kishkinda. They are born to celestial gods and Gandharvas and can change their form at their will."
data.anv: देवगन्धर्वैः celestial gods and Gandharvas, उत्पन्नाः born to, कामरूपिणः they are free to change their form at will, सुग्रीवसचिवाः Sugriva's allies, एते these, सदा always, किष्किन्दानिलयाः reside in Kishkinda.

data.v: यौ तौ पश्यसि तिष्ठन्तौ कुमारौ देवरूपिणौ । मैन्दश्च द्विविदश्चोभौ ताभ्यां नास्ति समो युधि ॥
data.es: "Do you see two of them standing there? They are young and have the form of gods. They are Mainda and Dwivida. Both of them are similar in war and none equal them in war."
data.anv: तिष्ठन्तौ standing there, देवरूपिणौ in god's form, कुमारौ young ones, यौ both, पश्यसि do you see them, तौ they both, मैन्दश्च Mainda, द्विविधश्चोभौ Dwivida, युधि in war, ताभ्याम् both of them, समः similar, नास्ति none.

data.v: ब्रह्मणा समनुज्ञातावमृतप्राशिनावुभौ । आशंसेते युधा लङ्कामेतौ मर्दितुमोजसा ॥
data.es: "They drank the nectar of immortality with the permission of Brahma. These leaders are aspiring to destroy Lanka by their prowess."
data.anv: ब्राह्मणा Brahma, समनुज्ञातौ by the permission of, अमृतप्राशिनौ have drunk the nectar of immortality, एतौ they, उभौ both, मोजसः with their prowess, लङ्गाम् Lanka, मर्धितुम् to destroy, आशंसेतेयुथा leaders aspiring.

data.v: यावेतावेतयोः पार्श्वे स्थितौ पर्वतसंनिभौ । सुमुखो विमुखश्चैव मृत्युपुत्रौ पितुः समौ ॥
यं तु पश्यसि तिष्ठन्तं प्रभिन्नमिव कुञ्जरम् । यो बलात्क्षोभयेत्क्रुद्धः समुद्रमपि वानरः ॥
data.es: "O Lord! You may see the one standing there like an elephant who can churn up the sea when he is angry. He has come to Lanka earlier, seen Sita and gone back. You may see that he has come again."
data.anv: प्रभो O Lord!, प्रभिन्नम् deformed, कुञ्जरम् इव like elephants, तिष्ठन्तम standing, यम् there, पश्यसि you may see, क्रुद्धःवानरः when angry this Vanara, यः who, समुद्रमपि even the sea, क्षोभयेत् will churn up, एषः this, लङ्कायाः Lanka's, वैदेह्याः Vaidehi, तन spread, अबिगन्ता seen and gone, परा earlier, दृष्टम् seen, पुनः and again, आगतम् come, एनम् him, पश्य you may see.

data.v: एषोऽभिगन्ता लङ्काया वैदेह्यास्तव च प्रभो । एनं पश्य पुरा दृष्टं वानरं पुनरागतम् ॥
data.es: "O Lord! You may see the one standing there like an elephant who can churn up the sea when he is angry. He has come to Lanka earlier, seen Sita and gone back. You may see that he has come again."
data.anv: प्रभो O Lord!, प्रभिन्नम् deformed, कुञ्जरम् इव like elephants, तिष्ठन्तम standing, यम् there, पश्यसि you may see, क्रुद्धःवानरः when angry this Vanara, यः who, समुद्रमपि even the sea, क्षोभयेत् will churn up, एषः this, लङ्कायाः Lanka's, वैदेह्याः Vaidehi, तन spread, अबिगन्ता seen and gone, परा earlier, दृष्टम् seen, पुनः and again, आगतम् come, एनम् him, पश्य you may see.

data.v: ज्येष्ठः केसरिणः पुत्रो वातात्मज इति श्रुतः । हनूमानिति विख्यातो लङ्घितो येन सागरः ॥
data.es: "He is the eldest son born of Kesari and the son of WindGod and is popularly known as Hanuman. He leapt over the sea and came."
data.anv: येन this, सागरः sea, लङ्घितः leapt over, केसरिणः Kesari's, ज्येष्ठः eldest, पुत्त्रः son, वातात्मजःइति of WindGod, श्रुतः son, हनूमानिति called Hanuman, विख्यातः popular.

data.v: कामरूपी हरिश्रेष्ठो बलरूपसमन्वितः । अनिवार्यगतिश्चैव यथा सततगः प्रभुः ॥
data.es: "He is a jewel among Vanaras. He can change his form at his will. He is endowed with physical strength and charm. Being existent everywhere like windgod his cause cannot be prevented like that of wind god."
data.anv: हरिश्रेष्ठः jewel among Vanaras, कामरूपः one who can change form at his will, बलरूबसमन्वितः endowed with physical strength and charm, सततगः being existent everywhere, प्रभुःयथा like Lord, अनिवार्यगतिश्चैव has the speed of wind and his course cannot be prevented like wind.

data.v: उद्यन्तं भास्करं दृष्ट्वा बालः किल पिपासितः । त्रियोजनसहस्रं तु अध्वानमवतीर्य हि ॥
data.es: When he was a child, on seeing the rising Sun, he travelled three thousand yojanas and said, "I will eat up the Sun otherwise I will not be appeased', being proud of his strength."
data.anv: बालकः when he was a child, पिपासितः being hungry, उद्यन्तम् rising, भास्करम् Sun, दृष्टवा seeing, त्रियोजनसहस्रम् three thousand yojanas, अध्वानम् travelled, अवतीर्य alighted, मे my, क्षुत् son, नप्रतिस्यति not be appeased, आदित्यम् Sun, आहरिष्यामि will eat up, इति thus, मनसा thinking, सञ्चिन्त्य resolving, बलदर्पितः proud of his strength, पुरैष leapt.

data.v: आदित्यमाहरिष्यामि न मे क्षुत्प्रतियास्यति । इति संचिन्त्य मनसा पुरैष बलदर्पितः ॥
data.es: When he was a child, on seeing the rising Sun, he travelled three thousand yojanas and said, "I will eat up the Sun otherwise I will not be appeased', being proud of his strength."
data.anv: बालकः when he was a child, पिपासितः being hungry, उद्यन्तम् rising, भास्करम् Sun, दृष्टवा seeing, त्रियोजनसहस्रम् three thousand yojanas, अध्वानम् travelled, अवतीर्य alighted, मे my, क्षुत् son, नप्रतिस्यति not be appeased, आदित्यम् Sun, आहरिष्यामि will eat up, इति thus, मनसा thinking, सञ्चिन्त्य resolving, बलदर्पितः proud of his strength, पुरैष leapt.

data.v: अनाधृष्यतमं देवमपि देवर्षिदानवैः । अनासाद्यैव पतितो भास्करोदयने गिरौ ॥
data.es: "Unassailable even for gods, sages and Danavas to reach the Sun god, he fell down near the eastern part."
data.anv: देवर्षिदानवैरपि even for gods, sages and Danavas, अनाधृष्यतमम् unassailable, देवम् Sun god god, अनासाद्येव not possible, भास्करोदयने near the eastern part, गिरौ on the mountain, पतिता fell down.

data.v: पतितस्य कपेरस्य हनुरेका शिलातले । किंचिद्भिन्ना दृढहनोर्हनूमानेष तेन वै ॥
data.es: "By falling on the mountain one of the jaws of the monkey got broken. This is the reason that he is known as Hanuman."
data.anv: शिलातले over the mountain, पतितस्य fallen down, अस्य this, कपे monkey, एका one, हनुः jaw, किञ्चित् a bit, भिन्नातेन slightly broken, दृढहनुः solid jaw, एषः this, हनुमान् Hanuman.

data.v: सत्यमागमयोगेन ममैष विदितो हरिः । नास्य शक्यं बलं रूपं प्रभावो वानुभाषितुम् ॥
data.es: "I came to know about him through one of my contacts. His strength, his appearance and glory are indescribable."
data.anv: एषः this, हरिः monkey, मम to me, सत्यम् truth, आगमयोगेन by one who is in contact with me, विदितः known, अस्य his, बलम् strength, रूपम् appearance, प्रभावोना even his glory, नभाषितम् अपि cannot be described, नशक्यम् not possible.

data.v: एष आशंसते लङ्कामेको मर्दितुमोजसा । यश्चैषोऽनन्तरः शूरः श्यामः पद्मनिभेक्षणः ॥
इक्ष्वाकूणामतिरथो लोके विख्यात पौरुषः । यस्मिन्न चलते धर्मो यो धर्मं नातिवर्तते ॥
यो ब्राह्ममस्त्रं वेदांश्च वेद वेदविदां वरः । यो भिन्द्याद्गगनं बाणैः पर्वतांश्चापि दारयेत् ॥
यस्य मृत्योरिव क्रोधः शक्रस्येव पराक्रमः । स एष रामस्त्वां योद्धुं राजन्समभिवर्तते ॥
यश्चैष दक्षिणे पार्श्वे शुद्धजाम्बूनदप्रभः । विशालवक्षास्ताम्राक्षो नीलकुञ्चितमूर्धजः ॥
data.es: "To his right is his brother known as Lakshmana whose body radiates like gold, he has broad chest, red eyes, dark curly hair. He is as dear as his life to Rama. He is skilled in moral science and warfare. He is the foremost and the best among wielders of weapons."
data.anv: यस्य his, दक्षिणेपार्श्वे right side, एषः this, शुद्धजाम्बूनदप्रभः whose body radiates like gold, विशालवक्षाः one with broad chest, ताम्राक्षः red eyes, नीलकुञ्चितमार्धजः dark curly haired, एषः this is, लक्ष्मणोनाम known as Lakshmana, भ्राता brother, प्राणसमहाप्रियः as dear as life, नये in moral science, युद्धेच and warfare, कुशलः skilled, सर्वशस्त्रभृताम् foremost among all wielders of weapons, वरः the best.

data.v: एषोऽस्य लक्ष्मणो नाम भ्राता प्राणसमः प्रियः । नये युद्धे च कुशलः सर्वशास्त्रविशारदः ॥
data.es: "To his right is his brother known as Lakshmana whose body radiates like gold, he has broad chest, red eyes, dark curly hair. He is as dear as his life to Rama. He is skilled in moral science and warfare. He is the foremost and the best among wielders of weapons."
data.anv: यस्य his, दक्षिणेपार्श्वे right side, एषः this, शुद्धजाम्बूनदप्रभः whose body radiates like gold, विशालवक्षाः one with broad chest, ताम्राक्षः red eyes, नीलकुञ्चितमार्धजः dark curly haired, एषः this is, लक्ष्मणोनाम known as Lakshmana, भ्राता brother, प्राणसमहाप्रियः as dear as life, नये in moral science, युद्धेच and warfare, कुशलः skilled, सर्वशस्त्रभृताम् foremost among all wielders of weapons, वरः the best.

data.v: अमर्षी दुर्जयो जेता विक्रान्तो बुद्धिमान्बली । रामस्य दक्षिणो बाहुर्नित्यं प्राणो बहिश्चरः ॥
data.es: "He is one who does not forgive (Rama's enemies), difficult to win, indomitable, victorious, strong and wise one. He is the right hand of Rama and external breath of his life."
data.anv: अमर्षी one who does not forgive (the enemies of Rama), दुर्जयः difficult to win, विक्रान्तः indomitable, जेता victorious, बुद्धिमान् wise one, बली strong one, नित्यम् ever, रामस्य Rama's, दक्षिणःबाहुः right hand, बहिश्चरः external breath, प्राणः life

data.v: न ह्येष राघवस्यार्थे जीवितं परिरक्षति । एषैवाशंसते युद्धे निहन्तुं सर्वराक्षसान् ॥
data.es: "For the cause of Rama, he will spare his life. He too is intent upon destroying all Rakshasas."
data.anv: एषः this, राघवस्यार्थे for the cause of Rama, जीवितम् life, नपरिरक्षतिहि not spare his life. एषैना he too, युद्धे in war, सर्वराक्षसान् all Rakshasas, विहन्तुम् destroy, आशिंपते intent upon.

data.v: यस्तु सव्यमसौ पक्षं रामस्याश्रित्य तिष्ठति । रक्षोगणपरिक्षिप्तो राजा ह्येष विभीषणः ॥
data.es: "The one who is near Rama's left who sought Rama's refuge and stands surrounded by Rakshasas and protected is the king Vibheeshana."
data.anv: असौ the one, यःतु who is near, रामस्य Rama's, सव्यम् left, पक्षम् side, आश्रित्य sought refuge, तिष्ठति stands, रक्षोगणपरिक्षिप्तः surrounded by Rakshasas and protected, एषः he is, राजा king, विभीषण Vibheeshana.

data.v: श्रीमता राजराजेन लङ्कायामभिषेचितः । त्वामेव प्रतिसंरब्धो युद्धायैषोऽभिवर्तते ॥
data.es: "He is a prosperous king of the kings of Lanka. He has been consecrated by Rama, filled with anger he is advancing to wage war with you."
data.anv: मता prosperous, राजराजेन king of kings, लङ्कायाम् of Lanka, अभिषेचितः consecrated, एषः this, त्वामेव by him, प्रतिसंरब्धः filled with anger, युद्धाय for waging war, अभिवर्तते is advancing.

data.v: यं तु पश्यसि तिष्ठन्तं मध्ये गिरिमिवाचलम् । सर्वशाखामृगेन्द्राणां भर्तारमपराजितम् ॥
तेजसा यशसा बुद्ध्या ज्ञानेनाभिजनेन च । यः कपीनति बभ्राज हिमवानिव पर्वतान् ॥
किष्किन्धां यः समध्यास्ते गुहां सगहनद्रुमाम् । दुर्गां पर्वतदुर्गस्थां प्रधानैः सह यूथपैः ॥
यस्यैषा काञ्चनी माला शोभते शतपुष्करा । कान्ता देवमनुष्याणां यस्यां लक्ष्मीः प्रतिष्ठिता ॥
एतां च मालां तारां च कपिराज्यं च शाश्वतम् । सुग्रीवो वालिनं हत्वा रामेण प्रतिपादितः ॥
एवं कोटिसहस्रेण शङ्कूनां च शतेन च । सुग्रीवो वानरेन्द्रस्त्वां युद्धार्थमभिवर्तते ॥
इमां महाराजसमीक्ष्य वाहिनी;मुपस्थितां प्रज्वलितग्रहोपमाम् । ततः प्रयत्नः परमो विधीयतां; यथा जयः स्यान्न परैः पराजयः ॥
data.es: "O Great King! Observing the ocean of army close by their appearing cruel like a blazing planet, make supreme efforts to be victorious and not to be defeated in the hands of the enemy."॥ इत्यार्षेवाल्मीकीयेश्रीमद्रामायणेआदिकाव्येयुद्धकाण्डेअष्टाविंशस्सर्गः ॥This is the end of the twenty eighth sarga of Yuddha Kanda of the first epic the holy Ramayana composed by sage Valmiki.
data.anv: महाराज O Great king!, प्रवजितग्रहोपमाम् looking like a cruel blazing planet, उपस्थिताम् stationed close, इमाम् this, वाहिनीम् ocean of army, समीक्ष्य observing ततः that, जयः victory, यथा so also, स्यात् in the hand s of, परैः enemies, पराजयः defeat, न not, परमः supreme, प्रयत्नः effort, विधीयताम् perform.

data.v: शुकेन तु समाख्यातांस्तान्दृष्ट्वा हरियूथपान् । समीपस्थं च रामस्य भ्रातरं स्वं विभीषणम् ॥
लक्ष्मणं च महावीर्यं भुजं रामस्य दक्षिणम् । सर्ववानरराजं च सुग्रीवं भीमविक्रमम् ॥
किंचिदाविग्नहृदयो जातक्रोधश्च रावणः । भर्त्सयामास तौ वीरौ कथान्ते शुकसारणौ ॥
अधोमुखौ तौ प्रणतावब्रवीच्छुकसारणौ । रोषगद्गदया वाचा संरब्धः परुषं वचः ॥
data.es: (That Ravana) with his throat choked with anger spoke indignantly and harshly to both Suka and Saarana who stood with their heads bent down in supplication.
data.anv: अधोमुखौ with heads bent down, प्रणतौ in supplication, तौ both, शुकसाणौ Suka and Saarana, रोषगद्गदया throat choked with anger, वाचा spoke, संरब्द indignantly, तथा so also, परूषम् harshly, अब्रवीत् spoke.

data.v: न तावत्सदृशं नाम सचिवैरुपजीविभिः । विप्रियं नृपतेर्वक्तुं निग्रहप्रग्रहे विभोः ॥
data.es: "It is not proper for those ministers dependent on a capable ruler who has the power to check and hold forth, to speak that which is unpleasant."
data.anv: उपजीविभि those who are dependant, सचिवै ministers, विग्रहे to keep in check, प्रग्रहे holding forth, प्रभो to a capable, नृपते ruler, निप्रियम् that which is unpleasant, वक्तुम् to speak, सदृशम् in this way, नतावत् नाम् not proper.

data.v: रिपूणां प्रतिकूलानां युद्धार्थमभिवर्तताम् । उभाभ्यां सदृशं नाम वक्तुमप्रस्तवे स्तवम् ॥
data.es: "Is it appropriate for both of you to praise the enemy this way before war?"
data.anv: अप्रस्तवे inappropriate, उभाभ्याम् both of you, प्रतिकूलानाम् antagonistic, युद्धार्थम् before war, अभिवर्तताम् speaking this way, रिपूणाम् about enemies, स्तवम् to praise, वक्तुम् your talking, सदृशंनाम for you this way.

data.v: आचार्या गुरवो वृद्धा वृथा वां पर्युपासिताः । सारं यद्राजशास्त्राणामनुजीव्यं न गृह्यते ॥
data.es: "You have not grasped that which is the essence of political wisdom in the sastras in spite of waiting upon elders, teachers and parents which was in vain."
data.anv: यत् that which is, राजशास्त्राणाम् in political sastras, अनुजीव्यम् living upon, सारम् essence, नगृह्यते not grasped, वाम् both of you, आचार्य teachers, गुरव sages, वृद्धा parents, वृथा waste, पर्युपासिता waiting upon.

data.v: गृहीतो वा न विज्ञातो भारो ज्ञानस्य वोछ्यते । ईदृशैः सचिवैर्युक्तो मूर्खैर्दिष्ट्या धराम्यहम् ॥
data.es: "Even if you have grasped you have not understood the meaning or out of intensity of your ignorance. Or else I am bearing foolish ones like you who are not fit to be ministers. Out of good luck I am ruling this sovereignty."
data.anv: गृहीत even if you have grasped, नविज्ञातोवा not known the meaning, अज्ञानस्य out of ignorance, भार intensity, वाह्यते bearing, मूर्खै foolish ones, ईदृशै like these, सचिवै ministers, युक्त not fit, अहम् I, दिष्ट्या out of good luck, धरामि ruling this sovereignty.

data.v: किं नु मृत्योर्भयं नास्ति मां वक्तुं परुषं वचः । यस्य मे शासतो जिह्वा प्रयच्छति शुभाशुभम् ॥
data.es: "Did you not have fear of death when you spoke such harsh words to me, who can by mere order make good or evil to you?"
data.anv: शासत by order, यस्यमे by that alone, जिह्वा by tongue, शुभाशुभम् auspicious and inauspicious, प्रयच्छति articulating, माम् to me, परुषम् harsh, वच words, वक्तुम् to speak, मृत्यो death, भयम् fear, नास्तिकिंनु do you not have.

data.v: अप्येव दहनं स्पृष्ट्वा वने तिष्ठन्ति पादपाः । राजदोषपरामृष्टास्तिष्ठन्ते नापराधिनः ॥
data.es: "Trees may remain unscathed even on touching forest fire, but those who are punishable do not remain unpunished on account of the king and are treated harshly."
data.anv: पादपा trees, दहनम् fire, स्पृष्टवा touching, आप्येव even after, वने in forest, तिष्ठन्ति remains unscathed, राजदोषपरामृष्टा treated harshly on account of punishment of the king, अपराधिन those who are punishable, नतिष्ठन्ते not remain unpunished.

data.v: हन्यामहमिमौ पापौ शत्रुपक्षप्रशंसकौ । यदि पूर्वोपकारैर्मे न क्रोधो मृदुतां व्रजेत् ॥
data.es: "I would have slayed these two sinners who praise the enemy side, if my anger had not softened and remembered their earlier services."
data.anv: अहम् I, हन्याम् would have slayed, त्वम्इमौपापौ these two sinners, शत्रुपक्षप्रशंसकौ who praise the enemy side, यदि if, मे my, क्रोध anger, न not, मृदुताम् व्रजेत् softened, पूर्वोपकारै due to earlier service.

data.v: अपध्वंसत गच्छध्वं संनिकर्षादितो मम । न हि वां हन्तुमिच्छामि स्मरन्नुपकृतानि वाम् । हतावेव कृतघ्नौ तौ मयि स्नेहपराङ्मुखौ ॥
data.es: "You get away from here, disappear from here. On the contrary since I remember your earlier actions performed by you, I do not wish to kill you. Indeed, both of you are devoid of love and are ungrateful. You stand killed (already)."
data.anv: अपध्वंसत disappear from here, गच्छध्वम् going from here, मम my, इत this सन्निकर्षात् from neighbourhood,, वाम् you, उपकृतानि services affected by you, स्मरामि remember, हन्तुम् to kill, नइच्छामि do not wish, मयि to me, स्नेहपराङ्मुखौ devoid of love, कृतघ्नौ ungrateful, तौ both, हतावेव stand killed.

data.v: एवमुक्तौ तु सव्रीडौ तावुभौ शुकसारणौ । रावणं जयशब्देन प्रतिनन्द्याभिनिःसृतौ ॥
data.es: Ravana, having spoken that way, both Suka and Saarana felt shy and withdrew from speaking words of praise of Ravana saying, 'Let you be victorious'.
data.anv: एवम् that way, उक्तौ having spoken, तौशुकसारणौ both Suka and Saarana, सव्रीळौ feeling shy, रावणम् Ravana's, जयशब्देनप्रतिनन्द्य both praised saying ' let you be victorious', निस्सृतौ withdrew from there.

data.v: अब्रवीत्स दशग्रीवः समीपस्थं महोदरम् । उपस्थापय शीघ्रं मे चारान्नीतिविशारदान् ॥
data.es: Ravana, the tenheaded one, then said to Mahodara who was standing nearby swiftly bring spies who are experts in policy to me.
data.anv: अब्रवीत् said, स he, दशग्रीव tenheaded one (Ravana), समीपस्थम् who was standing nearby, महोदरम् Mahodara, उपस्थापय bring, मे to me, नीतिविशारद expert in policy, शीघ्रम् swiftly चारान् spies.

data.v: ततश्चराः संत्वरिताः प्राप्ताः पार्थिवशासनात् । उपस्थिताः प्राञ्जलयो वर्धयित्वा जयाशिषा ॥
data.es: (Ravana) Having said so, Mahodara ordered the spies to approach the king quickly. On reaching they greeted the king with folded hand s promoting h i m to' be victorious' and stood.
data.anv: तथा so, उक्त having said, महोदर Mahodara, शीघ्रम् swiftly, चरान् spies, आज्ञापयत् ordered, तत then, संत्वरिता quickly, पार्थिवशानात् as per the order of the King,, प्राप्ता approached, चारा spies, प्राञ्जलय greeted with folded hand s, जयशिषा saying 'be victorious', वर्धयित्वा promoting, उपस्थिता stood.

data.v: तानब्रवीत्ततो वाक्यं रावणो राक्षसाधिपः । चारान्प्रत्ययिकाञ्शूरान्भक्तान्विगतसाध्वसान् ॥
data.es: There upon the Lord of Rakshasas, spoke these words to those spies who are dependable ones, warriors devoid of fear of enemies.
data.anv: तत there upon, रक्षसाधिप Lord of Rakshasas, रावण Ravana, प्रात्ययितान् those who are dependable, शूरान् warriors, भक्तान् devotees, विगतसाध्वसान् who are devoid of fear of enemies, तान् चरान् those spies, वाक्यम् these words, अब्रवीत् spoke.

data.v: इतो गच्छत रामस्य व्यवसायं परीक्षथ । मन्त्रेष्वभ्यन्तरा येऽस्य प्रीत्या तेन समागताः ॥
data.es: "From here you go and reach there you may observe perceptions of Rama and of others close to him, his ministers and those who have reached there in affection to him."
data.anv: रामस्य Rama's, व्यवसायम् perception, अन्य of others, ये those, मन्त्रिषु ministers, अभ्यन्तरा close to him, प्रीत्या in affection, तेन to him, समागता who have reached there, परीक्षथ observing, इत from here, गच्छत go.

data.v: कथं स्वपिति जागर्ति किमन्यच्च करिष्यति । विज्ञाय निपुणं सर्वमागन्तव्यमशेषतः ॥
data.es: "You may see how he goes to sleep, how he wakes up etc., what he does, everything. You may come after knowing everything."
data.anv: कथम् how, स्वपिति he goes to sleep, जागर्ति wakes up, अन्य other, किम् what, करिष्यति he does, सर्वम् everything, अशेषत thoroughly, निपुणम् carefully, विज्ञाय knowing, आगन्तव्यम् you may come.

data.v: चारेण विदितः शत्रुः पण्डितैर्वसुधाधिपैः । युद्धे स्वल्पेन यत्नेन समासाद्य निरस्यते ॥
data.es: "Wise kings of the land, having known about enemies from the spies destroy enemies in war with little effort."
data.anv: पण्डितै wise, वसुधाधिपै kings of the land, चारेण from the spies, विदित knowing, शत्रु enemies, युद्धे in war, समासाद्य having known, स्वल्पेन little, यत्नेन effort, निरस्यते destroy.

data.v: चारास्तु ते तथेत्युक्त्वा प्रहृष्टा राक्षसेश्वरम् । कृत्वा प्रदक्षिणं जग्मुर्यत्र रामः सलक्ष्मणः ॥
data.es: The spies then gladly uttered the words 'be it so', went round the king in reverence and departed with Saardula leading in front.
data.anv: ते those, चारास्तु spies then, प्रहृष्टा gladly, तथेति saying 'be it so', उक्त्वा having uttered, शार्दूलम् Saardula, अग्रत in front, कृत्वा keeping, राक्षसेश्वरम् Rakshasa king, प्रदक्षिणम् going round in reverence (the king), चक्रु departed.

data.v: ते सुवेलस्य शैलस्य समीपे रामलक्ष्मणौ । प्रच्छन्ना ददृशुर्गत्वा ससुग्रीवविभीषणौ ॥
data.es: Reaching the Suvela mountain in disguise, they saw Rama and Lakshmana along with Sugriva and Vibheeshana.
data.anv: ते hey, गत्वा reaching, प्रच्छन्ना in disguise, सुवेलस्यशैलस्य Suvela mountain, समीपे near, ससुग्रीवविभीषणौ Sugriva and Vibheeshana, रामलक्ष्मणौ Rama and Lakshmana, ददृशु saw.

data.v: ते तु धर्मात्मना दृष्टा राक्षसेन्द्रेण राक्षसाः । विभीषणेन तत्रस्था निगृहीता यदृच्छया ॥
वानरैरर्दितास्ते तु विक्रान्तैर्लघुविक्रमैः । पुनर्लङ्कामनुप्राप्ताः श्वसन्तो नष्टचेतसः ॥
data.es: Harassed by the valorous and swift Vanaras, those Rakshasas lost their senses and returned to Lanka gasping and panting.
data.anv: विक्रान्तै by the valorous ones, लघुविक्रमै swift ones, वानरै Vanaras, अर्दिता harassed, ते those, तु those Rakshasas, श्वसन्त gasping, पुन again, लङ्काम् to Lanka, नष्टचेतस lost their senses, अनुप्राप्ता returned.

data.v: ततो दशग्रीवमुपस्थितास्ते; चारा बहिर्नित्यचरा निशाचराः । गिरेः सुवेलस्य समीपवासिनं; न्यवेदयन्भीमबलं महाबलाः ॥
ततस्तमक्षोभ्य बलं लङ्काधिपतये चराः । सुवेले राघवं शैले निविष्टं प्रत्यवेदयन् ॥
data.es: Thereafter, the spies reported to the king of Lanka that Raghava had camped with an unshakable army at the Suvela mountain.
data.anv: तत thereafter, चरा the spies, अक्षोभ्यबलम् unshakable army, तम् them, राघवम् Raghava, सुवेलेशैले Suvela mountain, निविष्टम् camped, लङ्काधिपतये to the king of Lanka, प्रत्यवेदयन् reported.

data.v: चाराणां रावणः श्रुत्वा प्राप्तं रामं महाबलम् । जातोद्वेगोऽभवत्किंचिच्छार्दूलं वाक्यमब्रवीत् ॥
data.es: On hearing from the spies that Rama has camped with a great army, Ravana got a little panicky and said these words to Saardula.
data.anv: रावण Ravana, महाबलम् great army, रामम् Rama, प्राप्तम् has camped, चाराणाम् from Spies, श्रुत्वा having heard, किञ्चित् a little, जातोद्वेग felt panicky, अभवत् became, शार्दूलम् to Saardula, वाक्यम् these words, अब्रवीत् said.

data.v: अयथावच्च ते वर्णो दीनश्चासि निशाचर । नासि कच्चिदमित्राणां क्रुद्धानां वशमागतः ॥
data.es: "O Forest ranger! Your face is not as it should be and also pitiable. Hope the angry enemies have not done anything to you."
data.anv: निशाचर forest ranger, ते your, वर्ण colour (face colour), आयथावत् च as it should be, दीनश्च piteous, अपि and also, क्रुद्धानाम् angry, अमित्राणाम् enemies, वशम् side, नआगतःकच्चित् not come to you and done anything.

data.v: इति तेनानुशिष्टस्तु वाचं मन्दमुदीरयत् । तदा राक्षसशार्दूलं शार्दूलो भयविह्वलः ॥
data.es: And there after questioned by him (Ravana) Saardula revealed these words overwhelmed by fear, in faint tone to the tiger among Rakshasas.
data.anv: इति and then, तेन by him, अनुशिष्ट questioned, भयविह्वल overwhelmed by fear, शार्दूल to Saardula, तदा then, राक्षसशार्दूलम् tiger among Rakshasas, मन्दम् faint tone, वाचम् these words, उदीरयत् revealed.

data.v: न ते चारयितुं शक्या राजन्वानरपुंगवाः । विक्रान्ता बलवन्तश्च राघवेण च रक्षिताः ॥
data.es: "O King! the Vanara heroes are valiant and highly powerful. They are also protected by Rama. It is not possible to spy on them."
data.anv: राजन् O king!, विक्रान्ता valiant, बलवन्तश्च highly powerful, राघवेण by Raghava, रक्षिताःच are protected also, ते with them, वानरपुङ्गवा Vanara heroes, चारयितुम् spy on, नशक्या not possible.

data.v: नापि संभाषितुं शक्याः संप्रश्नोऽत्र न लभ्यते । सर्वतो रक्ष्यते पन्था वानरैः पर्वतोपमैः ॥
data.es: "O king of Rakshasas! It was not possible to negotiate there with the Vanaras). I had no opportunity to interrogate with them. By nature, Vanaras are violent and are highly furious."
data.anv: राक्षसाधिप king of Rakshasas, ते to you, सम्भाषितुम् to negotiate, नशक्याः was not possible, अत्र there, सम्प्रश्नः to question, नलम्यते had no opportunity, वानराः Vanaras, प्रकृत्या by nature, कोपनाः are violent, तीक्ष्णाः highly furious.

data.v: प्रविष्टमात्रे ज्ञातोऽहं बले तस्मिन्नचारिते । बलाद्गृहीतो बहुभिर्बहुधास्मि विदारितः ॥
data.es: "No sooner I entered their army, I was detected. I was forcibly seized by their guards and rolled on the ground."
data.anv: तस्मिन् their, बले army, प्रविष्टमात्रे as soon as I entered into, अचारिते was observed, अहम् I, ज्ञात was detected, रक्षोभि even the guards, बलात् forcibly, गृहीत seized, बहुधा many, विचालित rolled on ground, अस्मि me.

data.v: जानुभिर्मुष्टिभिर्दन्तैस्तलैश्चाभिहतो भृशम् । परिणीतोऽस्मि हरिभिर्बलवद्भिरमर्षणैः ॥
data.es: "The monkeys had beaten me with fists, bitten my palms with teeth, beaten me intensely and paraded me in the army indignantly."
data.anv: जानुभि with knees, मुष्टिभि with fist, दन्ते with teeth, तलैश्च and even with palms, भृशम् intensely, अभिहत beaten, अमर्षणै indignantly, हरिभि the monkeys, बलवद्भि in the army, परिणीत paraded, आस्मि me.

data.v: परिणीय च सर्वत्र नीतोऽहं रामसंसदम् । रुधिरादिग्धसर्वाङ्गो विह्वलश्चलितेन्द्रियः ॥
data.es: "With all my limbs wet with bleeding, control over senses lost, after parading, I was led to the assembly of Rama."
data.anv: रुधिरादिग्धसर्वाङ्ग all limbs bleeding, विह्वल lost senses, चलितेन्द्रिय lost control of limbs, अहम् I, सर्वत्रपरिणीय all over paraded, रामसंसदम् to the assembly of Rama, नीत led.

data.v: हरिभिर्वध्यमानश्च याचमानः कृताञ्जलिः । राघवेण परित्रातो जीवामि ह यदृच्छया ॥
data.es: "While smitten by the monkeys, offering salutation with folded hands, and pleading for protection from Raghava, luckily, I am alive."
data.anv: हरिभि monkeys also, वध्यमान smitten, कृताञ्जलि offering salutation with folded palms, याचमान pleading, राघवेण from Raghava, परित्रात protection, यदृच्छया by chance, जीवामीति alive.

data.v: एष शैलैः शिलाभिश्च पूरयित्वा महार्णवम् । द्वारमाश्रित्य लङ्काया रामस्तिष्ठति सायुधः ॥
data.es: "Having filled the great ocean with rocks and stones in that way, taking position at the entrance of Lanka Rama stands equipped with arms."
data.anv: एष that way, राम Rama, शैलै rocks, शिलाभिश्च and even stones, महावर्णवम् great ocean, पूरयित्वा filled, सायुध equipped with arms, लङ्काया Lanka's, द्वारम् entrance, आश्रित्य taking position, तिष्ठति stands.

data.v: गरुडव्यूहमास्थाय सर्वतो हरिभिर्वृतः । मां विसृज्य महातेजा लङ्कामेवाभिवर्तते ॥
data.es: "O glorious King! After releasing me, Rama is advancing into Lanka surrounded by mountains like a monkey army in the form of Garuda."
data.anv: महातेजा O glorious one, माम् me, विसृज्य freeing, हरिभि even monkeys, गरुडव्यूहम् in the form of Garuda, आस्थाय forming, पर्वत mountain, वृत surrounded, लङ्कामेव into Lanka, अभिवर्तते is advancing.

data.v: पुरा प्राकारमायाति क्षिप्रमेकतरं कुरु । सीतां चास्मै प्रयच्छाशु सुयुद्धं वा प्रदीयताम् ॥
data.es: "They will reach the boundary wall. At once you may do one of the two that I suggest you do. I implore you either to give away Sita or give good battle."
data.anv: प्राकारम् boundary, पुरा of the city, आयान्ति will reach, क्षिप्रम् at once, एकतरम् one of the two, कुरु do, अस्मै you may, आसु give back, सीताम् Sita, प्रयच्छवा or implore you, सुयुद्धम् वापि or give good battle, प्रदीयताम् I suggest you

data.v: मनसा संततापाथ तच्छ्रुत्वा राक्षसाधिपः । शार्दूलस्य महद्वाक्यमथोवाच स रावणः ॥
data.es: "Having heard what has been said by Saardula, Rakshasa king reviewed in his mind and made a good statement before Saardula."
data.anv: राक्षसाधिप Rakshasa king, स that, रावण Ravana, तदा then, तत् that, श्रुत्वा having heard, मनसा in his mind, तत् that, प्रेक्ष्य reviewing, अथ and then, शार्दूलम् Saardula, सुमहत् a good, वाक्यम् statement, उवाच uttered.

data.v: यदि मां प्रतियुध्येरन्देवगन्धर्वदानवाः । नैव सीतां प्रदास्यामि सर्वलोकभयादपि ॥
data.es: "Even if gods, Gandharvas and demons come to wage war with me, even if all the worlds threaten me, I shall not give away Sita."
data.anv: देवगन्धर्वदानवाः gods, Gandharvas and demons, माम् with me, प्रतियुध्येरन्नपि even if come to wage war, सर्वलोकभयादपि even if all worlds threaten me, सीताम् Sita, नावप्रदास्यामि I shall not give away.

data.v: एवमुक्त्वा महातेजा रावणः पुनरब्रवीत् । चारिता भवता सेना केऽत्र शूराः प्लवंगमाः ॥
data.es: Glorious Ravana having spoken like that, again said (to Saardula), "You moved about in the army (camp) there. Tell me who among the monkeys are warriors?"
data.anv: महातेजाः glorious, रावणः Ravana, एवम् in that manner, उक्त्वा having spoken, पुनः again, अब्रवीत् said, भवता by you, सेना army, चरिता went about, अत्र there, शूराः warriors, प्लवङ्गमाः among the monkeys.

data.v: कीदृशाः किंप्रभावाश्च वानरा ये दुरासदाः । कस्य पुत्राश्च पौत्राश्च तत्त्वमाख्याहि राक्षस ॥
data.es: "Gentle Saardula! Of those who are difficult to encounter, what is their description? Who are the powerful ones among them? Whose sons and grandsons, are they? You may speak."
data.anv: राक्षस Rakshasa, सौम्य gentle one, दुरासदा difficult to encounter, ये those, वानरा Vanaras, किम् प्रभा who are the powerful ones?, कीदृशा of what kind कस्य whose, पुत्रा sons (are they?), पौत्राश्च grandsons (are they?), तत् it, त्वम् you, आख्याहि may speak of.

data.v: तत्रत्र प्रतिपत्स्यामि ज्ञात्वा तेषां बलाबलम् । अवश्यं बलसंख्यानं कर्तव्यं युद्धमिच्छता ॥
data.es: "Likewise knowing their strengths and weaknesses from you I wish to know what to do. It is essential to know their numbers and strength before the war."
data.anv: तेषाम् their, बलाबलम् strength and weakness, ज्ञात्वा knowing, अत्र here, तथा likewise, प्रतिपत्स्यामि I would like to know what to do, युद्धम् war, इच्छताम् desiring, सङ् ख्यानम् their numbers, अवश्यम् essential, बल strength, कर्तव्यं it is essential.

data.v: अथैवमुक्तः शार्दूलो रावणेनोत्तमश्चरः । इदं वचनमारेभे वक्तुं रावणसंनिधौ ॥
data.es: "When Ravana had spoken that way, good spy Saardula proceeded to tell these words in the presence of Ravana."
data.anv: अथ and now, रावणेन by Ravana, एवम् that way, उक्त having spoken, उत्तमःचर good spy, शार्दूल Saardula, रावणसन्निधौ in the presence of Ravana, इदम् thus, वचनम् these words, वक्तुम् to tell, आरेभे proceeded.

data.v: अथर्क्षरजसः पुत्रो युधि राजन्सुदुर्जयः । गद्गदस्याथ पुत्रोऽत्र जाम्बवानिति विश्रुतः ॥
data.es: "Certainly, king Sugriva, the son of Rksharaja's, is difficult to be conquered in battle. Here is the son of Gadgada, famously called as Jambavan."
data.anv: अथ and then, र्क्षरजसः Rksaraja's, पुत्रो son, in war, राजा king, सुदुर्जयः difficult to win over, युधि in war, विश्रुतः widely known, जाम्बवानिति he is known as Jambavan गद्गदस्याथ Gadgada's पुत्त्रोऽत्र son.

data.v: गद्गदस्यैव पुत्रोऽन्यो गुरुपुत्रः शतक्रतोः । कदनं यस्य पुत्रेण कृतमेकेन रक्षसाम् ॥
data.es: Another son of Gadgada is Dhumra. One who killed many Rakshasas is Hanuman, the son of Kesari, who is the son of Brhaspati.
data.anv: आन्य another, गद्गदस्यैव Gadgada's, पुत्त्र son, शतक्रतो an epithet of Indra, (known as Dhumra), गुरुपुत्र son of Brhaspati, (Kesari), यस्य his, पुत्रेण by his son Hanuman, एकेन alone, रक्षसाम् Rakshasas, कदनम् killing of many, कृतम् did.

data.v: सुषेणश्चापि धर्मात्मा पुत्रो धर्मस्य वीर्यवान् । सौम्यः सोमात्मजश्चात्र राजन्दधिमुखः कपिः ॥
data.es: "O king! Here is a heroic and righteous Sushena, the son of the Lord of death (Yamadharma). Here is Dadhimukha son of noble moon."
data.anv: राजन् O king!, धर्मात्म righteous self, पुत्र son, वीर्यवान् a valiant one, धर्मास्य of the Lord of death (Yamadharma), सुषेणश्च Sushena, अत्र here, स्सोमात्मज moon's son, सौम्य noble, कपि Vanara, अत्र here, दधिमुख Dadhimukha.

data.v: सुमुखो दुर्मुखश्चात्र वेगदर्शी च वानरः । मृत्युर्वानररूपेण नूनं सृष्टः स्वयम्भुवा ॥
data.es: "Vanaras Sumukha, Durmukha and Vegadarsi are surely created by Brahma in the Vanara form of DeathGod."
data.anv: सुमुख Sumukha, दुर्मुखश्चात्र Durmukha, वेगदर्शीच Vegadarsi, वानर Vanaras, नूनम् surely, स्वयम्भुवा by the selfborn (Lord Brahma), वानररूपेण in Vanara form, सृष्ट created, मृत्यु God of death.

data.v: पुत्रो हुतवहस्याथ नीलः सेनापतिः स्वयम् । अनिलस्य च पुत्रोऽत्र हनूमानिति विश्रुतः ॥
data.es: "The firegod's son indeed is the army chief known as Nila, and here is windgod's son widely known as Hanuman."
data.anv: हुतवहस्य fire god's, पुत्त्र son, स्वयम् himself, सेनापति army chief, नील Nila, अथ here, हनूमानिति is Hanuman, विश्रुत widely known, अनिलस्यपुत्र son of wind god.

data.v: नप्ता शक्रस्य दुर्धर्षो बलवानङ्गदो युवा । मैन्दश्च द्विविदश्चोभौ बलिनावश्विसंभवौ ॥
पुत्रा वैवस्वतस्यात्र पञ्चकालान्तकोपमाः । गजो गवाक्षो गवयः शरभो गन्धमादनः ॥
श्वेतो ज्योतिर्मुखश्चात्र भास्करस्यात्मसंभवौ । वरुणस्य च पुत्रोऽथ हेमकूटः प्लवंगमः ॥
data.es: "Here are Swetha and Jyothirmukha sons of Sun god Hemakuta another son of Varuna Nala the foremost among the monkey heroes is the valiant son of Vishwakarma and Durdhara of swift action, the son of Vasu."
data.anv: भास्करस्य Sun god's, आत्मसम्भवौ sprung from Sun god, श्वेत Swetha, ज्योतिर्मुखश्च Jyothirmukha, वरुणस्य Varuna's, अन्यःपुत्त्र other son, हेमकूट Hemakuta, प्लवङ्गम monkey, विश्वकर्मसुत son of Vishwakarma, वीर heroes, प्लवगसत्तम foremost among the monkeys, नल Nala, विक्रान्त valiant, बलवान् gallant, वसुपुत्र son of Vasu, विक्रान्त valiant, वेगवान् swift in action, वसुपुत्त्र son of Vasu, स he, दुर्धर is Durdhara, अत्र here.

data.v: विश्वकर्मसुतो वीरो नलः प्लवगसत्तमः । विक्रान्तो वेगवानत्र वसुपुत्रः सुदुर्धरः ॥
data.es: "Here are Swetha and Jyothirmukha sons of Sun god Hemakuta another son of Varuna Nala the foremost among the monkey heroes is the valiant son of Vishwakarma and Durdhara of swift action, the son of Vasu."
data.anv: भास्करस्य Sun god's, आत्मसम्भवौ sprung from Sun god, श्वेत Swetha, ज्योतिर्मुखश्च Jyothirmukha, वरुणस्य Varuna's, अन्यःपुत्त्र other son, हेमकूट Hemakuta, प्लवङ्गम monkey, विश्वकर्मसुत son of Vishwakarma, वीर heroes, प्लवगसत्तम foremost among the monkeys, नल Nala, विक्रान्त valiant, बलवान् gallant, वसुपुत्र son of Vasu, विक्रान्त valiant, वेगवान् swift in action, वसुपुत्त्र son of Vasu, स he, दुर्धर is Durdhara, अत्र here.

data.v: दशवानरकोट्यश्च शूराणां युद्धकाङ्क्षिणाम् । श्रीमतां देवपुत्राणां शेषान्नाख्यातुमुत्सहे ॥
पुत्रो दशरथस्यैष सिंहसंहननो युवा । दूषणो निहतो येन खरश्च त्रिशिरास्तथा ॥
data.es: "That young one whose build is like a lion is Dasaratha's son who slayed Dushana, even Khara, like wise Trisira."
data.anv: सिंहसंहनन built like lion in form, एष that, युवा young one, दशरथस्य Dasaratha's, पुत्त्र son, त्रिशिरा Trisira.

data.v: नास्ति रामस्य सदृशो विक्रमे भुवि कश्चन । विराधो निहतो येन कबन्धश्चान्तकोपमः ॥
data.es: "Viradha and even Kabhanda who was like the Lord of death were killed by Rama. Perhaps there is none equal to Rama in valour in this world."
data.anv: येन by whom, विराध Viradha, निहत was killed, अन्तकोपम one like Lord of death, कबन्धश्च even Kabhanda, रामस्य Rama's, विक्रमे by valour, सदृश equal, कश्चन perhaps, भूवि in this world, नास्ति not.

data.v: वक्तुं न शक्तो रामस्य नरः कश्चिद्गुणान्क्षितौ । जनस्थानगता येन तावन्तो राक्षसा हताः ॥
data.es: "It is not even possible to recount the virtues of Rama who killed all the Rakshasas approaching Janasthana."
data.anv: येन by whom, जनस्थानगता approaching Janasthana, यावन्त all, राक्षसा Rakshasas, हता were killed, रामस्य by Rama, गुणान् virtues, वक्तुम् to speak of, नर human, कश्चित् even, क्षितौ to recount, नशक्त not possible.

data.v: लक्ष्मणश्चात्र धर्मात्मा मातंगानामिवर्षभः । यस्य बाणपथं प्राप्य न जीवेदपि वासवः ॥
data.es: "Here is righteous Lakshmana, who is like a bull (foremost) resembling a proud elephant. Even Indra will not be alive with in the range of his arrows when he strikes."
data.anv: यस्य his, बाणपथम् within the range of arrows, प्राप्य strike, वासवःअपि even Indra, नजीवेत् not be alive, धर्मात्मा righteous, मातङ्गानाम् proud elephant, ऋषभःइव like a bull, लक्ष्मणश्च Lakshmana's, अत्र here.

data.v: राक्षसानां वरिष्ठश्च तव भ्राता विभीषणः । परिगृह्य पुरीं लङ्कां राघवस्य हिते रतः ॥
data.es: "Here is your brother Vibheeshana the jewel among Rakshasas, who remains as a wellwisher of Rama and has received the city of Lanka (to whom Rama has offered Lanka)."
data.anv: राक्षसानाम् of the Rakshasas, वरिष्ठश्च jewel, तव your, भ्राता brother, विभीषण Vibheeshana, राघवस्य Raghava's, हिते wellwisher, रत remains, लङ्कापुरीम् city of Lanka, प्रतिगृह्य received.

data.v: इति सर्वं समाख्यातं तवेदं वानरं बलम् । सुवेलेऽधिष्ठितं शैले शेषकार्ये भवान्गतिः ॥
data.es: "I have described to you everything about the Vanara strength stationed on Suvela mountain. You may decide the rest of the task to be done."॥ इत्यार्षेवाल्मीकीयेश्रीमद्रामायणेआदिकाव्येयुद्धकाण्डेत्रिंशस्सर्गः ॥This is the end of the thirtieth sarga of Yuddha Kanda of the first epic the holy Ramayana composed by sage Valmiki.
data.anv: इति this, सुवेलेशैले on Suvela mountain, अधिष्ठितम् stationed, इदम् thus, सर्वम् everything, वानरंबलम् Vanara strength, तवइदं to you this, समाख्यातम् described, शेषकार्ये rest of the task, भवान् your, गति decide.

data.v: ततस्तमक्षोभ्यबलं लङ्कायां नृपतेश्चरः । सुवेले राघवं शैले निविष्टं प्रत्यवेदयन् ॥
data.es: Thereafter, the spies reported to the king of Lanka that Raghava had camped with an unshakable army at the Suvela mountain.
data.anv: तत thereafter, चरा the spies, अक्षोभ्यबलम् unshakable army, तम् them, राघवम् Raghava, सुवेलेशैले Suvela mountain, निविष्टम् camped, लङ्काधिपतये to the king of Lanka, प्रत्यवेदयन् reported.

data.v: चाराणां रावणः श्रुत्वा प्राप्तं रामं महाबलम् । जातोद्वेगोऽभवत्किंचित्सचिवांश्चेदमब्रवीत् ॥
data.es: On hearing from the spies that Rama has camped with a great army, Ravana got a little panicky and said these words to Saardula.
data.anv: रावण Ravana, महाबलम् great army, रामम् Rama, प्राप्तम् has camped, चाराणाम् from Spies, श्रुत्वा having heard, किञ्चित् a little, जातोद्वेग felt panicky, अभवत् became, शार्दूलम् to Saardula, वाक्यम् these words, अब्रवीत् said.

data.v: मन्त्रिणः शीघ्रमायान्तु सर्वे वै सुसमाहिताः । अयं नो मन्त्रकालो हि संप्राप्त इव राक्षसाः ॥
data.es: "The time has come for us to call for all the rakshasas and ministers immediately and assemble (said Ravana)."
data.anv: नः for us, अयम् this is, मन्त्रकालः time to think, सम्प्राप्तः has come इति thus, मन्त्रिणः with ministers, राक्षसाः Rakshasas, सर्वे all, सुसमाहिताः all of them assembled, शीघ्रम् immediately, अयान्तु let them be called.

data.v: तस्य तच्छासनं श्रुत्वा मन्त्रिणोऽभ्यागमन्द्रुतम् । ततः संमन्त्रयामास सचिवै राक्षसैः सह ॥
data.es: Having been ordered (by Ravana) that way, the ministers along with Rakshasas instantly reached and he started to think with them.
data.anv: तस्य his, तत् that, शासनम् order, श्रुत्वा having hard, मन्त्रिणः ministers, द्रुवम् instantly, अभ्यागमन् reached, ततः then, सः he, राक्षसैः to Rakshasa, सचिवैः ministers सह along with, मन्त्रयामास started to think.

data.v: मन्त्रयित्वा स दुर्धर्षः क्षमं यत्समनन्तरम् । विसर्जयित्वा सचिवान्प्रविवेश स्वमालयम् ॥
data.es: Thereafter, thinking about what is appropriate to do, unassailable Ravana dispensed his ministers and entered his own residence.
data.anv: दुर्दर्षः unassailable, अनन्तरम् after that, यत् that which, क्षमम् proper, तत् that, मन्त्रयित्वा thinking over, सचिवान् minister, विसर्जयित्वा dispensed away, स्वम् his own, आलयम् residence, प्रविवेश entered.

data.v: ततो राक्षसमाहूय विद्युज्जिह्वं महाबलम् । मायाविदं महामायः प्राविशद्यत्र मैथिली ॥
data.es: Then Ravana of extraordinary skills sent for Vidyujihvam, a learned one in conjuring tricks and went from there to Mythili.
data.anv: ततः then, महामायः extraordinary skills, महाबलम् mighty, मायाविदम् learned in conjuring tricks, विद्युज्जिह्वम् Vidyujihvam, आदाय sent for, मैथिली Mythili, यत्र there, प्राविशत् went.

data.v: विद्युज्जिह्वं च मायाज्ञमब्रवीद्राक्षसाधिपः । मोहयिष्यामहे सीतां मायया जनकात्मजाम् ॥
data.es: Rakshasa king Ravana said to Vidyujihvam who knew conjuring tricks, "We will cheat Sita, daughter of Janaka by a trick."
data.anv: राक्षसाधिपः Rakshasa king, मायाज्ञाम् one who knows conjuring ricks, विद्युज्जिह्वम् Vidyujihvam, अब्रवीत् च and said, जनकात्मजाम् Janaka's daughter, सीताम् Sita, मायया by making trick, मोहयिष्यानहे will cheat.

data.v: शिरो मायामयं गृह्य राघवस्य निशाचर । मां त्वं समुपतिष्ठस्व महच्च सशरं धनुः ॥
data.es: "O Night ranger! You make an illusory head of Raghava and come and stand at me holding an arrow with great bow."
data.anv: निशाचर night ranger, राघवस्य Raghava's, मायामयम् an illusory, शिरः head, सशरम् an arrow, महात् great, धनुःच and bow also, गृह्य seizing, माम् to me, त्वम् you, समुपतिष्ठस्व come and stand.

data.v: एवमुक्तस्तथेत्याह विद्युज्जिह्वो निशाचरः । तस्य तुष्टोऽभवद्राजा प्रददौ च विभूषणम् ॥
data.es: When the Rakshasa king had spoken that way to Vidyujihvam, he said, "Be it so." Pleased with the dexterous production of Vidyujihvam, Ravana presented to him a beautiful ornament.
data.anv: एवम् in that way, उक्तः having spoken, निशाचरः night ranger, विद्युज्जिह्वः Vidyujihvam, तथेति be it so, आह striking, सुप्रयुक्ताम् dexterously produced, तांमायाम् by the tricker, सः that, रावणे to Ravana, दर्शयामास showed, राजा king, तस्य his, तुष्टः pleased, आभवत् विभूषणम् beautiful ornament, प्रददेच presented.

data.v: अशोकवनिकायां तु प्रविवेश महाबलः । ततो दीनामदैन्यार्हां ददर्श धनदानुजः । अधोमुखीं शोकपरामुपविष्टां महीतले ॥
data.es: Thereafter, the younger brother of Kubera (Ravana) saw sad Sita, who did not deserve that piteous condition, who had been reduced to sorrowful state, seated on the ground in Asoka grove, with her head bent down filled with sorrow contemplating on her husband alone.
data.anv: ततः there upon, धनदानुजः brother of Kubera, दीनाम् sad, अदैन्यार्हाम् who did not deserve that piteous condition, अथोमुखीम् bending down her head, शोकपराम् filled with sorrow, अशोकवनिकाम् in the Asoka grove, गताम् reduced to that state, महीतले on the ground, उपविष्टाम् seated, भर्तारमेव only about her husband, ध्यायन्तीम् contemplating, ददर्श saw.

data.v: भर्तारमेव ध्यायन्तीमशोकवनिकां गताम् । उपास्यमानां घोराभी राक्षसीभिरदूरतः ॥
उपसृत्य ततः सीतां प्रहर्षन्नाम कीर्तयन् । इदं च वचनं धृष्टमुवाच जनकात्मजाम् ॥
data.es: While she was guarded by dreadful Rakshasa women surrounding her closely, Ravana went near her happily and saw her. He addressed Sita praising her.
data.anv: ततः then, अरितस्ततः guarded by enemies, घोराभिः dreadful, राक्षसीभिः Rakshasas also, उपास्यमानाम् closely surrounded by, सीताम् while Sita, उपसृत्य went near, प्रहर्षंनाम happy, कीर्तयन् praising, जनकात्मजाम् Sita, daughter of Janaka, धृष्टम् saw, इदंवचनम् these words, उवाच addressed.

data.v: सान्त्व्यमाना मया भद्रे यमुपाश्रित्य वल्गसे । खर हन्ता स ते भर्ता राघवः समरे हतः ॥
data.es: "O Auspicious one! However, much I have requested you, you did not care for me seeking your husband. Raghava, who killed Khara, has been killed in war."
data.anv: भद्रे O auspicious one, मया my, सान्त्व्यमाना however much requested, यम् whom, उपाश्रित्य seeking, विमन्यसे you did not care for me, सः that, तेभर्ता your husband, खरहन्ता who slayed Khara, राघवः Raghava, समरे in war, हतः killed.

data.v: छिन्नं ते सर्वतो मूलं दर्पस्ते निहतो मया । व्यसनेनात्मनः सीते मम भार्या भविष्यसि ॥
data.es: "O Sita! All your roots have been crushed by me. Give up your vanity. By your own accord, you become my wife."
data.anv: सीते O Sita, सर्वतः all, मया my me, मूलम् roots, छिन्नम् crushed, दर्पतः vanity, विहतः give up, आत्मनः your own, व्यसनेन by your own self will, मम my, भार्या wife, भविष्यसि will be.

data.v: अल्पपुण्ये निवृत्तार्थे मूढे पण्डितमानिनि । शृणु भर्तृबधं सीते घोरं वृत्रवधं यथा ॥
data.es: "O woman of less merit! You are one who has given up all worldly actions. Stupid one! You pretend as if you know everything. O Sita! Hear about your husband 's death like that of Vrthasura."
data.anv: अल्पपुण्ये of less merit, निवृत्तार्थे one who has given up all worldly acts, मूढे stupid one, पण्डितमानिनि one who pretends as if she knows everything, सीते O Sita, वृत्रवधंयथा just as the slaying of Vrthasura, घोरम् terrific, भर्तृवधम् husband 's, शृणु hear.

data.v: समायातः समुद्रान्तं मां हन्तुं किल राघवः । वानरेन्द्रप्रणीतेन बलेन महता वृतः ॥
data.es: "Raghava led by the huge army force of the Vanara king has arrived on the seashore."
data.anv: राघवः Raghava, वानरेन्द्रप्रणीतेन led by Vanara king, महता huge, बलेन army force, वृतः surrounded, माम् me, हन्तुम् to kill, समुद्रान्तम् to the shore of the sea, समायातःकिल indeed has collected.

data.v: संनिविष्टः समुद्रस्य तीरमासाद्य दक्षिणम् । बलेन महता रामो व्रजत्यस्तं दिवाकरे ॥
data.es: And when the Sun moved towards the west, Rama encamped on the northern shore of the sea with a huge army to strike.
data.anv: अथ and then, दिवाकरे when Sun, अस्तम् sets, व्रजतिपति moved towards west, रामः Rama, महता huge, बलेन strength of army, समुद्रस्य ocean's, उत्तरम् northern, तीरम् shore, पीड्य to strike, सन्निविष्टः encamped.

data.v: अथाध्वनि परिश्रान्तमर्धरात्रे स्थितं बलम् । सुखसुप्तं समासाद्य चारितं प्रथमं चरैः ॥
data.es: After having walked all the way they slept well and when they were sleeping at midnight, we found out all about them by sending prime spies.
data.anv: अथ and then, अध्वनि having walked all the way, परिश्रान्तम् taking rest, अर्धरात्रे midnight, सुखसुप्तम् slept well, स्थितम् stayed, बलम् army, प्रथमम् prime, समासाद्य sending, चरैः spies, चारित्रं all about them.

data.v: तत्प्रहस्तप्रणीतेन बलेन महता मम । बलमस्य हतं रात्रौ यत्र रामः सुलक्ष्मणः ॥
data.es: "There in that camp Lakshmana and Rama are killed by my powerful army led by Prahastha at night."
data.anv: सलक्ष्मणः that Lakshmana, रामः Rama, यत्र where in, प्रहस्तप्रणीतेन led by Prahastha, महता great, ममबलेन by my army, अस्य their, बलम् powerful, रात्रौ in the night, हतम् slayed.

data.v: पट्टसान्परिघान्खड्गांश्चक्रान्दण्डान्महायसान् । बाणजालानि शूलानि भास्वरान्कूटमुद्गरान् ॥
data.es: Again, and again lifting spears, iron bars, javelins, huge staffs, sparkling maces, shining iron mallets and clubs, lances and strong Musalas, the Rakshasas hurled at Vanaras.
data.anv: पट्टशान् spears, परिघान् iron bars, चक्रान् javelins, दण्डान् staffs, महायशान् huge ones, बाणजालानि sparkling maces, शूलानि tridents, भास्वरान् shining, कूटमुद्गरान् iron mallets, यष्टीश्च and clubs, तोमरान् lances, शक्ती strong, मुसलानिच and Musalas, उद्यम्यउद्यम्य lifting again and again, रक्षोभिः Rakshasas, वानरेषु at Vanaras, निपातिताः hurled.

data.v: यष्टीश्च तोमरान्प्रासंश्चक्राणि मुसलानि च । उद्यम्योद्यम्य रक्षोभिर्वानरेषु निपातिताः ॥
data.es: Again, and again lifting spears, iron bars, javelins, huge staffs, sparkling maces, shining iron mallets and clubs, lances and strong Musalas, the Rakshasas hurled at Vanaras.
data.anv: पट्टशान् spears, परिघान् iron bars, चक्रान् javelins, दण्डान् staffs, महायशान् huge ones, बाणजालानि sparkling maces, शूलानि tridents, भास्वरान् shining, कूटमुद्गरान् iron mallets, यष्टीश्च and clubs, तोमरान् lances, शक्ती strong, मुसलानिच and Musalas, उद्यम्यउद्यम्य lifting again and again, रक्षोभिः Rakshasas, वानरेषु at Vanaras, निपातिताः hurled.

data.v: अथ सुप्तस्य रामस्य प्रहस्तेन प्रमाथिना । असक्तं कृतहस्तेन शिरश्छिन्नं महासिना ॥
data.es: "There after the head of Rama, who was sleeping, was severed by Prahastha, skilled at striking, with a big sword without any feeling of attachment."
data.anv: अथ thereafter, प्रमाथिना one who is capable of striking, कृतहस्तेन skilled, प्रहस्तेन by Prahastha, महासिना big sword, सुप्तस्य sleeping, रमस्य Rama's, शिरः head, असक्तं without any feeling of attachment, छिन्नम् severed.

data.v: विभीषणः समुत्पत्य निगृहीतो यदृच्छया । दिशः प्रव्राजितः सर्वैर्लक्ष्मणः प्लवगैः सह ॥
data.es: "When Vibheeshana rose up he was caught by chance. Lakshmana and Vanaras fled in all directions."
data.anv: यदृच्छया by chance, विभीषणः Vibheeshana, समुत्पत्य when rose up, निगृहीतः caught hold, लक्ष्मणः Lakshmana, प्लवगैःसह along with Vanaras, दिशम् directions, प्रव्राजितः fled.

data.v: सुग्रीवो ग्रीवया शेते भग्नया प्लवगाधिपः । निरस्तहनुकः शेते हनूमान्राक्षसैर्हतः ॥
data.es: "O Sita! Vanara Lord Sugriva with his neck broken, Hanuman with chin broken were killed by Rakshasas and are lying down fallen on the ground."
data.anv: सीते O Sita!, प्लवगाधिपः Vanara Lord, सुग्रीवः Sugriva, भग्नया broken, ग्रीनया neck, हनुमान् Hanuman, राक्षसैः by Rakshasas, निरस्तहनुकः chin broken, हतः killed, शेते lies fallen down.

data.v: जाम्बवानथ जानुभ्यामुत्पतन्निहतो युधि । पट्टसैर्बहुभिश्छिन्नो निकृत्तः पादपो यथा ॥
data.es: And while Jambavan was rising on his knees, he was struck by many iron bars in comb at and had fallen down like a tree.
data.anv: अथ and, जानुभ्याम् on the knees, उत्पतन् while rising up, जाम्बवान् Jambavan, युधि in combat, निहातः fallen down, बहुभिः many, पट्टसै: iron bars, छिन्नः struck, पादपोयथा like a tree, छिन्नः broken down.

data.v: मैन्दश्च द्विविदश्चोभौ निहतौ वानरर्षभौ । निःश्वसन्तौ रुदन्तौ च रुधिरेण समुक्षितौ ॥
data.es: "Mainda and Dwivida of huge bodies, who are slayers of enemies, the bulls among Vanaras are breathing hard, and bathed in blood roaring, having been cutin the middle of their body."
data.anv: व्यायतौ of huge body, अरिनिषूदनौ slayers of enemies, मैन्दश्च Mainda, द्विविदश्च and Dwivida, उभौ both, वानरर्षभौ bulls among Vanaras, निश्शसन्तौ breathing hard, रुदन्तौ roaring, रुधिरेण in blood, समुक्षितौ bathing, असिना sword, मध्ये in the midst, छिन्नौ cut.

data.v: असिनाभ्याहतश्छिन्नो मध्ये रिपुनिषूदनः । अभिष्टनति मेदिन्यां पनसः पनसो यथा ॥
नाराचैर्बहुभिश्छिन्नः शेते दर्यां दरीमुखः । कुमुदस्तु महातेजा निष्कूजन्सायकैर्हतः ॥
data.es: "Panasa is lying down on earth like jackfruit. Darimukha is lying down shattered by many arrows. Brilliant Kumuda too is torn off and silently lying down."
data.anv: पनसोयथा like jackfruit, पनसः Panasa, मेदिन्याम् on the earth, अनुतिष्ठति lying on the ground, दरीमुखः Darimukha, बहुभिः many, नाराचैः arrows, छिन्नः shattered, दर्याम् on the ground, शेते lying down, निष्कूजन् torn off, महातेजाः brilliant, कुमुदस्तु Kumuda too, सायकैः silently, कृतः lying.

data.v: अङ्गदो बहुभिश्छिन्नः शरैरासाद्य राक्षसैः । पातितो रुधिरोद्गारी क्षितौ निपतितोऽङ्गदः ॥
data.es: "By the many arrows of Rakshasas reaching towards Angada, he lies down chopped up and destroyed, with his armlets dropped down throwing up blood."
data.anv: पतितः fallen down, रुधिरोद्गारी throwing up blood, क्षितौ destroyed, निपतिताङ्गदः shoulder straps dropped down, अङ्गदः Angada, राक्षसैः by Rakshasas, आसाद्य reaching towards him, बहुभिः many, शरैः arrows, छिन्नः chopped.

data.v: हरयो मथिता नागै रथजालैस्तथापरे । शायिता मृदितास्तत्र वायुवेगैरिवाम्बुदाः ॥
data.es: "There, some of the sleeping Vanaras were crushed by elephants, so also, just as by the speed of wind the clouds are crushed the Vanaras are crushed to death."
data.anv: तत्र there, शयिता: sleeping ones, अपरे some, हरयः Vanaras, नागैः by elephants, तथा so also, रथजातैः by mass of clouds, वायुवेगैः by the speed of wind, अम्बुदाःइव like the clouds, मृदिताः are dead.

data.v: प्रद्रुताश्च परे त्रस्ता हन्यमाना जघन्यतः । अभिद्रुतास्तु रक्षोभिः सिंहैरिव महाद्विपाः ॥
data.es: "Some were followed behind as they were speeding like lions and mighty elephants afflicted and frightened, struck by Rakshasas."
data.anv: परे some, जघन्यतः followed behind, हन्यमानाः destroying, सिंहैः lions, महाद्विपा: इव like huge elephants, रक्षोभिः like Rakshasas, अभिद्रुताः severely afflicted, त्रस्ताः frightened, प्रहृताः struck.

data.v: सागरे पतिताः केचित्केचिद्गगनमाश्रिताः । ऋक्षा वृक्षानुपारूढा वानरैस्तु विमिश्रिताः ॥
data.es: "While a few Vanaras dived into the sea, some took refuge in the sky. Resorting to their natural way the Bears climbed the trees."
data.anv: केचित् a few, सागरे sea, पतिताः dived in, केचित् some, गगनम् sky, आश्रिताः sought refuge, ऋक्षाः Bears, वानरैः Vanaras, वृत्तिमाश्रिताः resorting to their ways, वृक्षान् trees, उपारूढाः climbed.

data.v: सागरस्य च तीरेषु शैलेषु च वनेषु च । पिङ्गाक्षास्ते विरूपाक्षैर्बहुभिर्बहवो हताः ॥
data.es: "Many fierceeyed Rakshasas killed several Vanaras on the shore of the ocean, in the mountains and woods."
data.anv: ते they, बहवः many, पिङ्गलाः those with yellowish brown eyes (Vanaras), सागरस्य in the ocean, तीरेषु on the shore, शैलेषुच on mountains, वनेषुच in woods, विरूपाक्षैः with fierce eyes, बहुभिः many, राक्षसैः by Rakshasas, हताः were killed.

data.v: एवं तव हतो भर्ता ससैन्यो मम सेनया । क्षतजार्द्रं रजोध्वस्तमिदं चास्याहृतं शिरः ॥
data.es: "In that way the army of your husband has been killed by Rakshasa army and his decayed head drenched in blood covered with dust has been brought."
data.anv: एवम् in that manner, ससैन्यः the army, तन your, भर्ता husband, सेनया army, हतः were killed, अस्य his, क्षथजार्द्रम् decayed and drenched in blood, रजोध्वस्तम् covered with dust particles, इदम् this, शिरः head, अहृतम् brought.

data.v: ततः परमदुर्धर्षो रावणो राक्षसेश्वरः । सीतायामुपशृण्वन्त्यां राक्षसीमिदमब्रवीत् ॥
data.es: Then Ravana, the highly unassailable king of Rakshasas spoke these words to the hearing of Sita.
data.anv: ततः then, परमदुर्धर्षः highly unassailable, राक्षसेश्वर king of Rakshasas, रावण Ravana, सीतायाम् while Sita, उशृण्वत्याम् to the hearing of, राक्षसीम् Rakshasas, इदम् these words, अब्रवीत् spoke.

data.v: राक्षसं क्रूरकर्माणं विद्युज्जिह्वं त्वमानय । येन तद्राघवशिरः संग्रामात्स्वयमाहृतम् ॥
data.es: "Bring that Rakshasa, Vidyujihvam of cruel deeds who brought Rama's head from the battlefield."
data.anv: येन he who, तत् that, राघवशिरः Rama's head, सङ्ग्रामात् from the battlefield, स्वयम् the one, आहृतम् who brought, क्रूरकर्माणम् one of cruel deeds, राक्षसम् Rakshasa, विद्युज्जिह्वम् Vidyujihvam, त्वमानयः bring along.

data.v: विद्युज्जिह्वस्ततो गृह्य शिरस्तत्सशरासनम् । प्रणामं शिरसा कृत्वा रावणस्याग्रतः स्थितः ॥
data.es: Then holding the head along with the bow, Vidyujihvam bowed his head down in salutation and stood in front of Ravana.
data.anv: ततः then, विद्यज्जिह्वः Vidyujihvam, सशरासनम् along with bow, तत् शिरः that head, गृह्य holding, शिरसा by his head, प्रणामम् bowing down in salutation, कृत्वा having done रावणस्य Ravana 's, अग्रतः in front, स्थितः stood.

data.v: तमब्रवीत्ततो राजा रावणो राक्षसं स्थितम् । विद्युज्जिह्वं महाजिह्वं समीपपरिवर्तिनम् ॥
data.es: Then the king, Ravana spoke to Vidyujihvam, the Rakshasa with extended tongue, who stood close by.
data.anv: ततः then, राज king, रावणः Ravana, महाजिह्वाम् one with extended tongue, समीपपरिवर्तिनम् who had come close, स्थितम् stood, राक्षसम् Rakshasa, तंविद्युज्जिह्वं to Vidyujihvam, अब्रवीत् spoke.

data.v: अग्रतः कुरु सीतायाः शीघ्रं दाशरथेः शिरः । अवस्थां पश्चिमां भर्तुः कृपणा साधु पश्यतु ॥
data.es: At once place the head of Dasaratha's son before that piteous woman. Let her see the ultimate status attained by her husband at the end (said Ravana).
data.anv: दाशरथेः Dasaratha's son's, शिरः head, शीघ्रम् at once, सीतायाः Sita's, अग्रतः before, कुरु place it, कृपणा piteous woman, भर्तुः to husband, पश्चिमाम् at the end, अवस्थाम् ultimate state, साधु attained, पश्यतु let her see.

data.v: एवमुक्तं तु तद्रक्षः शिरस्तत्प्रियदर्शनम् । उपनिक्षिप्य सीतायाः क्षिप्रमन्तरधीयत ॥
data.es: Having spoken immediately placed the head of Rama that was pleasing to see, by the side of Sita and went away.
data.anv: एवम् in that way, उक्तम् having spoken, तत् रक्षः that Rakshasa, प्रियदर्शनम् pleasing to see, तत् that, शिरः head, सीतायाः to Sita, उपनिक्षिप्य by the side of, क्षीप्रम् immediately, अन्तरधीयत went away.

data.v: रावणश्चापि चिक्षेप भास्वरं कार्मुकं महत् । त्रिषु लोकेषु विख्यातं सीतामिदमुवाच ह ॥
data.es: Thus addressed Ravana casting down the bright great bow that is famous in the three worlds.
data.anv: रावणश्चापि even Ravana, सीता Sita, इदम् thus, उवाचह addressed, त्रिषुलोकेषु in the three worlds, विख्यातम् famous, इति this, भास्वरम् bright, महत् great, कार्मुकम् bow, चिक्षेप casting down.

data.v: इदं तत्तव रामस्य कार्मुकं ज्यासमन्वितम् । इह प्रहस्तेनानीतं हत्वा तं निशि मानुषम् ॥
data.es: "Prahastha has brought this bow duly tied with the string after killing human Rama in the night."
data.anv: इदम् this, तवरामस्य your Rama's, ज्यासमावृतम duly strung, तत् that, कार्मुकम् bow, निशि in the night, तम् him, मानुषम् he human being, हत्वा after killing, इह here, प्रहस्तेन by Prahastha, अनीतम् has brought.

data.v: स विद्युज्जिह्वेन सहैव तच्छिरो; धनुश्च भूमौ विनिकीर्य रावणः । विदेहराजस्य सुतां यशस्विनीं; ततोऽब्रवीत्तां भव मे वशानुगा ॥
सा सीता तच्छिरो दृष्ट्वा तच्च कार्मुकमुत्तमम् । सुग्रीवप्रतिसंसर्गमाख्यातं च हनूमता ॥
नयने मुखवर्णं च भर्तुस्तत्सदृशं मुखम् । केशान्केशान्तदेशं च तं च चूडामणिं शुभम् ॥
एतैः सर्वैरभिज्ञानैरभिज्ञाय सुदुःखिता । विजगर्हेऽथ कैकेयीं क्रोशन्ती कुररी यथा ॥
सकामा भव कैकेयि हतोऽयं कुलनन्दनः । कुलमुत्सादितं सर्वं त्वया कलहशीलया ॥
data.es: "O Kaikeyi! Your desire is fulfilled with the killing of the delight of the race. You, who are given to creating quarrel have ruined the race."
data.anv: कैकेयि O Kaikeyi, सकामा desire fulfilled, भव of yours, कुलनन्दनः delight of the race, आयम् this, हतः killed, कलहशीलया one who is given to creating quarrel, त्वया by you, सर्वम् all, कुलम् race, उत्सादितम् have ruined.

data.v: आर्येण किं नु कैकेय्याः कृतं रामेण विप्रियम् । यद्गृहाच्चीरवसनस्तया प्रस्थापितो वनम् ॥
data.es: "Kaikeyi, you have given bark robes to prince Rama and sent him to the forest with me. What harm has he done for you? Thinking of this again and again Sita cried."
data.anv: आर्येण to the prince, रामेण to Rama, कैकेयी Kaikeyi, किमं what, विप्रियम् harm, कृतंनु you did, यत् to him, चीरवसनम् bark robes, त्वया by you, मया with me, वनम् forest, प्रस्थापितः cried.

data.v: एवमुक्त्वा तु वैदेही वेपमाना तपस्विनी । जगाम जगतीं बाला छिन्ना तु कदली यथा ॥
data.es: That miserable young, Vaidehi, having said so, fell on the ground trembling like a cut off banana plant.
data.anv: तपस्विनी miserable one, बाला young, वैदेही Vaidehi, एवम् in that way, उक्त्वा having said, वेपमाना trembling, छिन्ना cut off, कदळी banana, जगतीम् on to the ground, जगाम fell down.

data.v: सा मुहूर्तात्समाश्वस्य प्रतिलभ्य च चेतनाम् । तच्छिरः समुपाघ्राय विललापायतेक्षणा ॥
data.es: Broadeyed Sita, regaining her consciousness after a while, sat close to the head of Rama and lamented.
data.anv: आयुतेक्षणा broadeyed one, सा she, अथ and then, मुहूर्तात् for a while, समाश्वास्य regaining, चेतनाम् consciousness, परिलभ्य remaining behind, तत् that, शिरः head, समुपाघ्राय sitting close by, विललास lamented.

data.v: हा हतास्मि महाबाहो वीरव्रतमनुव्रता । इमां ते पश्चिमावस्थां गतास्मि विधवा कृता ॥
data.es: "O mightyarmed one! Alas you are killed while following heroic vow. I live to see you in the last state of your life, widowed. I am done."
data.anv: महाबाहो mightyarmed, वीरव्रतम् heroic vow, अनुव्रत following, हा alas, हतास्मि you are killed, ते you, इमाम् thus, पश्चिमावस्थाम् in the last state of life, गताआस्मि live to see you, विधवा widowed, कृता am done.

data.v: प्रथमं मरणं नार्या भर्तुर्वैगुण्यमुच्यते । सुवृत्तः साधुवृत्तायाः संवृत्तस्त्वं ममाग्रतः ॥
data.es: "O Rama, you are faithful to your vows, a noble one! It is said that because of a woman's faults, the husband will die. It is not even so as you died in front of a virtuous woman of good conduct."
data.anv: सुवृत्तः faithful to one's vows, प्रथमम् in front, भर्तुः husband 's, मरणम् death, नार्याः O noble one, वैगुण्यम् fault, उच्यते is said to be, त्वम् your, साधुवृत्तायाः of good conduct, मम I, अग्रतः in front, सम्वृत्तं virtuous one.

data.v: दुःखाद्दुःखं प्रपन्नाया मग्नायाः शोकसागरे । यो हि मामुद्यतस्त्रातुं सोऽपि त्वं विनिपातितः ॥
data.es: "I am in grief and filled with an ocean of sorrow. You who have come to save me and are also killed."
data.anv: दुःखात् in grief, दुःखम् grief, प्रपन्नायाः reaching at, शोकसागरे ocean of sorrow, मग्नायाः filled, यः who, त्वम् you, त्रातु, to save उद्यतः have come, सोऽपि you are also, विनिपातितः are killed.

data.v: सा श्वश्रूर्मम कौसल्या त्वया पुत्रेण राघव । वत्सेनेव यथा धेनुर्विवत्सा वत्सला कृता ॥
data.es: "O Raghava! Even my motherinlaw Kausalya is separated from her dear son just as cow is separated from calf."
data.anv: राघव Raghava, मम my, श्वश्रूः motherinlaw, कौसल्या Kausalya, वत्सला dear धेनुःयथा like a cow, पुत्रेण about son, त्वया likewise, वत्सेने about her dear son, विवत्साकृता is separated.

data.v: आदिष्टं दीर्घमायुस्ते यैरचिन्त्यपराक्रम । अनृतं वचनं तेषामल्पायुरसि राघव ॥
data.es: "O Raghava of incomprehensible valour! the words predicted by astrologers that your life is long is falsified. Your life has been short."
data.anv: राघव Raghava, अचिन्त्यपराक्रम of incomprehensible valour, ते you, आयुः life, दीर्घम् long, उददिष्टम् predicted by astrologers, राघव Raghava, तेषाम् their, वचनम् word, आनृतम् is falsified, अल्पायुः short life, असि has been.

data.v: अथ वा नश्यति प्रज्ञा प्राज्ञस्यापि सतस्तव । पचत्येनं तथा कालो भूतानां प्रभवो ह्ययम् ॥
data.es: "Or else, even the wisdom of a learned one is diffused and lost perhaps! the effect of time which is the cause of all living beings has caused this."
data.anv: अथवा or else, प्राज्ञास्यापिसतः even the learned ones, तन diffused, प्रज्ञा wisdom, नश्यति lost, यथा likewise, भूतानाम् living beings, प्रभवः effect, आयम् this, कालः time, एवम् in that way, पचति caused.

data.v: अदृष्टं मृत्युमापन्नः कस्मात्त्वं नयशास्त्रवित् । व्यसनानामुपायज्ञः कुशलो ह्यसि वर्जने ॥
data.es: "You are the knower of all sastras, and capable of warding off all calamities. How did death have a chance to meet you and overtake?"
data.anv: नयशास्त्रवित् knower of all sastras, त्वम् you, कस्मात् how did you meet, अदृष्टम् by chance, मृत्युम् death, आपन्नः overtakes you, उपायज्ञः ways of getting out, व्यसनानाम् calamities, वर्जने to ward off, कुशलः capable, असिहि you are also.

data.v: तथा त्वं संपरिष्वज्य रौद्रयातिनृशंसया । कालरात्र्या मयाच्छिद्य हृतः कमललोचनः ॥
data.es: "O lotuseyed Rama! After you have lost contact with me, the most horrible cruel night has killed you cutting you off from me."
data.anv: कमललोचन lotuseyed one, अतिनृशंसया most horrible, रौद्रया cruel, काळरात्य्रा dark night, तथा likewise, सम्परिष्वज्य after losing contact, मम me, आच्छिद्य cutting off, हृतः killed.

data.v: उपशेषे महाबाहो मां विहाय तपस्विनीम् । प्रियामिव शुभां नारीं पृथिवीं पुरुषर्षभ ॥
data.es: "O mightyarmed one! A bull among men and a noble one, you are embracing the earth as though it is your beloved and sleeping leaving me in the sky."
data.anv: महाबाहो mightyarmed one, पुरुषर्षभ bull among men, तपस्विनीम् noble one, माम् me, विहाय sky, पृथिवीम् the earth, प्रियामिव like beloved, समालशिष्य embraced, उपशेषे more over sleeping.

data.v: अर्चितं सततं यत्नाद्गन्धमाल्यैर्मया तव । इदं ते मत्प्रियं वीर धनुः काञ्चनभूषितम् ॥
data.es: "O Hero! This bow that was decorated with gold was always worshipped with sandal and flowers diligently by you and me with utmost devotion."
data.anv: वीर hero, इदम this, मया my, तव you, सततम् ever, यत्नात् diligently, गन्धमाल्यैः with sandal and flowers, अर्चितम् worshipped, मप्रतियम् with utmost devotion, काञ्चनभूषणम् decorated with gold, ते your, धनुः bow.

data.v: पित्रा दशरथेन त्वं श्वशुरेण ममानघ । पूर्वैश्च पितृभिः सार्धं नूनं स्वर्गे समागतः ॥
data.es: "O Sinless one! Surely you have reached heaven where your father, my fatherinlaw Dasaratha and your grandfathers have reached."
data.anv: अनघ sinless one, त्वम् by you, मम me, श्वशुरेण with fatherinlaw, पित्रा father, दशरथेन by Dasaratha, सर्वैः all, पितृभि grand fathers स्सार्दम् with all, नूनम् surely, स्वर्गे heaven, समागतः reached.

data.v: दिवि नक्षत्रभूतस्त्वं महत्कर्म कृतं प्रियम् । पुण्यं राजर्षिवंशं त्वमात्मनः समुपेक्षसे ॥
data.es: "In heaven, you will be seeing luminaries of the sky who are dear, who have done great deeds and earned merit and the royal sages of your own race."
data.anv: दिवि heaven, नक्षत्रभूतम् luminaries of the sky, प्रियम् dear, महत् great, कर्म deed, कृता done, त्वम् you, आत्मनः your own, पुण्यम् merit, राजर्षिवंशम् race of royal sages, समुपेक्षसे will be seeing.

data.v: किं मान्न प्रेक्षसे राजन्किं मां न प्रतिभाषसे । बालां बालेन संप्राप्तां भार्यां मां सहचारिणीम् ॥
data.es: "O King! I have come to you while I was young. I am your companion and wife also. Why are you not seeing me? Why are you not talking to me?"
data.anv: राजन् O king!, बाल्येन in young age, बालाम् from a young age, सम्प्राप्ताम् have come to you, सहचारिणीम् companion, भार्याम् our wife also, माम् me, नप्रेक्षसे you do not see, माम् me, किंना why, मांप्रतिभाषसे you are not talking to me.

data.v: संश्रुतं गृह्णता पाणिं चरिष्यामीति यत्त्वया । स्मर तन्मम काकुत्स्थ नय मामपि दुःखिताम् ॥
data.es: "O Kakutstha! while you held my hand (at the time of marriage) you promised that you will be with me and likewise promised to take me, a (wretched one) with you to the other world. Remembering that I am sad."
data.anv: काकुत्स्थ Kakutstha, पाणिम् hand, गृह्णता while held, त्वया by you, चरिष्यामिइति will be with you, यत् likewise, संश्रुतम् promised, तत् that, स्मरनाम remember, दुःखितम् sad, मामपि me too, नय such a one.

data.v: कस्मान्मामपहाय त्वं गतो गतिमतां वर । अस्माल्लोकादमुं लोकं त्यक्त्वा मामिह दुःखिताम् ॥
data.es: "O Jewel among those who attained good state! Why have you gone abandoning me dear? To which world have you gone from here? I am pained by your deserting me."
data.anv: गतिमताम् jewel among those who have good status, वर O jewel, त्वम् you, माम् me, अपहाय abandoning, कस्मात् why have you, गतः gone, दुखिःताम् I am pained, मामपि I am, त्यक्त्वा deserting, अस्मात् from this, लोकात् world, अमुम् heaven, लोकम् world.

data.v: कल्याणैरुचितं यत्तत्परिष्वक्तं मयैव तु । क्रव्यादैस्तच्छरीरं ते नूनं विपरिकृष्यते ॥
data.es: "This body which used to be decorated by me with auspicious items, with great respect is dragged by cruel animals."
data.anv: कल्याणैः auspicious, रुचितम् decorated, यत्तत् that which, मयैव by me, alone परिष्वक्तम् embracing, तत् that, शरीरम् body, मानम् with great respect, क्रव्यादैः cruel animals, इपरिकृष्यते is dragged.

data.v: अग्निष्टोमादिभिर्यज्ञैरिष्टवानाप्तदक्षिणैः । अग्निहोत्रेण संस्कारं केन त्वं तु न लप्स्यसे ॥
data.es: "Why are you, who performed all kinds of sacrificial rituals of fire with all offerings deserve sanctification without doing fire sacrifice?"
data.anv: आप्तदक्षिणैः all offerings into fire, अग्निष्टोमादिभिः offerings in sacrificial fire, यज्ञैः sacrifices, इष्टवान् which you deserve, त्वम् you, अग्निङोत्रेण by sacrificial performances of fire, संस्कारम् sanctification, केन why, नतुलप्स्यसे you are not getting.

data.v: प्रव्रज्यामुपपन्नानां त्रयाणामेकमागतम् । परिप्रक्ष्यति कौसल्या लक्ष्मणं शोकलालसा ॥
data.es: "Seeing only Lakshmana returning, of the three exiled, Kausalya will be immersed in grief (will ask)."
data.anv: शोकलालसा immersed in grief, कौसल्या Kausalya, प्रव्रज्याम् of the exiled ones, उपपन्नानाम् attended by, त्रयाणाम् of the three, आगतम् returning, एकम् alone, लक्ष्मणम् only Lakshmana, परिप्रेक्ष्यति will see returned.

data.v: स तस्याः परिपृच्छन्त्या वधं मित्रबलस्य ते । तव चाख्यास्यते नूनं निशायां राक्षसैर्वधम् ॥
data.es: "When she questions, he may tell that you and your army were killed by the army of friends at night."
data.anv: सः she, परिपृच्छन्त्याः when enquired by her, तस्याः you, निशायम् in the night, राक्षसैः by Rakshasas, तेमित्रबलस्य by the friend's army, वधम् slayed, तव your, बधंच and army, नूनम् indeed surely.

data.v: सा त्वां सुप्तं हतं श्रुत्वा मां च रक्षोगृहं गताम् । हृदयेन विदीर्णेन न भविष्यति राघव ॥
data.es: "Raghava! Hearing that you were killed while asleep and I was taken to the home of Rakshasas, Kausalya will not be able to survive with a broken heart."
data.anv: राघव Raghava, सा that, त्वाम् your, सुप्तम् while asleep, हतम् killed, माम् me, रक्षोगृहम् in the home of Rakshasas, गताम् taken, श्रुत्वा on hearing अविदीर्णन broken, हृदयेन heart, नभविष्यति will not survive.

data.v: साधु पातय मां क्षिप्रं रामस्योपरि रावणः । समानय पतिं पत्न्या कुरु कल्याणमुत्तमम् ॥
data.es: "O Ravana! You may quickly join me with my husband as it will be highly auspicious for the wife to join the husband."
data.anv: रावण Ravana, क्षिप्रम् quickly, माम् me, रामस्यउपरि on Rama, साधु do, पातय husband, सतिम् wife also, पत्नया with husband, समानय joined with, उत्तमम् highly, कल्याणम् auspicious, करु you may do.

data.v: शिरसा मे शिरश्चास्य कायं कायेन योजय । रावणानुगमिष्यामि गतिं भर्तुर्महात्मनः । मुहूर्तमपि नेच्छामि जीवितुं पापजीविना ॥
data.es: "O Ravana! Join my head with his and my body with his body. I will follow him in the same way."
data.anv: रावण Ravana, मेशिरसा my head, अस्य with his, शिरः head, कायेन body, कायम् with his body, येजय join, महात्मनः great soul, भर्तुः husband, गतिम् way, अनुगमिष्यामि will follow.

data.v: श्रुतं मया वेदविदां ब्राह्मणानां पितुर्गृहे । यासां स्त्रीणां प्रियो भर्ता तासां लोका महोदयाः ॥
क्षमा यस्मिन्दमस्त्यागः सत्यं धर्मः कृतज्ञता । अहिंसा चैव भूतानां तमृते का गतिर्मम ॥
इति सा दुःखसंतप्ता विललापायतेक्षणा । भर्तुः शिरो धनुस्तत्र समीक्ष्य जनकात्मजा ॥
data.es: Burning in sorrow, the broad eyed Sita gazing at the head of her husband and the bow again and again lamented.
data.anv: अयतेक्षणा broad eyed one, भर्तुः husband, शिरः head, धनुश्चैन at the bow, पुनःपुनः again and again, समीक्ष्य gazing, दुःखसन्तप्ता burning in sorrow, सइतिसा she thus, विलालस lamented.

data.v: एवं लालप्यमानायां सीतायां तत्र राक्षसः । अभिचक्राम भर्तारमनीकस्थः कृताञ्जलिः ॥
data.es: While Sita was wailing in that manner, as said earlier, the Rakshasa guarding her approached the king and offered salutations with both hands.
data.anv: सीतायां while Sita, एवम् in that way, लालप्यमानायाम् wailing as said before, तत्र there, अनीकस्थः guarding, राक्षसः Rakshasa, कृताञ्जालिः offered salutation, भर्तारम् to the king, अभिचक्राम approached.

data.v: विजयस्वार्यपुत्रेति सोऽभिवाद्य प्रसाद्य च । न्यवेदयदनुप्राप्तं प्रहस्तं वाहिनीपतिम् ॥
data.es: The Rakshasa (guard) greeted the king saying, "Let you be victorious!" and announced reverentially, "Prahastha, the army chief has arrived."
data.anv: सः that Rakshasa, आर्यपुत्र to the king, विजयस्व let you be victorious, इति thus, अभिवाद्य greeted, प्रसाद्यच and reverentially, वाहिनीपतिम् chief of the army, प्रहस्तम् Prahastha, अनुप्राप्तम् has arrived, न्यवेदय् announced.

data.v: अमात्यैः सहितः सर्वैः प्रहस्तः समुपस्थितः । किंचिदात्ययिकं कार्यं तेषां त्वं दर्शनं कुरु ॥
data.es: "O great king, endowed with forgiveness and royalty! there is a little urgent work. Undoubtedly, they are waiting to see you please."
data.anv: महाराजा great king, क्षमान्वित endowed with forgiveness, राजभावात् with royalty, किञ्चित् a little, अत्ययिकम् urgent, कार्यम् work, अस्ति is, नूनम् undoubtedly, त्वम् you, तेषाम् them, दर्शनम् see, कुरु to.

data.v: एतच्छ्रुत्वा दशग्रीवो राक्षसप्रतिवेदितम् । अशोकवनिकां त्यक्त्वा मन्त्रिणां दर्शनं ययौ ॥
data.es: On hearing the submission of the rakshasa, the tenheaded king left the Asoka grove to see the ministers.
data.anv: दशग्रीवः tenheaded Ravana, एतत् all that (was said), राक्षसप्रतिवेदितम् submitted by Rakshasa, श्रुत्वा hearing, अशोकननकाम् from the Asoka grove, त्वक्त्वा left, मन्त्रिणाम् to the ministers, दर्सनम् to see, ययौ went.

data.v: स तु सर्वं समर्थ्यैव मन्त्रिभिः कृत्यमात्मनः । सभां प्रविश्य विदधे विदित्वा रामविक्रमम् ॥
data.es: Having known all about Rama's prowess, Ravana and ministers entered the assembly to think carefully about the task to be carried out and how to do it.
data.anv: सः that he, मन्त्रिभिः and ministers, आत्मनः himself, सर्वम् all about (Rama's prowess), कृत्यम् the task to be carried out, समर्थ्यैव thinking carefully, सभाम् to the assembly, प्रविश्य entered, रामविक्रमम् Rama's prowess, विदित्वा having known, विदधे to do so.

data.v: अन्तर्धानं तु तच्छीर्षं तच्च कार्मुकमुत्तमम् । जगाम रावणस्यैव निर्याणसमनन्तरम् ॥
data.es: As soon as Ravana departed, that head and the excellent bow vanished from there.
data.anv: रावणस्य Ravana's, निर्याणसमनन्तरमेव as soon as he departed, तत् शीर्षम् that head, उत्तमम् excellent, तत् that, कार्मुकंच and the bow, अन्तर्थानम् vanished, जागाम went.

data.v: राक्षसेन्द्रस्तु तैः सार्धं मन्त्रिभिर्भीमविक्रमैः । समर्थयामास तदा रामकार्यविनिश्चयम् ॥
data.es: The king of Rakshasas and the ministers of terrific valour then thought about the course of action to be taken against Rama and decided.
data.anv: राक्षसेन्द्रस्तु even king of Rakshasas, भीमविक्रमैः of terrific valour, मन्त्रिभिः and ministers, तदा then, रामकार्यविनिश्चयम् to decide on the course of action to be taken against Rama, समर्थयामास thought over and decided.

data.v: अविदूरस्थितान्सर्वान्बलाध्यक्षान्हितैषिणः । अब्रवीत्कालसदृशो रावणो राक्षसाधिपः ॥
data.es: The Rakshasa king who resembled the god of death spoke to the heads of army force and wellwishers who stood close by.
data.anv: कालसदृशः resembling god of death, राक्षसादिपः Rakshasa king, रावणः Ravana, अविदूरस्थितान् stood not far from him, हितैषिणः wellwishers, सर्वान् all, बलाध्यक्षान् heads of army force अब्रवीत् spoke.

data.v: शीघ्रं भेरीनिनादेन स्फुटकोणाहतेन मे । समानयध्वं सैन्यानि वक्तव्यं च न कारणम् ॥
data.es: "Break forth by beating the drums with powerful drumsticks calling the army to assemble without telling the reason."
data.anv: स्फुटम् break forth, कोणाहतेन with powerful drumsticks, भेरिनिनादेनमे by beating the drums, सैन्यानि the army, समानयध्वम् let them be called to assemble, कारणम् reason, नचवक्तव्यम् without telling.

data.v: ततस्तथेति प्रतिगृह्य तद्वचो; बलाधिपास्ते महदात्मनो बलम् । समानयंश्चैव समागतं च ते; न्यवेदयन्भर्तरि युद्धकाङ्क्षिणि ॥
data.es: Then the attendants collected the great powerful army saying, 'so be it', to Ravana who was desirous of war.॥ इत्यार्षेवाल्मीकीयेश्रीमद्रामायणेआदिकाव्येयुद्दकाण्डेद्वात्रिंशस्सर्गः ॥This is the end of the thirty second sarga of Yuddha Kanda of the first epic the holy Ramayana composed by sage Valmiki.
data.anv: ततः then, ते those, दूताः attendants, तद्वचः those words, तथाइति so be it, प्रतिगृह्य taking hold, बलाधिपाते the powerful army, महता great, आत्मनो to him, बलंच and the army, समानयान् collected, समागतम् arrived, युद्धकाङ्क्षिणि one who was desirous of war.

data.v: सीतां तु मोहितां दृष्ट्वा सरमा नाम राक्षसी । आससादाशु वैदेहीं प्रियां प्रणयिनी सखी ॥
data.es: Then seeing Sita in distraught, a Rakshasi by name Saarana who was very dear and friendly with Vaidehi approached her.
data.anv: अथ then, प्रणयिनीम् dear, सखी friend, सरमानाम Saarana, राक्षसी rakshasa मोहिताम् distraught, सीताम् Sita, दृष्टवा seeing, प्रियाम् friend, वैदेहीम् Vaidehi, आससाद approached

data.v: सा हि तत्र कृता मित्रं सीतया रक्ष्यमाणया । रक्षन्ती रावणादिष्टा सानुक्रोशा दृढव्रता ॥
data.es: Most compassionate Saarana, determined to protect was friendly with Sita while she was ordered for protecting her by Ravana.
data.anv: रावणादिष्टा by Ravana's order, रक्षन्ती protected, सानुक्रोशा most compassionate, दृढव्रता determined, सा that, तत्र there, रक्ष्यमाणया protecting, सीतया Sita, मित्रम् friendship, कृताहि was doing (protecting).

data.v: सा ददर्श सखीं सीतां सरमा नष्टचेतनाम् । उपावृत्योत्थितां ध्वस्तां वडवामिव पांसुषु ॥
data.es: Saarana saw her friend Sita, who had lost consciousness, fully covered by dust by rolling on the dirty ground like a female horse.
data.anv: सखी friend, सा that, सरमा Saarana, नष्टचेतनाम् lost consciousness, पांसुलाम् dirty ground, उपावृत्त्य enveloped, उत्थिताम् female horse, ध्वस्ताम् covered with, बडबामिव like a female horse, सीताम् Sita, ददर्श saw.

data.v: तां समाश्वासयामास सखी स्नेहेन सुव्रता । उक्ता यद्रावणेन त्वं प्रत्युक्तं च स्वयं त्वया ॥
सखीस्नेहेन तद्भीरु मया सर्वं प्रतिश्रुतम् । लीनया गनहे शूह्ये भयमुत्सृज्य रावणात् । तव हेतोर्विशालाक्षि न हि मे जीवितं प्रियम् ॥
data.es: "O Broadeyed friend! You are constantly under fear (timid). Give up fear of Ravana, I have overheard all that you have spoken to Ravana and his reply by hiding in a secret place out of my affection, without caring for my life."
data.anv: भीरु one under constant fear (timid), त्वम् you are, रावणेन by Ravana, यत् thus, उक्ता spoken, त्वया to you, स्वयम् yourself, प्रत्युक्तश्च your reply, तत् सर्वम् all that, शून्ये secret, गहने location, लीनया hiding, मया by me, सखीस्नेहेन out of friendship, रावणात् of Ravana, भयम् fear, उत्सृज्य giving up, प्रतिश्रुतम् heard the reply, विशालाक्षि broadeyed, तवहेतोः for your sake, मे me, जीवितम् life, भयम् fear, नहि not being.

data.v: स संभ्रान्तश्च निष्क्रान्तो यत्कृते राक्षसाधिपः । तच्च मे विदितं सर्वमभिनिष्क्रम्य मैथिलि ॥
data.es: "O Mythili! I know all about why the king of Rakshasas returned back agitated."
data.anv: मैथिलि Mythili, सःराक्षसाधिपः the king of Rakshasas, यत्कृते for what reason, सम्भ्रान्तः agitated, निष्क्रान्तः left, तत्र that, सर्वम् everything, अभिनिष्क्रम्य returned back, मे I, विदितम् know.

data.v: न शक्यं सौप्तिकं कर्तुं रामस्य विदितात्मनः । वधश्च पुरुषव्याघ्रे तस्मिन्नेवोपपद्यते ॥
data.es: "Rama is a knower of his Self. It is not possible to kill him while he is asleep. Nay death is not possible for he is a tiger among men."
data.anv: विदितात्मनः knower of himself, रामस्य Rama's, सौप्तिकम् sleeping, कर्तुम् to do, नशक्यम् not possible, पुरुषव्याघ्रे tiger among men, तस्मिन् his, वधश्च death, नैवउपपद्यते not possible.

data.v: न चैव वानरा हन्तुं शक्याः पादपयोधिनः । सुरा देवर्षभेणेव रामेण हि सुरक्षिताः ॥
data.es: "Vanaras are fighting with trees and are not capable of being killed. Just as the gods are protected by their Lord Indra, Vanaras are protected by Rama. It is not feasible to kill them."
data.anv: सुरर्षभेण Lord of Devas, सुराःइव like Devas, रामेण by Rama, सुरक्षिताः protected, पादपयोधिपः warriors who fight wielding trees, वानराः Vanaras, एवम् like that, हन्तुम् to kill, नशक्याः not feasible.

data.v: दीर्घवृत्तभुजः श्रीमान्महोरस्कः प्रतापवान् । धन्वी संहननोपेतो धर्मात्मा भुवि विश्रुतः ॥
विक्रान्तो रक्षिता नित्यमात्मनश्च परस्य च । लक्ष्मणेन सह भ्रात्रा कुशली नयशास्त्रवित् ॥
हन्ता परबलौघानामचिन्त्यबलपौरुषः । न हतो राघवः श्रीमान्सीते शत्रुनिबर्हणः ॥
अयुक्तबुद्धिकृत्येन सर्वभूतविरोधिना । इयं प्रयुक्ता रौद्रेण माया मायाविदा त्वयि ॥
data.es: "On account of his perverse thought and being inimical to all beings Ravana a tricker has attempted a trick at you in anger."
data.anv: अयुक्तबुद्धिकृत्येन by perverse thought, सर्वभूतविरोधिना inimical to all beings, रौद्रेण in anger, मायाविदा a tricker, इह here, त्वयि at you, माया trickcheating, प्रयुक्ता attempted.

data.v: शोकस्ते विगतः सर्वः कल्याणं त्वामुपस्थितम् । ध्रुवं त्वां भजते लक्ष्मीः प्रियं प्रीतिकरं शृणु ॥
data.es: "Your sorrow has gone. All auspiciousness awaits you. Surely you will attain good fortune (Lakshmi). You listen to my happy and pleasant news."
data.anv: ते your, शोकः grief, विगतः gone, सर्वकल्याणम् all auspicious, त्वाम् to you, उपस्थितम् awaits, लक्ष्मीः Lakshmi, ध्रुवम् surely, त्वाम् you, भजते attain, ते to you, प्रियम् pleasant, प्रीतिकरं happy, शृणु hear.

data.v: उत्तीर्य सागरं रामः सह वानरसेनया । संनिविष्टः समुद्रस्य तीरमासाद्य दक्षिणम् ॥
data.es: "Rama accompanied by Vanara army has crossed the ocean and reached the southern shore of the ocean."
data.anv: रामः Rama, वानरसेनयासह accompanied by Vanara army, सागरम् ocean, उत्तीर्य cross, समुद्रस्य of the ocean, दक्षिणंतीरम् southern shore, आसाद्य reached, सन्निविष्टः staying.

data.v: दृष्टो मे परिपूर्णार्थः काकुत्स्थः सहलक्ष्मणः । सहितैः सागरान्तस्थैर्बलैस्तिष्ठति रक्षितः ॥
data.es: "Rama, a fully accomplished soul accompanied by Lakshmana together with army stands protected by the army and is stationed on the seashore."
